Sɛ ɔka sɛ: Wɔn a wɔn ho yɛ ntokontrama no nyɛ w’akatua a, na nnwan no nyinaa awowo ntokontrama. Na sɛ ɔka sɛ: Wɔn a wɔn ho yɛ nsensannsensan no nyɛ w’akatua a, na nnwan no nyinaa awowo nsensannsensan.
Na Onyankopɔn agye mo agya mmoakuo ama me.
Na berɛ a mmoa no refoforo wɔn ho na wɔanyinsɛn no, memaa m’ani so na mehunui wɔ daeɛ mu, na hwɛ, mpapo a na wɔforo mmirekyie no, wɔn ho yɛ nsensannsensan ne ntokontrama ne nworonnworan.
Na Nyankopɔn bɔfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ me daeɛ mu sɛ: Yakob! Na mese: Menie.
Na ɔse: Ma w’ani so hwɛ, adwennini no a wɔreforo nnwan no nyinaa yɛ nsensannsensan ne ntokontrama ne nworonnworan: Ɛfiri sɛ mahunu deɛ Laban ayɛ woɔ nyinaa.
Mene Nyankopɔn a wohyiaa no Betel faako a wosraa ɛhɔ dum na wohyɛɛ bɔ maa me no; afei sɔre firi asase yi so, na sane kɔ w’abusua asase so.
Na Rahel ne Lea bua see no sɛ: Yɛda so wɔ kyɛfa anaasɛ agyapadeɛ bi wɔ yɛn agya fie anaa?
Ɔmmu yɛn ahɔhoɔ anaa? Ɛsiane sɛ watɔn yɛn, na wadi yɛn tiri sika awie,
na ahonyadeɛ a Onyankopɔn gyee yɛn agya nsam no yɛ yɛn ne yɛn mma dea. Enti afei yɛ deɛ Onyankopɔn aka akyerɛ woɔ nyinaa.
Na Yakob sɔre faa ne mma ne ne yerenom tenatenaa yoma so,
na ɔfaa ne mmoakuo nyinaa ne n’ahodeɛ a ɔnyaeɛ nyinaa ne mmoakuo a ɔnyaeɛ wɔ Mesopotamia no nyinaa sii mu sɛ ɔrekɔ n’agya Isak nkyɛn wɔ Kanaan asase so.
Na Laban kɔ rekɔtwitwa ne nnwan ho nwi. Na Rahel wiaa n’agya abusua honi.
Na Yakob wiaa ne ho dwanee, ɛfiri sɛ wankra Aramni Laban.
Na ɔne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa dwanee, na ɔsɔre twaa asubɔnten no, na ɔde n’ani kyerɛɛ Gilead bepɔ.
Na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ Laban sɛ Yakob adwane.
Na Laban faa ne nkurɔfoɔ kaa ne ho tii no nnanson kwan, na ɔbɛtoo no Gilead bepɔ so.
Na Onyankopɔn baa Aramni Laban nkyɛn anadwo daeɛ mu sɛ: Hwɛ yie, na woankasa papa anaa bɔne so ankyerɛ Yakob.
Na Laban kɔtoo Yakob. Na Yakob asi ne ntomadan wɔ bepɔ no so, na Laban ne ne nkurɔfoɔ nso sii wɔn deɛ Gilead bepɔ so.
Na Laban bisaa Yakob sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na woayɛ yi, sɛ woawia wo ho adwane me, na woasoa me mmammaa kɔ sɛ wɔn a wɔde nkrantɛ afa wɔn nnommum yi?
Adɛn nti na woahunta adwane, na woawia wo ho afiri me nkyɛn? Adɛn na woanka ankyerɛ me, na mamfa anigyeɛ ne nnwom, mpintin ne nsankuo mannya wo kwan?
Adɛn nti na woamma mamfe me mmammarima ne me mmammaa ano anya wɔn kwan? Yei deɛ, woadi no nkwasea so.
Mewɔ tumi sɛ anka me ne mo di no bɔne; nanso nnora anadwo no, mo agya ne Nyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ yie, na woankasa papa anaa bɔne so ankyerɛ Yakob.
Na afei deɛ korɔ ara na wopɛ sɛ wokorɔ, ɛfiri sɛ gyina na w’ani agyina w’agya fie; na adɛn nti na woawia m’anyame?
Na Yakob bua see Laban sɛ: Na mesuro, ɛfiri sɛ mesusuu sɛ wobɛgye wo mmammaa afiri me nsam.
Na deɛ wobɛhunu w’anyame wɔ ne nsa mu no rentena ase. Yɛn nkurɔfoɔ yi anim na hwehwɛ deɛ ɛyɛ wo dea wɔ me nkyɛn, na fa kɔ. Na Yakob nnim sɛ Rahel na ɔwiaeɛ.
Na Laban kɔɔ Yakob ntomadan mu ne Lea ntomadan ne mfenaa baanu no ntomadan mu, nanso wanhunu. Na ɔfiri Lea ntomadan mu kɔɔ Rahel ntomadan mu.
Na Rahel afa abusua honi no de ahyehyɛ yoma so adwa mu atena so. Na Laban de ne nsa kekaa ntomadan mu hɔ nyinaa, nanso wanhunu.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: Mma no nnyɛ me wura abufuo sɛ mentumi mensɔre wɔ w’anim, ɛfiri sɛ mabu me nsa. Na ɔpɛe pɛe pɛe, nanso wanhunu ahoni no.
Na Yakob bo fui, na ɔne Laban hamee, na Yakob ka kyerɛɛ Laban sɛ: Me mfomsoɔ ne sɛn, na me bɔne ne sɛn na wosa me yerɛdɛdɛdɛdɛ yi?
Na wobɛhwehwɛɛ me nnoɔma mu nyinaa yi, wo fie mu adeɛ bɛn na woahunu wɔ mu? Saa! Fa bɛto me nkurɔfoɔ ne wo nkurɔfoɔ anim wɔ ha, na wɔmmu yɛn baanu ntam atɛn.
Mfirinhyia aduonu ni a metenaa wo nkyɛn, wo nnwammereɛ ne wo mmirekyie ampɔn, na wo nnwan mu adwennini nso, manni bi.
Wɔn a mmoa kumm wɔn no mamfa mammrɛ wo, me na metuaa so ka. Deɛ wɔwiaa no awia ne deɛ wɔwiaa no anadwo, me nsa mu na wobisaeɛ.
Sɛ ɛyɛɛ me nie: Ahuhuro dee me awia, na awɔ dee me anadwo, na m’ani soroe.
Saa na medii wo fie mfirinhyia aduonu. Wo mmammaa baanu ho mesom wo mfeɛ dunan, ne wo mmoakuo ho nso mfeɛ nsia, na wodanee m’akatua ani mprɛdu.
Sɛ m’agya Nyankopɔn, Abraham Nyankopɔn, ne Isak suro annyina m’akyiri a, anka afei wogyaa me kwan nsapan. Me brɛ ne me nsa ano adwumayɛ na Onyankopɔn hunuiɛ, na ɔkaa w’anim nnora anadwo.

Na Laban bua see Yakob sɛ: Mma mmaa yi, me mma a, na mmammarima yi, me mma a, na nnwan yi, me nnwan a, na deɛ wohunu yi nyinaa, me dea. Na me mmammaa yi, anaasɛ wɔn mma a wɔawo wɔn yi, ɛdeɛn na mɛtumi de ayɛ wɔn nnɛ?
Afei bra ma yɛmpam, me ne wo, na ɛnyɛ me ne wo ntam adanseɛ.
Na Yakob faa ɔboɔ de yɛɛ odum sii hɔ.
Na Yakob ka kyerɛɛ ne nkurɔfoɔ sɛ: Mommoaboa aboɔ ano! Na wɔtasee aboɔ yɛɛ no kuo; na wɔdidii wɔ ekuo no so hɔ.
Na Laban frɛɛ hɔ Yegarsahaduta,
Na Laban kaa sɛ: Ekuo yi ne me ne wo ntam adanseɛ nnɛ. Enti wɔfrɛ hɔ Galeed,
ne Mispa,
Sɛ woteetee me mmammaa, na woware yerenom ka me mma ho a, obi nka yɛn ho deɛ, nanso Onyankopɔn ne me ne wo ntam danseni.
Na Laban ka kyerɛɛ Yakob sɛ: Hwɛ kuo yi, na hwɛ odum a mama so asi me ne wo ntam yi.
Aboɔkuo yi ne adanseɛ, na odum yi nso yɛ adanseɛ, sɛ me deɛ, merensiane ekuo yi ho memma wo nkyɛn, na wo nso, worensiane ekuo yi ne odum yi ho mma me nkyɛn mmɛyɛ bɔne.
Abraham Nyankopɔn ne Nahor Nyankopɔn, ne wɔn agya Nyankopɔn mmu yɛn ntam atɛn. Na Yakob kaa n’agya suro ho ntam.
Na Yakob bɔɔ afɔdeɛ wɔ bepɔ no so, na ɔfrɛɛ ne nkurɔfoɔ sɛ wɔmmɛdidi; na wɔdidii na wɔtenaa bepɔ no so anadwo no.
Na Laban sɔree anɔpatutu, na ɔfee ne nananom ne ne mmammaa no ano hyiraa wɔn, na ɔsii mu sane kɔɔ ne kurom.
Na Yakob hunuu wɔn no, ɔkaa sɛ: Nyankopɔn asafo nie. Na ɔtoo hɔ din: Maha-naim.
Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛdeɛ monka nkyerɛ me wura Esau ne sɛ: W’akoa Yakob se: Mekɔtenaa Laban nkyɛn na ɛhɔ na mewɔ de abɛduru sɛsɛɛ.
Manya anantwie, mfunumu, nnwan, mmirekyie ne nkoa ne mfenaa; na masoma sɛ wɔmmɛka nkyerɛ me wura, sɛdeɛ mɛnya w’anim adom.
Na abɔfoɔ no sane baa Yakob nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Yɛakɔ wo nua Esau nkyɛn, na ɔno nso ne mmarima ahanan reba abɛhyia wo.
Ɛnna Yakob suroo sɛ, na ne ho yeraa no. Na ɔkyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn ne nnwan, mmirekyie, anantwie ne yoma no mu akuo mmienu
kaa sɛ: Sɛ Esau ba kuo baako so bɛku wɔn a, ekuo a ɛbɛka no bɛnya kwan adwane.
w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ a wode akyerɛ w’akoa yi mu biara nsɛ me, ɛfiri sɛ mede me poma na metwaa Yordan yi, na afei mayɛ akuo mmienu.
Mesrɛ wo, yi me firi me nua Esau nsam, ɛfiri sɛ mesuro no sɛ ɔbɛba abɛku me, ne ɛnanom ne wɔn mma nyinaa.
Wo na wokaa sɛ: Yie na mɛyɛ woɔ, na mɛma w’asefoɔ ayɛ sɛ mpoano anwea a ne dodoɔ nti wɔntumi nkan.
Na ɔtenaa hɔ anadwo no; na ɔyii deɛ ɛwɔ ne nsa mu bi sɛ ɔde rekɔkyɛ ne nua Esau,
mmirekyibereɛ ahanu, mpapo aduonu, nnwammereɛ ahanu, adwennini aduonu,
yoma a wɔma nufoɔ ne wɔn mma aduasa, anantwibereɛ aduanan, anantwinini du, mfunumubereɛ aduonu ne mfunumu anini du.
Na ɔde hyɛɛ ne nkoa nsa akuakuo, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa no sɛ: Monsene nni m’anim, na momma kuo ne kuo ntam ntwe.
Na ɔhyɛɛ deɛ ɔdi kan no sɛ: Sɛ me nua Esau bɛhyia wo, na ɔbisa wo sɛ: Hwan nipa ne wo, na ɛhe na worekorɔ, na yeinom a ɛdi w’anim yi yɛ hwan dea?
Ka kyerɛ no sɛ: W’akoa Yakob dea; ɛyɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ a wasoma de rebrɛ me wura Esau; na hwɛ, ɔno nso wɔ yɛn akyi.
Na ɔhyɛɛ deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu ne deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa ne wɔn a wɔdi mmoakuo no akyire nyinaa nso sɛ: Sɛ mokɔhunu Esau a, monka asɛm korɔ yi ara nkyerɛ no.
Na monka nsi so sɛ: Hwɛ, w’akoa Yakob wɔ yɛn akyi. Afei ɔkaa sɛ: Mede ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛdi m’anim yi merekɔpata no, ansa na mahunu n’anim; ebia ɔbɛhwɛ m’anim.
Na ayɛyɛdeɛ no sene dii n’anim; na ɔno deɛ, ɔtenaa nsraban no mu anadwo no.
Na anadwo no ɔsɔree, na ɔfaa ne yerenom baanu ne ne mmaawa baanu no ne ne mma dubaako no de wɔn kɔtwaa Yabok asutwareeɛ.
Na ɔde wɔn twaa asubɔnten no, na ɔmaa deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa twaee.
Na ɛkaa Yakob nko ara. Na ɔbarima bi ne no bɛtentamee kɔduruu adekyeeɛ.
Na ɔbarima no hunuu sɛ ɔntumi no no, ɔkaa n’asene tokuro mu, na Yakob dwonku hwanee tentam a ɔne no tentameeɛ no mu.
Na ɔbarima no kaa sɛ: Ma menkɔ, na adeɛ rekye. Na Yakob buaa sɛ: Meremma wonkɔ gye sɛ wohyira me.
Na ɔbarima no bisaa no sɛ: Wo din de sɛn? Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Yakob.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Wɔremfrɛ wo din Yakob bio, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Israel,
Na Yakob bisaa no sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ me wo din. Na ɔse: Adɛn nti na worebisa me din? Na ɔbarima no hyiraa no wɔ hɔ.
Na Yakob too ɛhɔ din Peni-el,
Na ɔtwaa mu wɔ Peniel berɛ a na owia apue no, na ɔtɔ gu so ne dwonku a ahwan no nti.
Enti Israelfoɔ nni ntini a ɛwɔ asene mu akwaa tokuro mu no de bɛduru nnɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkaa Yakob dwonkuo tokuro mu, n’asene mu ntini no so.
Na ɔde mmaawa no ne wɔn mma dii anim, na Lea ne ne mma dii hɔ, na Rahel ne Yosef dii akyire.
Na ɔno ara deɛ ɔsene dii wɔn anim, na ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase kɔɔ fam mprɛnson de kɔsii sɛ ɔduruu ne nua nkyɛn.
Na Esau tuu mmirika bɛhyiaa no yɛɛ no atuu, na ɔde ne tiri too ne kɔn ho, na ɔfee n’ano, na wɔsui.
Na Esau maa n’ani so hunuu mmaa no ne wɔn mma no, ɔkaa sɛ: Hwannom ne yeinom a wɔka wo ho yi? Na Yakob buaa sɛ: Ɛyɛ mma a Onyankopɔn de adom w’akoa.
Na mmaawa no twe pinii, wɔn ne wɔn mma, na wɔbobɔɔ wɔn mu ase.
Na Lea nso ne ne mma twe pinii bobɔɔ wɔn mu ase, na akyire yi no Yosef ne Rahel twe pinii bobɔɔ wɔn mu ase.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Na ɛdɔm a mehyiaa wɔn yi ase ne sɛn? Na ɔse: Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na mɛnya me wura anim adom.
Na Esau kaa sɛ: Deɛ mewɔ dɔɔso, me nua, ma w’adeɛ ntena hɔ mma wo.
Na Yakob kaa sɛ: Dabi da, mesrɛ wo, sɛ manya w’anim adom a, gye m’ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛwɔ me nsam yi, na w’anim a mahunu yi te sɛdeɛ obi hunu Nyankopɔn anim, ɛfiri sɛ w’ani asɔ me.
Mesrɛ wo, gye nhyira a wɔde abrɛ woɔ yi, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn adom me, na mewɔ ade nyinaa. Na ɔhyɛɛ no, na ɔgyee.
Na Esau kaa sɛ: Ma yɛnsim nkɔ, na menni w’anim.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Me wura nim sɛ mma a wɔyɛ mmerɛ ne nnwan ne anantwie a wɔma nufoɔ ka me ho, na sɛ wɔpia wɔn dodo da koro a, nnwankuo no nyinaa bɛwuwu.
Enti ma me wura nsene nni n’akoa anim, na me deɛ, mɛnante brɛoo, sɛdeɛ mmoa a wɔdi m’anim ne mma no bɛtumi de akɔsi sɛ mɛduru me wura nkyɛn wɔ Seir.
Na Esau kaa sɛ: Ma mennya wo nnipa a wɔka me ho yi bi. Na ɔse: Na wɔnyɛ dɛn? Ma mennya me wura anim adom.
Ɛnna Esau sanee da no ara sii kwan so kɔɔ Seir.
Na Yakob sii mu kɔɔ Sukot, na ɔsii dan maa ne ho, na ɔbobɔɔ asese maa ne mmoa. Yei nti na wɔfrɛ hɔ Sukot.
Na Yakob firii Mesopotamia no, ɔnam bɛduruu Sekem kuro a ɛwɔ Kanaan asase soɔ no mu dwoodwoo, na ɔsisii ne ntomadan wɔ kuro no anim.
Na ɔtɔɔ asase a ɔsii ne ntomadan wɔ soɔ no wɔ Sekem agya Hamor mma nkyɛn nnwetɛbena ɔha.
Na ɔsii afɔrebukyia wɔ hɔ, na ɔtoo no: El-elohe-Israel.
Na asase no so otitire Hewini Hamor ba Sekem hunuu no, na ɔkyeree no too no mmɔnaa guu ne ho fi.
Na Yakob ba Dina sɔɔ Sekem ani, na ɔdɔɔ ababaa no, na ɔkorɔkorɔɔ no.
Na Sekem ka kyerɛɛ n’agya Hamor sɛ: Kɔgye ababaa yi awareɛ ma me.
Na Yakob tee sɛ wagu ne babaa Dina ho fi. Nanso ɛnam sɛ na ne mmammarima no wɔ ne mmoa nkyɛn wɔ wiram no, enti ɔyɛɛ komm de kɔsii sɛ wɔbaa fie.
Na Sekem agya Hamor firii adi kɔɔ Yakob nkyɛn sɛ ɔne no rekɔkasa.
Na Yakob mmammarima teeɛ no, wɔfirii wiram bae. Na ɛyɛɛ mmarima no ya, na wɔn bo fuu pa ara, sɛ Sekem adi Israel ho nkwaseasɛm sɛ ɔne Yakob babaa akɔda; adeɛ a ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ.
Na Hamor ne wɔn kasaa sɛ: Me ba Sekem akoma fam mo babaa no ho; mesrɛ mo, momfa no mma no aware.
Na mo ne yɛn nni ayewareɛ, na momfa mo mmammaa mma yɛn, na mo nso monware yɛn mmammaa.
Na mo ne yɛn ntena, na asase na ɛda mo anim yi, montena so nyɛ so adwuma nnya so adeɛ.
Na Sekem ka kyerɛɛ Dina n’agya ne ne nuanom sɛ: Momma mennya mo anim adom, na biribiara a mobɛse me no, mɛma.
Monnye me etire adeɛ dodoɔ ne akyɛdeɛ biara, na biribiara a mobɛse me no, mɛma; na momfa ababaa no mma me awareɛ.
Na Yakob mmammarima no kasa de nnaadaa buaa Sekem n’agya Hamor ɛfiri sɛ wagu wɔn nuabaa Dina ho fi.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Yɛntumi saa adeɛ yi yɛ, sɛ yɛde yɛn nua bɛma ɔbarima a ɔyɛ momonoto, ɛfiri sɛ ɛno yɛ ahohora ma yɛn.
Na yei mu nko na yɛbɛpene mo sɛ mobɛdane ayɛ sɛ yɛn, na wɔatwitwa mo mu mmarima nyinaa twetia.
Ɛno na yɛde yɛn mmammaa bɛma mo, na yɛabɛfa mo mmammaa nso aware, na yɛne mo atena, na yɛayɛ ɔman korɔ.
Na sɛ moantie yɛn, na moantwitwa twetia a, ɛnneɛ yɛbɛfa yɛn babaa akɔ.
Na wɔn nsɛm no sɔɔ Hamor ne ne ba Sekem ani.
Enti Sekem antwetwe ne ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ saa adeɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ na Yakob babaa no sɔ n’ani, na aberanteɛ no animuonyam sene n’agya fiefoɔ nyinaa.
Na Hamor ne ne ba Sekem kɔɔ wɔn kuro aboboano, na wɔne wɔn kurom mmarima kɔkasaa sɛ:
Nnipa yi, wɔne yɛn te asomdwoeɛ mu, enti momma wɔntena asase yi so, na wɔnyɛ so adwuma. Na asase yi, hwɛ, ɛda wɔn anim kakraa. Momma yɛmfa wɔn mmammaa nware, na yɛmfa yɛn mmammaa nso mma wɔn.
Na yei nko mu na nnipa no bɛpene sɛ wɔne yɛn bɛtena, na yɛayɛ ɔman korɔ; sɛ yɛn mu mmarima nyinaa bɛtwitwa twetia, sɛdeɛ wɔatwitwa no.
Wɔn mmoa ne wɔn ahonyadeɛ ne wɔn afieboa nyinaa renyɛ yɛn dea anaa? Momma yɛmpene so ma wɔn, na wɔne yɛn ntena.
Na wɔn a wɔnam Hamor kuro pono ano firi adie nyinaa tiee no ne ne ba Sekem, na mmarima nyinaa, wɔn a wɔnam ne kuro pono ano firi adie nyinaa twitwaa twetia.
Na wɔde nkrantɛ kumm Hamor ne ne ba Sekem; na wɔde Dina firii Sekem fie hɔ bae.
Yakob mmammarima no baa atɔfoɔ no so bɛfom kuro no mu nnoɔma fae, ɛfiri sɛ wɔagu wɔn nua no ho fi.
Wɔn nnwan, wɔn anantwie, wɔn mfunumu ne deɛ ɛwɔ kuro no mu ne deɛ ɛwɔ mfuo mu no, wɔfae.
Na wɔn ade nyinaa ne wɔn mma nyinaa ne wɔn yerenom, wɔfaa wɔn nnommum fom deɛ ɛwɔ fie nyinaa.
Na wɔse: Ɔnyɛ yɛn nuabaa sɛ odwamamfoɔ anaa?
Na momma yɛnsɔre nkɔ Betel, na menkɔsi afɔrebukyia wɔ hɔ memma Onyankopɔn a m’ahohiahia da ɔtiee me na ɔdii m’akyi wɔ kwan a mekɔeɛ no mu no.
Ɛnna wɔde wɔn anyame ananafoɔ a ɛwɔ wɔn nsam nyinaa ne wɔn aso mu nkaa maa Yakob, na ɔde siee dupɔn bi a ɛwɔ Sekem ho no ase.
Na wɔsii mu sɛ wɔrekorɔ no, Nyankopɔn ho hu baa nkuro a atwa wɔn ho ahyia no so, na wɔanti Yakob mma no.
Na Yakob ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔka ne ho nyinaa duruu Lus a ɛwɔ Kanaan asase soɔ (a ɛne Betel).
Na ɔsii hɔ afɔrebukyia, na ɔfrɛɛ hɔ: El-betel,
Na Onyankopɔn yii ne ho kyerɛɛ Yakob bio, ne ba a ɔfirii Mesopotamia baeɛ no mu, na ɔhyiraa no.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo din de Yakob, nanso wɔremfrɛ wo Yakob bio, na mmom Israel ne wo din; na ɔtoo no din Israel.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mene Onyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn, dɔre na yɛ bebree; ɔman ne aman asafo bɛfiri wo mu aba, na ahemfo firi w’asene mu bɛba.
Na asase a mede mama Abraham ne Isak no, wo na mede bɛma woɔ; na w’asefoɔ a wɔbɛdi w’akyire no na mede asase no bɛma wɔn.
Na Onyankopɔn firii ne nkyɛn wɔ deɛ ɔne no kasaeɛ hɔ kɔɔ ɔsoro.
Na Yakob de odum sii deɛ ɔne no kasaeɛ hɔ, ɔboɔ dum, na ɔhwiee ɔnom afɔdeɛ guu so, na ɔde ngo guu so.
Na Yakob frɛɛ deɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn kasaeɛ hɔ Betel.
Na wɔtutu firi Betel kɔe. Na aka kwan tiaa bi na wɔaduru Efrat no, awoɔ kaa Rahel, na awoɔ no denee no.
Na n’awoɔ mu yɛɛ den no, awogyefoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Nsuro, na yei nso wobɛwo ɔbabarima.
Na ne kra refiri ne mu na ɔreyɛ awuo no, ɔtoo no din Ben-oni,
Na Rahel wui, na wɔsiee no ɛkwan a ɛde Efrat (a ɛne Betlehem) no nkyɛn.
Na Yakob sii ne da so dum, ɛne Rahel da so dum de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Israel tutu kɔsii ne ntomadan wɔ Eder abantenten akyiri nohoa.
Nso Yakob mmammarima yɛ dummienu: Lea mma ne Ruben (Yakob abakan), Simeon, Lewi, Yuda, Isakar ne Sebulon.
Rahel mma ne Yosef ne Benyamin.
Na Rahel abaawa Bilha mma ne Dan ne Naftali.
Na Lea abaawa Silpa mma ne Gad ne Aser. Yeinom ne Yakob mmammarima a wɔwoo wɔn wɔ Mesopotamia.
Na Yakob baa n’agya Isak nkyɛn wɔ Mamre, wɔ Kiriat-arba (a ɛne Hebron), deɛ Abraham ne Isak tenaeɛ sɛ ahɔhoɔ no.
Na Isak nna nyinaa yɛ mfirinhyia ɔha aduɔwɔtwe.
Na Isak gyaa ne honhom mu, na ɔwui, na ɔtii ne nananom wɔ asamando, berɛ a na wabɔ akora, na nna amee no. Na ne mma Esau ne Yakob siee no.
Esau waree Kanaanfoɔ mmaa: Hetini Elon babaa Ada, ne Hewini Sibeon ba Ana babaa Oholibama,
ne Ismael babaa Basmat, Nebaiot nuabaa.
Na Ada woo Elifas maa Esau, na Basmat woo Reuel.
Na Oholibama woo Yeus ne Yalam ne Kora. Yeinom ne Esau mma a wɔwoo wɔn wɔ Kanaan asase soɔ.

Na Esau faa ne yerenom ne ne mmammarima ne ne mmammaa ne ne fiefoɔ nyinaa ne ne mmoa ne n’anantwie nyinaa ne n’ahonyadeɛ a ɔnyaeɛ wɔ Kanaan asase soɔ nyinaa, na ɔfirii ne nua Yakob ho kɔɔ asase bi so,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔn ahonyadeɛ dɔɔso sene deɛ wɔde tena faako, na asase a wɔyɛ so ahɔhoɔ no, wɔn mmoa dodoɔ nti na wɔnsene so.
Esau, a ɔno ara ne Edom no kɔtenaa Seir bepɔ so.
Na yeinom ne Edomfoɔ agya Esau a ɔte Seir bepɔ soɔ no awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ:
Esau mmammarima din nie: Esau yere Ada ba Elifas, ne Esau yere Basmat ba Reuel.
Na Elifas mma ne Teman, Omar, Sefo, Gatam ne Kenas.
(Na Timna yɛ Esau ba Elifas mpena, na ɔwoo Amalek maa Elifas.) Yeinom ne Esau yere Ada mma.
Na yeinom ne Reuel mma: Nahat, Sera, Sama ne Misa; yeinom ne Esau yere Basmat mma.
Na yeinom ne Esau yere Oholibama, Sibeon ba Ana babaa no mma: Ɔwoo Yeus, Yalam ne Kora maa Esau.
Yeinom ne Esau mma mu atitire: Esau abakan Elifas mma: Otitire Teman, otitire Omar, otitire Sefo, otitire Kenas,
otitire Kora, otitire Gatam, ne otitire Amalek. Yeinom ne Elifas atitire wɔ Edom asase so; yeinom ne Ada mma.
Na yeinom ne Esau ba Reuel mma: Otitire Nahat, otitire Sera, otitire Sama, ne otitire Misa. Yeinom ne Reuel atitire wɔ Edom asase so; yeinom ne Esau yere Basmat mma.
Na yeinom ne Esau yere Oholibama mma: Otitire Yeus, otitire Yalam, otitire Kora. Yeinom ne Esau yere Oholibama, Ana ba, atitire no.
Yeinom ne Esau mma, na yeinom ne wɔn atitire no; (ɔne Edom.)
Dison, Eser ne Disan. Yeinom ne Horifoɔ a wɔyɛ Seir mma a na wɔte Edom asase soɔ no atitire.
Na Lotan mma ne Hori ne Hemam, na Lotan nuabaa ne Timna.
Na yeinom ne Sobal mma: Alwan, Manahat, Ebal, Sefo ne Onam.
Na yeinom ne Sibeon mma: Aya ne Ana. Oyi ne Ana a na ɔhwɛ n’agya Sibeon mfunumu no, a ɔhunuu nsuohyeɛ aniwa wɔ ɛserɛ soɔ no.
Na yeinom ne Ana mma: Dison ne Oholibama, a ɔyɛ Ana babaa.
Na yeinom ne Dison mma: Hemdan, Esban, Itran ne Keran.
Yeinom ne Eser mma: Bilhan, Saawan ne Akan.
Yeinom ne Disan mma: Us ne Aran.
Yeinom ne Horifoɔ atitire: Otitire Lotan, otitire Sobal, otitire Sibeon, otitire Ana,
otitire Dison, otitire Eser, otitire Disan. Yeinom ne Horifoɔ atitire sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ wɔ Seir asase soɔ.
Yeinom ne ahemfo a wɔdii Edom asase soɔ ansa na obi redi Israel mma so hene.
Na Bela, Beor ba, dii Edomhene, na ne kuro din de Dinhaba.
Na Bela wui, na Sera ba Yobab a ɔfiri Bosra bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Yobab wui, na Husam a ɔfiri Teman asase soɔ no bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Husam wui, na Bedad ba Hadad a ɔkumm Midian wɔ Moab petee mu no bɛdii n’adeɛ, na ne kuro din de Hawit.
Na Hadad wui, na Samla a ɔfiri Masreka bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Samla wui, na Saulo a ɔfiri Rehobot a ɛda asuo no ho no bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Saulo wui, na Akbor ba Baal-hanan bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Akbor ba Baal-hanan wui, na Hadar bɛdii n’adeɛ. Na ne kuro din de Pau, na ne yere din de Mehetabel, Mesahab babaa Matred babaa.
Na yeinom ne Esau atitire no din, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusuakuo, wɔn tenabea ne wɔn din teɛ: Otitire Timna, otitire Alwa, otitire Yetet,
otitire Oholibama, otitire Ela, otitire Pinon,
otitire Kenas, otitire Teman, otitire Mibsar,
otitire Magdiel, otitire Iram. Yeinom ne Edom (a ɔne Esau, Edomfoɔ agya) no atitire, sɛdeɛ wɔn tenabea teɛ wɔ asase a wɔnyaeɛ no soɔ.
Na Yakob tenaa asase a n’agya yɛɛ so hɔhoɔ a ɛne Kanaan asase no so.

Na yei ne Yakob abusua ho abakɔsɛm: Yosef dii mfirinhyia dunson no, ɔne ne nuanom kɔhwɛɛ nnwan; na aberantewaa no ne n’agya yerenom Bilha ne Silpa mma na ɛwɔ hɔ. Na Yosef bɛka wɔn ho asɛmmɔne kyerɛ n’agya.
Na ɛsiane sɛ Yosef yɛ ne nkɔkoraaberɛ mu ba nti, na Israel dɔ no sene ne mma nyinaa; enti ɔpam batakari fɛfɛ bi maa no.
Na ne nuanom hunuu sɛ wɔn agya dɔ no sene wɔn nyinaa no, wɔtanee no, na wɔmfa abodwoɔ ne no nkasa.
Na Yosef soo daeɛ, na berɛ a ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom no, wɔtanee no senee akane no.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Montie daeɛ a maso yi:
Na hwɛ, na yɛrekyekyere ayuo afiafi wɔ afuom. Na m’afi no sɔre gyinaa kyirebenn, na hwɛ, mo afiafi no twaa m’afi ho hyiae, na ɛrekoto m’afi no.
Na ne nuanom ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kyerɛ sɛ worebɛdi yɛn so hene anaasɛ worebɛdi yɛn so tumi? Na ne daeɛ ne ne nsɛm no nti wɔkɔɔ so tanee no bebree.
Na ɔsoo daeɛ foforɔ bio, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom sɛ: Hwɛ, maso daeɛ bio, na hwɛ, owia ne ɔsrane ne nsoromma dubaako akoto me.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’agya ne ne nuanom no, n’agya kaa n’anim sɛ: Daeɛ bɛn na woaso yi? Kyerɛ sɛ, me ne wo na ne wo nuanom bɛba abɛkoto fam wɔ w’anim?
Na ne nuanom ani beree no; na n’agya deɛ, ɔde nsɛm no siee.
Na Israel ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Sɛ wonim sɛ wo nuanom rewɛn mmoa wɔ Sekem. Bra na mensoma wo wɔn nkyɛn. Na ɔse: Menie.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kɔ na kɔhwɛ sɛ wo nuanom ne nnwan no ho yɛ anaa; na sane bɛka kyerɛ me. Na ɔsomaa no firii Hebron bonhwa mu, na ɔkɔduruu Sekem.
Na ɔbarima bi hunuu no, na hwɛ, na ɔrewɔ wira no mu ntwɛtwɛdɛ. Na ɔbarima no bisaa no sɛ: Worehwehwɛ deɛn?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Me nuanom na merehwehwɛ wɔn; mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ me faako a wɔrehwɛ wɔn mmoa no.
Na ɔbarima no se: Wɔatu ha; na metee sɛ wɔreka sɛ: Momma yɛnkɔ Dotan. Na Yosef tii ne nuanom, na ɔkɔhunuu wɔn wɔ Dotan.
Na ne nuanom hunuu no akyirikyiri na ɔnnya nnuruu wɔn nkyɛn no, wɔpamm ne tiri so sɛ wɔbɛku no.
Na wɔsesee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ: Hwɛ, ɔdaeɛsofoɔ no na ɔreba no.
Afei mommra mma yɛnku no mfa no nto mmura yi bi mu, na yɛnka sɛ: Aboa bɔne bi na awe no, na yɛahwɛ deɛ ne daeɛ no bɛyɛ.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Monnhwie mogya nngu, na momfa no nto ɛserɛ so ha abura yi mu; na mommfa mo nsa nnka no. Ɔreyɛ na anka wayi no afiri wɔn nsam de no asane akɔma n’agya.
Na Yosef duruu ne nuanom nkyɛn no, wɔworɔɔ n’atadeɛ ne batakari fɛfɛ a ɔhyɛ no,
na wɔde no kɔtoo abura no mu. Nso na abura no da mpan a nsuo nni mu.
Na wɔtenaa ase didii. Na wɔmaa wɔn ani so hwɛe, wɔhunuu Ismaelfoɔ akwantufoɔkuo bi a wɔfiri Gilead rekɔ Misraim ne wɔn yoma a wɔsoso hyehwam ne akyenkyennuro ne kurobo sɛ wɔreba.
Na Yuda ka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom sɛ: Sɛ yɛkum yɛn nua na yɛsi ne mogya so a, mfasoɔ bɛn na ɛwɔ mu?
Mommra mma yɛntɔn no mma Ismaelfoɔ. Mommma yɛmmfa yɛn nsa nnka no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ yɛn nua ne yɛn mogya. Na ne nuanom no tiee no.
Na Midianfoɔ adwadifoɔ bi rebɛsene. Na wɔtwetwee Yosef yii no firii abura no mu, na wɔtɔn no maa Ismaelfoɔ no gyee nnwetɛbena aduonu. Na wɔde Yosef kɔɔ Misraim.
Na Ruben sane baa abura no so, na hwɛ, na Yosef nni abura no mu. Na ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu,
na ɔsane baa ne nuanom nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Abɔfra no nni hɔ, na afei ɛdeɛn na menyɛ?
Na wɔfaa Yosef atadeɛ no, na wɔkumm ɔpapo bi, na wɔde atadeɛ no bɔɔ mogya no mu.
Na wɔsoma maa wɔde batakari fɛfɛ no brɛɛ wɔn agya bɛkaa sɛ: Yei na yɛahunu, hwɛ sɛ wo ba no atadeɛ ni anaa?
Na ɔhwɛeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛyɛ me ba no atadeɛ a! Aboa bɔne bi na awe no, ampa ara wɔatete Yosef mu.
Ɛnna Yakob sunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu, na ɔde ayitoma bɔɔ n’asene, na ɔsuu ne ba no kyɛree.
Na ne mmammarima nyinaa ne ne mmammaa nyinaa bae sɛ wɔbɛkyekyere ne werɛ, nanso wamma wɔankyekyere ne werɛ. Na ɔkaa sɛ: Mede awerɛhoɔ yi ara bɛkɔ me ba nkyɛn wɔ Asamando. Na n’agya suu no.
Na Midianfoɔ no kɔtɔnee no wɔ Misraim maa Potifar a ɔyɛ Farao piani ne n’ankɔbeafoɔ so panin no.
Na ɛbaa sɛ berɛ no ara mu Yuda firii ne nuanom nkyɛn kɔe, na ɔkɔtenaa Adulamni bi a wɔfrɛ no Hira nkyɛn.
Na Yuda hunuu Kanaanni bi a wɔfrɛ no Sua babaa bi wɔ hɔ, ɔwaree no na ɔne no dae.
Na ɔnyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Er.
Na ɔnyinsɛnee bio woo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Onan.
Na ɔnyinsɛnee bio woo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Sela. Na ɔwoo no no, na ɔwɔ Kesib.
Na Yuda waree yerɛ bi a wɔfrɛ no Tamar maa n’abakan Er.
Na Yuda abakan Er dii amumuyɛsɛm AWURADE anim, na AWURADE kumm no.
Na Onan nim sɛ mma no renyɛ ne dea, na ɛbaa sɛ, sɛ ɔkɔ ne nua yere no ho a, ɔma ne ho gu fam sɛe, na wanwo mma amma ne nua.
Na deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no yɛɛ bɔne wɔ AWURADE anim, enti ɔkumm ɔno nso.
Na afei Yuda ka kyerɛɛ n’ase Tamar sɛ: Kɔtena kuna mu wɔ w’agya fie kɔsi sɛ me ba Sela bɛnyini. Ɛfiri sɛ ɔse, anyɛ saa a, ɔno nso bɛwu sɛ ne nuanom. Na Tamar kɔ kɔtenaa n’agya fie.
Na ɛkyɛree kyɛreeɛ no, Sua babaa, Yuda yere no, wui. Na Yuda werɛ kyekyereeɛ no, ɔne n’adamfo Hira Adulamni no kɔɔ ne nnwan ho twitwafoɔ nkyɛn wɔ Timnat.
Na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ Tamar sɛ: Hwɛ, w’ase rekɔ Timnat akɔtwitwa ne nnwan ho.
Na ɔyii ne kuna ntadeɛ firii ne ho, na ɔde nkatanimu kataa n’anim, na ɔsakyeraa ne ho kɔtenaa Enaim kurotia wɔ Timnat kwan ho, ɛfiri sɛ wahunu sɛ Sela anyini, na wɔamfa no amma no awareɛ.
Na Yuda hunuu no no, ɛsiane sɛ wakata n’anim nti, ɔbuu no sɛ odwamamfoɔ.
Na ɔmane kɔɔ ne nkyɛn ɔkwan no ho kaa sɛ: Ma mene wo nkɔda ɛ, nso na ɔnnim sɛ n’ase a. Na ɔse: Ɛdeɛn na wobɛma me na wone me ada?
Na ɔse: Mɛma wɔde abirekyie ba afiri mmoa mu abrɛ wo. Na ɔse: Ɛnneɛ ma me awowadeɛ kɔsi sɛ wode bɛba.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na memfa mensi wo awowa? Na ɔse: Wo nsɔanokaa ne wo homa ne wo nsam poma. Na ɔde maa no, na ɔkɔɔ ne ho, na ɔne no nyinsɛnee.
Na ɔsɔree, na ɔkɔe, na ɔyii ne nkatanimu firii ne ho, na ɔhyɛɛ ne kuna ntadeɛ no.
Na Yuda de abirekyie ba no maa n’adamfo Adulamni no sɛ ɔmfa nkɔgye n’awowadeɛ no wɔ ɔbaa no nsam mmrɛ no, nanso wanhu no.
Na ɔbisaa kurom hɔfoɔ sɛ: Odwamamfoɔ a ɔte Enaim kwan ho no wɔ he? Na wɔse: Odwamamfoɔ biara nni ha.
Na ɔsane baa Yuda nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Manhu no, nanso kurom hɔfoɔ se: Odwamamfoɔ biara nni hɔ.
Na Yuda se: Ma no mfa, na yɛn ani anwu. Hwɛ, mama wode abirekyie ba yi akɔma no, na woanhu no.
Na ɛbɛyɛ abosome mmiɛnsa akyiri no, wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ Yuda sɛ: W’ase Tamar abɔ adwaman ama no anyinsɛn. Na Yuda kaa sɛ: Monkɔfa no mmra na wɔnhye no.
Na wɔkɔfaa Tamar baeɛ no, ɔsoma maa wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ n’ase no sɛ: Ɔbarima a ne nnoɔma nie no, ne me na anyinsɛn. Na ɔse: Hwehwɛ mu na hwɛ, deɛ nsɔanokaa, homa ne poma yi yɛ ne dea?
Na Yuda ani hunuiɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Ɔtene sene me, ɛfiri sɛ mamfa no mamma me ba Sela. Nanso ɔne no anna bio.
Na ɛduruu n’awoɔ soɔ no, hwɛ, na nta na ɛwɔ ne yam.
Na ɔrewoɔ no, ɔbaako yii ne nsa, na awogyefoɔ no sɔɔ mu de asaawa kɔkɔɔ kyekyeree ne nsa no kaa sɛ: Oyi na ɔfirii adi kane.
Na ɔtwee ne nsa kɔɔ mu no, hwɛ, ne nua no firii adi, na ɔkaa sɛ: Hwɛ sɛdeɛ woatete mu? Wo so na ntemu no wɔ. Enti wɔtoo no din Peres.
Na akyire yi no, ne nua a asaawa kɔkɔɔ bɔ ne nsa soɔ no bae, na ɔtoo no din Sera.
Na AWURADE dii Yosef akyi, na ɔyɛɛ ɔbarima a ne ho wɔ siadeɛ, na ɔtenaa ne wura Misraimni no fie.
Na ne wura hunuu sɛ AWURADE di n’akyi na AWURADE ma deɛ ɔyɛ nyinaa yɛ yie n’abasa soɔ no,
Yosef nyaa n’anim adom, na ɔsom no; na ɔde no sii ne fie so, na ɔde deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa hyɛɛ ne nsa.
Na ɛfiri berɛ a ɔde no sii ne fie ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa soɔ no, Yosef nti AWURADE hyiraa Misraimni no fie, na AWURADE nhyira baa deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa so, efie ne afuom.
Na ɔde deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa hyɛɛ Yosef nsa, na ɔwɔ hɔ nti, ɔnhwɛ biribiara gye aduane a ɔno ara die. Nso na Yosef ho ne n’anim yɛ fɛ.
Nanso wampene, na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura yere no sɛ: Hwɛ, sɛ me wura anya me nti ɔnhwɛ deɛ ɛwɔ ne fie, na ɔde deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa.
Obiara nyɛ kɛseɛ nsene me efie ha, na ɔnkame me biribiara gye wo, ɛnam sɛ ne yere ne woɔ ntira. Na adɛn na menyɛ amumuyɛ kɛseɛ yi, na menyɛ bɔne mentia Onyankopɔn?
Na ɔka kyerɛ Yosef saa daa daa, nanso Yosef antie sɛ ɔne no bɛda na ama ne nsa aka no.
Na da koro bi a ɔkɔɔ ɛdan no mu sɛ ɔrekɔyɛ n’adwuma, na efie hɔfoɔ no mu biara nni hɔ no,
ne wura yere no sɔɔ n’atadeɛ mu kaa sɛ: Wo ne me mmɛda! Na Yosef gyaa n’atadeɛ no wɔ ne nsam dwane firii adi.
Na ɔbaa no hunuu sɛ wagya n’atadeɛ wɔ ne nsam adwane afiri adie no,
ɔfrɛfrɛɛ ne fiefoɔ ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monhwɛ, wakɔfa Hebrini yi aba rebɛdi yɛn ho fɛw; waba me nkyɛn sɛ ɔne me rebɛda, na mede nne kɛseɛ meteaa mu;
na ɔtee sɛ memaa me nne soɔ meteaa mu no, ɔgyaa n’atadeɛ wɔ me nsam, na ɔdwane firii adi.
Na ɔde n’atadeɛ no guu ne nkyɛn kɔsii sɛ ne wura baa fie.
Na ɔkaa saa nsɛm yi ara kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Akoa Hebrini a wokɔfaa no brɛɛ yɛn no baa me nkyɛn sɛ ɔrebɛdi me ho fɛw;
na memaa me nne so meteaa mu no, ɔgyaa n’atadeɛ wɔ me nsam, na ɔdwane firii adie.
Na ne wura tee ne yere nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Saa adeɛ yi na w’akoa no ayɛ me no, ne bo fui.
Na Yosef wura no faa no de no kɔtoo afiase, deɛ ɔhene nneduafoɔ guo, na ɔdaa afiase hɔ.
Na AWURADE dii Yosef akyi, na ɔdom no, na ɔmaa n’anim baa nyam wɔ afiasehwɛni no anim.
Na afiasehwɛni no de nneduafoɔ a wɔwɔ afiase hɔ nyinaa hyɛɛ Yosef nsa, na biribiara a na wɔyɛ no wɔ hɔ no, ɔno na na ɔhwɛ soɔ.
Afiasehwɛni no anha ne ho anhwɛ biribiara a ɛwɔ Yosef nsam, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE dii n’akyi, na deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, AWURADE maa no yɛɛ yie.
Na ɛbaa sɛ akyire yi Misraimhene nsahyɛni ne ne paanootoni fom wɔn wura, Misraimhene no.
Na Farao bo fuu n’apiafoɔ baanu no, nsahyɛfoɔ panin ne paanootofoɔ panin no.
Na ɔde wɔn kɔguu afiase wɔ ankɔbeafoɔ panin no fie, faako a Yosef da hɔ.
Na ankɔbeafoɔ panin no maa Yosef hwɛɛ wɔn so som wɔn; na wɔkyɛree afiase hɔ kakra.
Na Misraimhene nsahyɛni ne ne paanootoni a na wɔgu afiase hɔ no baanu nyinaa sosoo daeɛ anadwo korɔ, ɛsono oyi daeɛ ne n’asekyerɛ, na ɛsono oyi nso daeɛ.
Na Yosef kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn anɔpa kɔhwɛɛ wɔn, na hwɛ, na wɔayeyɛ mosomosoo.
Na ɔbisaa Farao apiafoɔ a wɔne no gu afiase wɔ ne wura fie no sɛ: Adɛn nti na nnɛ mo anim ayɛ bosabosaa sɛɛ?
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yɛasoso daeɛ, nso obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛkyerɛ aseɛ. Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Nkyerɛaseɛ mfiri Onyankopɔn hɔ anaa? Monka nkyerɛ me ɛ!
Ɛnna nsahyɛfoɔ panin no kaa ne daeɛ no kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Me daeɛ mu no, na hwɛ, bobe bi si m’anim,
na bobe no apae nkorabata mmiɛnsa, na ayɛ sɛdeɛ ɛrefefɛ, na anyini agu nhyerɛne, na abɔ esia ayɛ aba a abereɛ.
Na Farao kuruwa kura me, na metetee bobe aba no mekyi guu Farao kuruwa no mu, na mede kuruwa no hyɛɛ Farao nsa.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ne nkyerɛaseɛ nie: Nkorabata mmiɛnsa no yɛ nnansa.
Na aka nnansa na Farao ayi wo afiri ha de wo asane akɔdi wo dibea bio, na wode Farao kuruwa ahyɛ ne nsa sɛ kane a na woyɛ ne nsahyɛni no.
Nanso sɛ ɛyɛ a, kae me, na sɛ ɛsi wo yie a, yɛ me adɔeɛ, na bɔ me din kyerɛ Farao, na bɛyi me ɛdan yi mu,
ɛfiri sɛ wia na wɔwiaa me Hebrifoɔ asase soɔ, na ɛha nso menyɛɛ hwee a anka ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde me bɛto amena yi mu.
Na paanootofoɔ panin no hunuu sɛ nkyerɛaseɛ no yɛ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Me nso, me daeɛ mu no, na hwɛ, paanoo nkɛntɛn mmiɛnsa a ɛsisi soɔ wɔ m’atifi.
Na kɛntɛn a ɛdi soro no mu na Farao anomu atɔduane nyinaa bi wɔ; na nnomaa redidi wɔ kɛntɛn no mu wɔ m’atifi.
Na Yosef buaa sɛ: Ne nkyerɛaseɛ nie: Nkyerɛnkyɛ mmiɛnsa no yɛ nnansa;
na aka nnansa na Farao ayi wo afiri ha, na wakɔsɛne wo dua so ma nnomaa adi wo nam afiri wo ho.
Na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa a ɛyɛ Farao awoda no, ɔtoo ne nkoa nyinaa pono, na ɔyii nsahyɛfoɔ panin ne paanootofoɔ mu panin no de wɔn baa ne nkoa anim;
na ɔsane de nsahyɛfoɔ mu panin no sii ne nsahyɛ so bio a ɔde kuruwa hyɛ Farao nsa.
Na paanootofoɔ panin no deɛ, ɔsɛnee no, sɛdeɛ Yosef kyerɛɛ wɔn aseɛ no.
Na mfeɛ mmienu akyiri no, Farao soo daeɛ, na hwɛ, ɔgyina Nil asubɔnten no ho.
Na hwɛ, anantwibereɛ nson a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ na wɔn ho tua wɔn ho firi asubɔnten no mu ba bɛdidii ɛserɛ no mu.
Na hwɛ, anantwibereɛ nson foforɔ a wɔn ho yɛ tane na wɔafomfɔn nso firi asubɔnten no mu dii wɔn akyiri bae. Na wɔbɛgyinaa anantwie nson no nkyɛn wɔ asubɔnten no nsunoa.
Na anantwie a wɔn ho yɛ tane na wɔafomfɔn no memenee nson a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ na wɔn ho tua wɔn ho no. Na Farao nyanee.
Na ɔsane soo daeɛ bio, na hwɛ, ayuo mmɛtem nson a ɛtoatoa soɔ na abɔ ma refifiri wɔ nan korɔ so.
Na hwɛ, mmɛtem nson nkorowankorowa a apueeɛ mframa akusa no fifiri dii akyire bae.
Na mmɛtem nkorowankorowa no memenee mmɛtem nson a ɛtoatoa soɔ na ayuo wɔ mu no. Na Farao nyanee, na hwɛ, ɛyɛ daeɛ.
Na anɔpa no ne ho dwanee no, na ɔsoma maa wɔkɔfrɛfrɛɛ Misraim atwerɛfoɔ nyinaa ne ɛhɔ anyansafoɔ nyinaa, na Farao kaa ne daeɛ no kyerɛɛ wɔn, nanso obiara antumi ankyerɛ no aseɛ.
Ɛnna nsahyɛfoɔ mu panin no ka kyerɛɛ Farao sɛ: Makae me mfomsoɔ nnɛ.
Berɛ a Farao bo fuu ne nkoa na ɔde me ne paanootofoɔ panin no kɔtoo afiase wɔ ankɔbeafoɔ panin fie no,
yɛsosoo daeɛ anadwo korɔ no ara, me ne no na ɛsonsono yɛn daeɛ a yɛsosoeɛ ne ebiara nkyerɛaseɛ.
Na Hebrini aberanteɛ bi a ɔyɛ ankɔbeafoɔ panin no akoa ne yɛn na ɛwɔ hɔ, na yɛkekaa yɛn daeɛ kyerɛɛ no no, ɔkyerɛɛ yɛn yɛn daeɛ no ase, sɛdeɛ ebiara teɛ.
Na sɛdeɛ ɔkyerɛɛ yɛn aseɛ no, saa ara na ɛbaeɛ. Wɔde me sane kɔdii me dibea, na ɔno deɛ, wɔsɛnee no.
Na Farao soma maa wɔkɔfrɛɛ Yosef, na wɔyɛɛ ntɛm yii no firii afiase hɔ; na ɔyii ne tirinwi, na ɔsakyeraa ne ntadeɛ, na ɔbaa Farao anim.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Maso daeɛ, nso obiara nni hɔ a ɔtumi kyerɛ aseɛ; na wo na mate wo nka sɛ, wote daeɛ a, wotumi kyerɛ aseɛ.
Na Yosef buaa Farao sɛ: Ɛnni me fam, na mmom Onyankopɔn na ɔmfa mmuaeɛ pa mma Farao.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Me daeɛ mu no, hwɛ, na megyina Asubɔntene Nil nsunoa.
Na hwɛ, anantwie nson a wɔn ho tua wɔn ho na wɔn ho yɛ fɛ firi nsuo no mu ba bɛdidii wɔ wiram hɔ.
Na hwɛ, anantwie nson foforɔ nso a wɔyɛ kanyaa na wɔn ho yɛ tane yie, na wɔafomfɔn a menhunuu wɔn ho tane no so bi wɔ Misraim asase nyinaa so da dii wɔn akyiri bae.
Na anantwie a wɔafomfɔn na wɔn ho yɛ tane no memenee kane anantwie nson a wɔadɔre no.
Na wɔduruu wɔn yafunu mu no, obi anhunu sɛ wɔaduru wɔn yafunu mu, na wɔn ho da so yɛ tane sɛ kane no ara. Ɛnna menyaneeɛ.
Na mehunuu wɔ me daeɛ mu sɛ ayuo mmɛtem nson a ɛtoatoa soɔ na abɔ ma refifiri nan korɔ so.
Na hwɛ, mmɛtem nson a ahoa na ɛyɛ ntraantraa na apueeɛ mframa ama no akusa dii akyire fifirii.
Na mmɛtem ntraantraa no memenee mmɛtem nson a ɛyɛ no. Na maka makyerɛ atwerɛfoɔ no, nso obiara antumi ankyerɛ me aseɛ.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ Farao sɛ: Farao daeɛ no yɛ bafua; Onyankopɔn rekyerɛ Farao deɛ ɔrebɛyɛ.
Anantwie pa nson no yɛ mfeɛ nson, na mmɛtem nson pa no nso yɛ mfeɛ nson; ɛyɛ daeɛ korɔ.
Na anantwie nson a wɔafomfɔn a wɔn ho yɛ tane a wɔdii wɔn akyiri baeɛ no ne mmɛtem nson nkorowankorowa a apueeɛ mframa akusa no bɛyɛ mfirinhyia nson kɔm.
Asɛm no te sɛ deɛ maka makyerɛ Farao no ara. Deɛ Onyankopɔn rebɛyɛ no na ɔde akyerɛ Farao yi:
Hwɛ, mfirinhyia nson reba a aduane bebree bɛba Misraim asase nyinaa soɔ.
Na ɛno akyiri no, ɛkɔm bɛba mfirinhyia nson ama nnipa werɛ afiri aduane bebrebe no nyinaa wɔ Misraim asase so, na ɛkɔm no bɛhye asase no.
Na ɛkɔm a ɛbɛdi akyire no nti wɔrenhunu asase no so aduane bebrebe no bio, ɛfiri sɛ ɛkɔm no mu bɛyɛ dendeenden.
Na daeɛ no a ɛyɛɛ mmɔho mmienu maa Farao no ase ne sɛ, Onyankopɔn ahyɛ saa adeɛ no ampa, na Onyankopɔn rebɛyɛ no ntɛmntɛm.
Na afei ma Farao nhwehwɛ onipa a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma ne onyansafoɔ mfa no nsi Misraim asase so.
Na Farao nyɛ yei, na ɔnsisi asase no so ahwɛfoɔ, na wɔnnyegye Misraim asase so aduane so ntotosoɔ nnum nnum mfeɛ nson a aduane bebree wɔ mu no mu.
Na ma wɔmmoaboa mfirinhyia pa a ɛrebɛba yi mu aduane nyinaa ano, na wɔmfa ayuo ngugu asan so sɛdeɛ Farao bɛhyɛ, na ɛnyɛ nkuro mu aduane, na wɔmfa nsie.
Na ayɛ aduane a wɔakora ama asase no de asie mfirinhyia nson kɔm a ɛbɛba Misraim asase soɔ no, na asase no ansɛe wɔ ɛkɔm no mu.
Na asɛm no sɔɔ Farao ne ne nkoa nyinaa ani.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: Yɛbɛtumi anya onipa bi a ɔte sɛ oyi a Nyankopɔn honhom wɔ ne mu yi anaa?
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Ɛnam sɛ Onyankopɔn de yei nyinaa akyerɛ woɔ yi, obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma ne onyansafoɔ sɛ woɔ.
Wobɛdi me fie so, na w’anomu asɛm so na me man nyinaa bɛdie, gye ahennwa nko so na mɛsene woɔ.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Hwɛ, mede wo masi Misraim asase nyinaa so.
Na Farao yii nsɔanokaa firii ne nsa de hyɛɛ Yosef nsa, na ɔhyɛɛ no nwera pa atadeɛ, na ɔde sika atweaban too ne kɔn mu.
Na ɔmaa no tenaa ne teaseɛnam a ɛtɔ so mmienu mu, na wɔteaa mu dii n’anim sɛ: Monkoto! Na ɔde no sii Misraim asase nyinaa so.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Mene Farao, na obiara renkwati wo nyɛ biribiara wɔ Misraim asase nyinaa so.
Na Farao frɛɛ Yosef Safnat-panea. Na ɔde On sɔfoɔ Potifera babaa Asnat maa no awareɛ.
Na Yosef kɔgyinaa Misraimhene Farao anim no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduasa. Na Yosef firii Farao anim hɔ kɔkyinii Misraim asase nyinaa so.
Na ahotɔ mfeɛ nson no mu no, aduane pii baa asase no so maa no buu so.
Na ɔboaboaa mfeɛ nson a ɛbaa Misraim asase soɔ no mu aduane nyinaa ano, na ɔde aduane no siee nkuro no mu; nkuraa a atwa ahyia no mu aduane na ɔde siee nkuro no mu.
Na Yosef boaboaa ayuo ano pii pa ara sɛ mpoano anwea de kɔsii sɛ wɔgyaee kan, ɛfiri sɛ na ɛnni ano.
Na wɔwoo mma baanu maa Yosef ansa na ɛkɔm mfirinhyia no reduro; wɔn na On sɔfoɔ Potifera ba Asnat wo maa no.
Na Yosef too abakan no din Manase, ɛfiri sɛ ɔse: Onyankopɔn ama me werɛ afiri m’amaneɛ ne m’agya fie nyinaa.
Na ɔtoo deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no din Efraim, ɛfiri sɛ ɔse: Onyankopɔn ama madɔ wɔ m’amanehunu asase yi so.
Na ahotɔ a ɛbaa Misraim asase so mfeɛ nson no to twae.
Na ɛkɔm mfeɛ nson no firii aseɛ bae, sɛdeɛ Yosef kaeɛ no, na ɛkɔm baa nsase nyinaa so na Misraim asase nyinaa so deɛ, na aduane wɔ hɔ.
Na ɛberɛ a ɛkɔm kaa Misraim asase nyinaa no, na ɔman no kɔsu kɔm kyerɛ Farao. Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Misraim nyinaa sɛ: Monkɔ Yosef nkyɛn, deɛ ɔbɛka akyerɛ mo no, monyɛ.
Na ɛkɔm no baa asase no so nyinaa. Na Yosef buebuee aduanekora adan no nyinaa, na ɔtɔnee aburoo maa Misraimfoɔ no, na ɛkɔm no mu yɛɛ den Misraim asase so.
Na aman nyinaa baa Misraim bɛtɔɔ aduane wɔ Yosef nkyɛn, ɛfiri sɛ ɛkɔm no mu yɛɛ den wɔ asase no nyinaa so.
Na Yakob hunuu sɛ aduane wɔ Misraim no, ɔka kyerɛɛ ne mmammarima no sɛ: Adɛn na mohwehwɛ mo ho anim yi?
Na ɔse: Monhwɛ, mate sɛ aduane wɔ Misraim. Monsiane nkɔ hɔ nkɔtɔ bi wɔ hɔ mmrɛ yɛn, na yɛntena ase, na yɛanwu.
Ɛnna Yosef nuanom mu du siane kɔɔ Misraim aduanetɔ.
Na Yosef nua Benyamin deɛ, Yakob ansoma no anka ne nuanom no ho ankɔ, na ɔse: Ebia na mmusuo bi ato no.
Na Israel mma no de wɔn ho fraa wɔn a wɔbaa aduanetɔ no mu, ɛfiri sɛ na ɛkɔm no aba Kanaan asase so bi.
Na Yosef ne asase no so tumfoɔ, ɔne deɛ ɔtɔn aduane ma asase no sofoɔ nyinaa. Na Yosef nuanom ba bɛkotoo no de wɔn anim butubutuu fam.
Na Yosef ani bɔɔ ne nuanom no anim no, ɔhunuu wɔn, nanso ɔyɛɛ ne ho sɛ ɔnanani wɔ wɔn anim, na ɔpoopoo n’ani kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Ɛhe na mofiri baeɛ? Na wɔse: Yɛfiri Kanaan asase so na yɛbaa aduanetɔ.
Na Yosef hunuu ne nuanom no; na wɔn deɛ, wɔanhu no.
Na Yosef kaee daeɛ a ɔsosoo no wɔn ho no; na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Moyɛ akwansrafoɔ, asase yi adagya na morebɛhwehwɛ.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Dabi, me wura, na aduanetɔ na wo nkoa baeɛ.
Yɛn nyinaa yɛ ɔbarima baako mma, yɛyɛ anokwafoɔ, wo nkoa nyɛ akwansrafoɔ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Dabi, na asase yi adagya na moreba abɛhwehwɛ.
Ɛnna wɔse: Wo nkoa yɛ anuanom dummienu. Yɛyɛ ɔbarima baako mma wɔ Kanaan asase so, na hwɛ, ɔkaakyire no wɔ yɛn agya nkyɛn nnɛ, na ɔbaako deɛ ɔnni hɔ.
Ɛnna Yosef ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ ɛteɛ ara ne sɛ meka mekyerɛɛ mo sɛ: Moyɛ akwansrafoɔ.
Yei ho na mɛsɔ mo ahwɛ: Sɛ Farao te aseɛ yi, moremfiri ha nkɔ gye sɛ mo nua kumaa no ba ha ansa.
Monsoma mo mu baako, na ɔnkɔfa mo nua no mmra, na mo deɛ, mongu afiase na wɔnhwehwɛ mo nsɛm mu, sɛ nokorɛ wɔ mu a; anyɛ saa deɛ a, sɛ Farao te aseɛ yi, moyɛ akwansrafoɔ.
Na ɔde wɔn kɔguu afiase mu nnansa.
Na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, Yosef ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monyɛ yei, na montena ase, na me deɛ, mesuro Onyankopɔn.
Sɛ moyɛ anokwafoɔ a, momma wɔnkyere mo nuanom yi mu baako ntena mo nnedua fie ha, na mo deɛ, ɛkɔm a ɛwɔ mo afie mu nti, monsoa aduane nkɔ.
Na momfa mo nua kumaa no mmrɛ me, na mo nsɛm ayɛ nokorɛ, na moanwu. Na wɔyɛɛ saa.
Na Ruben buaa wɔn sɛ: Manka ankyerɛ mo sɛ: Monnyɛ abɔfra no bɔne biara, na moantie? Na hwɛ, ne mogya na wɔrehwehwɛ yi.
Na wɔnnim sɛ Yosef te, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkyeame na ɔdi wɔn ntam yi wɔn ano.
Na ɔdanee ne ho firii wɔn nkyɛn kɔsui. Na ɔsane baa wɔn nkyɛn bio ne wɔn bɛkasae, na ɔyii Simeon wɔ wɔn mu, na ɔkyekyeree no wɔn anim hɔ ara.
Ɛnna Yosef hyɛɛ sɛ wɔmfa aburoo nhyehyɛ wɔn nkotokuo mama, na wɔnnane wɔn mu biara dwetɛ nhyɛ ne kotokuo mu, na wɔmma wɔn akwan so aduane. Na wɔyɛɛ wɔn saa.
Na wɔde wɔn aburoo no soasoaa wɔn mfunumu, na wɔfirii hɔ kɔe.
Na wɔn mu baako buee ne kotokuo ano sɛ ɔrema n’afunumu aduane wɔ asoɛeɛ no, ɔhunui, na hwɛ, na ne dwetɛ no hyɛ ne kotokuo ano.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom sɛ: Wɔadane me dwetɛ no ama me, na hwɛ, ɛhyɛ me kotokuo mu. Na wɔn akoma tutui, na wɔde ahopopoɔ sesee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na Onyankopɔn ayɛ yɛn yi?
Na wɔbaa wɔn agya Yakob nkyɛn Kanaan asase so, na wɔkaa deɛ ɛyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa kyerɛɛ no sɛ:
Ɔbarima a ɔyɛ asase no wura no poopoo n’ani kasa kyerɛɛ yɛn, na ɔbuu yɛn asase no so akwansrafoɔ.
Na yɛsee no sɛ: Yɛyɛ anokwafoɔ, yɛnyɛ akwansrafoɔ.
Yɛyɛ yɛn agya mma anuanom dummienu, ɔbaako na ɔnni hɔ, na akumaa no wɔ yɛn agya nkyɛn wɔ Kanaan asase so seesei.
Na ɔbarima a ɔyɛ asase no wura no ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ: Yei na mede bɛhunu sɛ moyɛ anokwafoɔ: Monnya mo nua baako wɔ me nkyɛn, na momfa aduane nkɔ nkɔhwɛ mo afiafi,
na momfa mo nua kumaa no mmrɛ me, na mahunu sɛ monyɛ akwansrafoɔ, na moyɛ anokwafoɔ, na mayi mo nua no ama mo, na moadi asase yi so dwa.
Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔreyiyi wɔn nkotokuo mu adeɛ no, na hwɛ, wɔn mu biara dwetɛ boa hyɛ ne kotokuo mu. Na wɔne wɔn agya hunuu wɔn dwetɛ mmoa no, wɔsuroe.
Na wɔn agya Yakob ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Moagye me nsam mma: Yosef nni hɔ, Simeon nni hɔ, na morebɛfa Benyamin nso akɔ. Me so na yei nyinaa ba!
Na Ruben ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: Sɛ mamfa no mansane mammrɛ wo a, kum me mmammarima baanu. Fa no hyɛ me nsa, na mede no bɛsane abrɛ wo.
Na ɔse: Me ba ne mo renkɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ne nua awu, na aka ɔno nko, na sɛ mmusuo bi kɔto no wɔ kwan a morekorɔ no mu a, ɛnneɛ mode me dwono bɛkɔ Asamando awerɛhoɔ mu.
Na ɛkɔm no mu yɛɛ den wɔ asase no so.
Na wɔwiee aduane a wɔde firi Misraim baeɛ no die no, wɔn agya ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monsane nkɔtɔ aduane kakra mmrɛ yɛn.
Na Yuda ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɔbarima no hyɛɛ yɛn ketee sɛ: Sɛ mo nua no nka mo ho a, monnsi m’anim.
Na sɛ worema yɛn nua ne yɛn akɔ a, ɛnneɛ yɛbɛsiane akɔtɔ aduane abrɛ wo.
Na sɛ woremma no nkɔ a, ɛnneɛ yɛrensiane nkɔ hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbarima no ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ: Sɛ mo nua no nka mo ho a, monsi m’anim.
Na Israel kaa sɛ: Adɛn nti na moyɛ me bɔne seyie, sɛ moka kyerɛɛ ɔbarima no sɛ mowɔ nua bie?

Na wɔse: Bisa na ɔbarima no bisaa yɛn, yɛn ne yɛn abusua ho asɛm sɛ: Mo agya da so te ase anaa? Mowɔ nua bi anaa? Deɛ ɔbisabisaeɛ yi ara na yɛbuaeɛ. Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ahunu sɛ ɔbɛbisa yɛn sɛ: Momfa mo nua mmra?
Na Yuda ka kyerɛɛ n’agya Israel sɛ: Ma abɔfra no ne me nkɔ, na yɛnsim nkɔ, na yɛne wo ne yɛn mma atena ase, na yɛanwu.
Medi ne ho agyinamu; me nsam na hwehwɛ no. Sɛ mamfa no mammrɛ wo ammɛgyina w’anim a, ɛnneɛ mayɛ wo bɔne daa nyinaa.
Sɛ yɛantwentwɛn a, anka sɛsɛɛ yɛakɔ aba mprenu.

Na wɔn agya Israel ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ ɛte saa a, ɛnneɛ monyɛ yei: Momfa asase yi so nnepa ngu mo adeɛ mu, na momfa ayɛyɛdeɛ nkɔma ɔbarima no, akyenkyennuro kakra, ɛwoɔ kakra, ohwam, kurobo, nkateɛ ne sorɔno aba nkɔma ɔbarima no.
Na momfa dwetɛ foforɔ nkura, ne dwetɛ a wɔdane maa mo wɔ mo nkotokuo ano no, monkura nsane nkɔ; ebia ɛyɛ anifasoɔ.
Na momfa mo nua no, na monsim nsane nkɔ ɔbarima no nkyɛn.
Na Onyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn mma ɔbarima no nhu mo mmɔbɔ, na ɔnnyaa mo nua no ne Benyamin mma mo. Na me deɛ, me mma firi me nsa a, na wɔafiri me nsa!
Na mmarima no faa ayɛyɛdeɛ no, na wɔfaa dwetɛ mmɔho kurae ne Benyamin, na wɔsɔre siane kɔɔ Misraim kɔgyinaa Yosef anim.
Na Yosef hunuu Benyamin sɛ ɔka wɔn ho no, ɔka kyerɛɛ ne fie panin sɛ: Fa nnipa yi kɔ fie, na kum mmoa siesie yɛ aduane, na nnipa yi ne me rebɛdidi awia yi.
Na ɔbarima no yɛɛ sɛdeɛ Yosef kaeɛ no, na ɔde nnipa no kɔɔ Yosef fie.
Na nnipa no suroo sɛ wɔde wɔn akɔ Yosef fie, na wɔkaa sɛ: Dwetɛ a ɛsane kekaa yɛn nkotokuo mu kane no nti na wɔde yɛn aba ha yi, na wabɛtoa yɛn ato ahyɛ yɛn so afa yɛn ne yɛn mfunumu ayɛ nkoa.
Na wɔtwe pinii Yosef fie panin no ne no kasae wɔ efie no pono ano
sɛ: Owura, yɛpa wo kyɛw, yɛsiane baa ha kane bɛtɔɔ aduane.
Na yɛkɔduruu asoɛeɛ na yɛsanesanee yɛn nkotokuo ano no, na hwɛ, yɛn nyinaa dwetɛ hyehyɛ yɛn nkotokuo ano, yɛn dwetɛ sɛdeɛ wɔkariiɛ no pɛ, na yɛkura de asane aba.
Nso yɛkura dwetɛ foforɔ aba de rebɛtɔ aduane. Yɛnnim onii ko a ɔde yɛn dwetɛ no hyehyɛɛ yɛn nkotokuo no mu.
Na ɔse: Asomdwoeɛ nka mo, monnsuro. Mo Nyankopɔn ne mo agya Nyankopɔn ama mo mo nkotokuo mu ademudeɛ, mo dwetɛ no kaa me nsa. Na ɔyii Simeon brɛɛ wɔn.
Na ɔbarima no de nnipa no hyɛnee Yosef fie, na ɔmaa wɔn nsuo hohoroo wɔn nan ho, na ɔmaa wɔn mfunumu aduane.
Na wɔsiesiee ayɛyɛdeɛ no twɛn ba a Yosef bɛba awigyina no, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔate sɛ wɔrebɛdidi hɔ.
Na Yosef baa fie no, wɔde ayɛyɛdeɛ a wɔkura no kɔɔ ɛdan mu kɔmaa no, na wɔkotoo fam wɔ n’anim.
Na Yosef bisaa wɔn sɛ wɔn ho yɛ anaa; na ɔse: Mo agya akɔkoraa a mokaa ne ho asɛm no ho yɛ anaa? Ɔda so te ase anaa?
Na wɔse: W’akoa, yɛn agya no ho yɛ, ɔda so te ase. Na wɔbobɔɔ wɔn mu ase kotoo no.
Na ɔmaa n’ani so hunuu ne nua Benyamin, ne na ba no, ɔbisaa sɛ: Mo nua kumaa a mokaa me ne ho asɛm no ni anaa? Na ɔse: Onyankopɔn nnom wo, me ba.
Na Yosef yɛɛ no ntɛm, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔnhunu deɛ ɔnyɛ wɔ ne nua no ho, na na ɔrehwehwɛ baabi akɔsu, na ɔhyɛnee ne pia mu kɔsuu wɔ hɔ.
Na ɔhohoroo n’anim, na ɔfirii adi, na ɔhyɛɛ ne ho so kaa sɛ: Momfa aduane mmɛsisi hɔ.
Na wɔde ne deɛ sii fa, na wɔde wɔn deɛ sisii fa, na wɔde Misraimfoɔ a wɔne no redidie no deɛ sisii fa, ɛfiri sɛ Misraimfoɔ ne Hebrifoɔ ntumi nnidi, na Misraimfoɔ kyi.
Na wɔbɛtenatenaa n’anim, ɔpanin sɛdeɛ ne panin teɛ, ne akumaa sɛdeɛ n’akumaa teɛ, na ɛyɛɛ nnipa no nyinaa nwanwa.
Na wɔgyegyee aduane no firii n’anim brɛɛ wɔn, na Benyamin deɛ boroo wɔn nyinaa deɛ so mprenum. Na wɔnonnomee, na wɔne no ani gyee.
Na Yosef hyɛɛ ne fie panin no sɛ: Fa aduane dodoɔ a wɔbɛtumi asoa hyehyɛ nnipa no nkotokuo mu amaama. Fa wɔn mu biara dwetɛ hyɛ ne kotokuo ano,
na fa me kuruwa, mekyerɛ dwetɛ kuruwa no, hyɛ akumaa no kotokuo ano ka n’aburoo dwetɛ no ho. Na ɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ Yosef kaeɛ no.
Adeɛ kyeeɛ ara pɛ, na wɔgyaa mmarima no ne wɔn mfunumu kwan.
Wɔfirii kuro no mu kɔeɛ na wɔnnya nnuruu akyirikyiri no, Yosef ka kyerɛɛ ne fie panin no sɛ: Sɔre, ti mmarima no, na sɛ woto wɔn a, ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na mode bɔne tua papa ka?
Ɛnyɛ yei na me wura nom mu na ɔde yɛ ne nyankomadeɛ anaa? Deɛ moayɛ yi, moayɛ bɔne.
Na ɔkɔtoo wɔn no, ɔkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Adɛn nti na me wura ka saa nsɛm yi? Ɛmpare wo nkoa sɛ wɔbɛyɛ saa adeɛ yi.
Hwɛ, dwetɛ a yɛhunuu no yɛn nkotokuo ano no, yɛde asane afiri Kanaan asase so abrɛ wo; na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛbɛwia wo wura fie dwetɛ anaa sika?
Wo nkoa yi mu deɛ wobɛhunu no ne nkyɛn no, ma no nwu, na yɛn nso yɛbɛyɛ me wura nkoa.
Na ɔse: Ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ moseɛ no. Na deɛ wɔbɛhunu no ne nkyɛn no nyɛ m’akoa, na mo deɛ, mobɛdi bem.
Ɛnna wɔn nyinaa yɛɛ ntɛm soɛsoɛɛ wɔn nkotokuo totoo fam, na wɔsanesanee wɔn nkotokuo ano.
Na ɔhwehwɛe, ɔfirii aseɛ firi ɔpanin no deɛ so de kɔsii akumaa no deɛ so. Na wɔhunuu kuruwa no wɔ Benyamin kotokuo mu.
Ɛnna wɔsunsuanee wɔn ntadeɛ mu, na wɔde wɔn nnesoa soasoaa wɔn mfunumu sane kɔɔ kuro no mu.
Na Yuda ne ne nuanom baa Yosef fie, na ɔda so wɔ hɔ, na wɔhwehwee n’anim ase.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Ɛdeɛn adeɛ na moayɛ yi? Monnim sɛ onipa a ɔte sɛ me nim nkɔmhyɛ anaa?
Na Yuda kaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na yɛnse me wura? Na ɛdeɛn na yɛnka? Na yɛnyi yɛn ano sɛn? Onyankopɔn ahunu wo nkoa amumuyɛ. Hwɛ, yɛyɛ me wura nkoa, yɛne deɛ wɔhunuu ne nsam kuruwa no.
Na ɔse: Ɛmpare me sɛ meyɛ saa. Na deɛ wɔhunuu kuruwa no wɔ ne nsa mu no, ɔno ara na ɔbɛyɛ m’akoa, na mo deɛ, monsim mfa asomdwoeɛ nkɔ mo agya nkyɛn.
Ɛnna Yuda twe pinii no kaa sɛ: Me wura, mesrɛ wo, ma w’akoa nkasa me wura aso mu, na mma wo bo mmfu w’akoa, na wote sɛ Farao ara.
Me wura bisaa ne nkoa sɛ: Mowɔ agya anaa nua bi?
Na yɛka kyerɛɛ me wura sɛ: Yɛwɔ agya akɔkoraa ne ne nkɔkoraa ba kumaa bi. Ne nua awu, na ne na ba a aka ara ne no, na n’agya dɔ no.
Na woka kyerɛɛ wo nkoa sɛ: Momfa no mmrɛ me, na memfa m’ani menhwɛ no.
Na yɛsee me wura sɛ: Abɔfra no ntumi nnya n’agya hɔ, na sɛ ɔgya n’agya hɔ a, n’agya bɛwu.
Na wosee wo nkoa sɛ: Sɛ mo nua kumaa no anka mo ho amma a, monnsi m’anim bio.
Na yɛkɔɔ w’akoa, m’agya, nkyɛn no, yɛkaa me wura nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no.
Na yɛn agya ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ: Monsane nkɔtɔ aduane kakra mmrɛ yɛn.
Na yɛse: Yɛrentumi nsiane nkɔ. Sɛ yɛn nua kumaa no ka yɛn ho a, yɛbɛsiane akɔ. Yɛrentumi nkɔ ɔbarima no anim, gye sɛ yɛn nua kumaa no ka yɛn ho.
Ɛnna w’akoa, yɛn agya, ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ: Mo ara monim sɛ mma baanu na me yere wo maa me.
Na ɔbaako firii me nkyɛn kɔe, na mese: Ampa ara teteɛ na wɔatete no mu, na ɛfiri hɔ no, menhunuu no.
Na sɛ mofa oyi nso firi me nkyɛn na mmusuo bi kɔto no a, mode me tiri dwono nam awerɛhoɔ mu na ɛbɛkɔ Asamando.
Na afei sɛ mekɔ w’akoa, m’agya, nkyɛn na abɔfra yi nka yɛn ho a, — nso n’akoma da abɔfra yi ho, —
ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ ɔhunu sɛ abɔfra yi nka yɛn ho a, ɔbɛwu, na wo nkoa de w’akoa, yɛn agya, dwono nam awerɛhoɔ mu na ɛbɛkɔ Asamando.
Na w’akoa dii abɔfra yi ho agyinamu wɔ m’agya anim sɛ: Sɛ mamfa no mammrɛ wo a, ɛnneɛ na mayɛ m’agya bɔne daa nyinaa.
Na afei mesrɛ wo, ma w’akoa ntena ha nsi abɔfra no ananmu nyɛ me wura akoa, na ma abɔfra no ne ne nuanom nkɔ.
Na sɛ abɔfra no nka me ho a, mɛkɔ m’agya anim sɛn? Ɛnneɛ na merekɔhunu bɔne a ɛbɛto m’agya no.

Afei na Yosef ntumi nhyɛ ne ho so wɔ wɔn a wɔgyinagyina ne ho no nyinaa anim, na ɔteaa mu sɛ: Momma nnipa nyinaa mfiri me ho mfiri adi. Na Yosef reyi ne ho adie akyerɛ ne nuanom no, na onipa biara nnyina ne nkyɛn.
Na ɔmaa ne nne so sui, na Misraimfoɔ no ne Farao fiefoɔ tee.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom sɛ: Mene Yosef, m’agya da so te ase anaa? Na ne nuanom antumi ammua no, na mmom wɔn ho dwirii wɔn wɔ n’anim.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom sɛ: Montwe mpini me. Na wɔtwe pinii no. Na ɔse: Mene mo nua Yosef a motɔn no baa Misraim no.
Na mfeɛ mmienu ni a ɛkɔm aba asase yi soɔ, na aka mfeɛ nnum bio a funtum ne otwa nni mu.
Na Onyankopɔn somaa me dii mo anim sɛ memma monnya nkaeɛ wɔ asase so, na mennye mo nkwa a ɛbɛma dodoɔ no ara afiri mu afire.
Na afei ɛnyɛ mo na mosomaa me baa ha, na mmom Onyankopɔn na ɔde me abɛyɛ sɛ Farao n’agya ne ne fie nyinaa wura ne Misraim asase nyinaa sodifoɔ.
Monyɛ ntɛm nkɔ m’agya nkyɛn nkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ: Sɛ wo ba Yosef seɛ nie: Onyankopɔn de me ayɛ Misraim nyinaa so wura. Siane bra me nkyɛn. Nkyɛ!
Na bɛtena Gosen asase so, na woabɛn me, wo ne wo mma ne wo nananom ne wo nnwan ne w’anantwie ne deɛ wowɔ nyinaa,
na mɛhwɛ wo wɔ hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ mfeɛ nnum kɔm da so reba, na ohia anhia wo ne wo fiefoɔ ne deɛ wowɔ nyinaa.
Na hwɛ, mo ani ahunu, na me nua Benyamin nso ani ahunu sɛ m’ano na mede mekasa mekyerɛ mo yi.
Na monka m’animuonyam a mewɔ wɔ Misraim nyinaa nkyerɛ m’agya ne deɛ moahunu nyinaa, na monyɛ ntɛm mfa m’agya nsiane mmra ha.
Ɛnna ɔsɔɔ ne nua Benyamin kɔn mu na ɔsuiɛ; na Benyamin nso sui wɔ ne kɔn ho.
Na ɔfefee ne nuanom nyinaa ano, na ɔsuu wɔ wɔn so, na ɛno akyiri no ne nuanom no ne no kasae.
Na wɔtee nka wɔ Farao fie sɛ: Yosef nuanom aba. Na ɛsɔɔ Farao ne ne nkoa ani.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Ka kyerɛ wo nuanom sɛ: Yei na monyɛ: Momfa nnoɔma nsoasoa mo mmoa no, na monkɔ Kanaan asase so
nkɔfa mo agya ne mo fiefoɔ mmra me nkyɛn, na mɛma mo Misraim asase so deɛ ɛyɛ, na moadi asase no sradeɛ.
Ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Yei na monyɛ. Momfa nteaseɛnam mfiri Misraim asase so nkɔma mo mma ne mo yerenom, na monkɔfa mo agya mmra.
Na mo nso monnwennwene mo nnoɔma ho, na Misraim asase nyinaa so deɛ ɛyɛ yɛ mo dea.
Na Israel mma no yɛɛ saa. Na Yosef maa wɔn nteaseɛnam sɛdeɛ Farao anomu asɛm seɛ, na ɔmaa wɔn akwansoduane.
Ɔmaa wɔn nyinaa ntadeɛ nsakyeraho mmaako mmaako, na Benyamin deɛ, ɔmaa no nnwetɛbena ahasa ne ntadeɛ nsakyeraho nnum.
Na deɛ ɔde kɔmaa n’agya nso nie: Mfunumu du a wɔsoso Misraim nnepa no bie ne mfunumubereɛ du a wɔsoso aburoo ne paanoo ne akwansoduane a ɛbɛyɛ n’agya dea.
Na ɔgyaa ne nuanom kwan maa wɔkɔe. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Mo bo nnkɔfu mo ho mo ho wɔ ɔkwan so oo!
Ɛnna wɔfirii Misraim foro kɔɔ Kanaan asase so wɔn agya Yakob nkyɛn,
na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yosef da so te ase, na ɔdi Misraim asase nyinaa so. Na ne tirim yɛɛ no naa, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔnnye wɔn nni.
Na wɔkaa nsɛm a Yosef aka akyerɛ wɔn no nyinaa kyerɛɛ no, na ɔhunuu nteaseɛnam a Yosef asoma de rebɛfa no no, wɔn agya Yakob ho sanee no.
Na Israel kaa sɛ: Ɛdɔɔso, me ba Yosef da so te ase. Mɛkɔ makɔhu no ansa na mawu.
Na Onyankopɔn nam anadwo anisoadehunu mu ka kyerɛɛ Israel sɛ: Yakob, Yakob! Na ɔse: Menie.
Na ɔse: Mene Onyankopɔn, w’agya Nyankopɔn no. Nsuro sɛ wobɛsiane akɔ Misraim, na mɛyɛ wo ɔman kɛseɛ wɔ hɔ.
Me ne wo bɛsiane akɔ Misraim, na mede wo asane aba nso, na Yosef deɛ, ne nsa so na wo bɛwuo.
Na Yakob sii mu firii Beer-seba; na Israel mma de wɔn agya Yakob ne wɔn mma ne wɔn yerenom tenatenaa nteaseɛnam a Farao soma maa wɔde kɔfaa no no mu.
Na wɔfaa wɔn mmoa ne wɔn ahodeɛ a wɔanya wɔ Kanaan asase soɔ no kɔɔ Misraim, Yakob ne n’asefoɔ nyinaa,
ne mmammarima ne ne mmammarima mma ne ne mmammaa ne ne mmammarima mmammaa ne n’asefoɔ nyinaa, na ɔne wɔn kɔɔ Misraim.
Na Ruben mmammarima ne: Hanok, Palu, Hesron ne Karmi.
Na Simeon mmammarima ne: Yemuel, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, Sohar ne Kanaanni baa ba Saulo.
Na Lewi mmammarima ne: Gerson, Kohat ne Merari.
Na Yuda mmammarima ne: Er, Onan, Sela, Peres ne Sera; (na Er ne Onan wuu Kanaan asase so.) Na Peres mmammarima ne: Hesron ne Hamul.
Na Isakar mmammarima ne: Tola, Puwa, Hiob ne Simron.
Na Sebulon mmammarima ne: Sered, Elon ne Yakleel.
(Yeinom ne Lea mmammarima a ɔwo maa Yakob wɔ Mesopotamia ne ne babaa Dina, ne mmammarima ne ne mmammaa nyinaa yɛ akra aduasa mmiɛnsa.)
Na Gad mmammarima ne: Sifion, Hagi, Suni, Esbon, Eri, Arodi ne Areli.
Aser mmammarima ne: Yimna, Isua, Isui, Beria ne wɔn nuabaa Sera. Na Beria mmammarima ne: Heber ne Malkiel.
(Yeinom ne Silpa a Laban de no maa ne babaa Lea no mma a ɔwo maa Yakob, wɔyɛ akra dunsia.)
Yakob yere Rahel mmammarima ne: Yosef ne Benyamin.
Na Yosef mma a On sɔfoɔ Potifera babaa Asnat wo maa no Misraim asase soɔ ne: Manase ne Efraim.
Na Benyamin mmammarima ne: Bela, Beker, Asbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Ros, Mupim, Hupim ne Ard.
(Yeinom ne Rahel mma a wɔwo maa Yakob, akra no nyinaa yɛ dunan.)
Na Dan babarima ne: Husim.
Na Naftali mmammarima ne: Yahseel, Guni, Yeser ne Silem.
(Yeinom ne Bilha a Laban de no maa ne ba Rahel no mma a ɔwo maa Yakob, akra no nyinaa yɛ baason).
Akra a wɔne Yakob kɔɔ Misraim a wɔfiri n’asene mu, Yakob mma yerenom mfram, akra no nyinaa yɛ aduosia nsia.
Na Yosef mma a wɔwoo wɔn Misraim no yɛ akra baanu. Yakob fie akra a wɔbaa Misraim no nyinaa yɛ aduɔson.
Na Yosef siesiee ne nteaseɛnam kɔhyiaa n’agya Israel wɔ Gosen. Na ɔde ne ho kɔkyerɛɛ no no, ɔsɔɔ ne kɔn mu, na ɔsui ara kyɛree wɔ ne kɔn ho.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom ne n’agya fiefoɔ sɛ: Merekɔ makɔka akyerɛ Farao sɛ: Me nuanom ne m’agya fiefoɔ a wɔwɔ Kanaan asase soɔ no aba me nkyɛn.
Na nnipa no yɛ nnwanhwɛfoɔ, na mmoa na wɔyɛne, na wɔde wɔn nnwan ne wɔn anantwie ne deɛ wɔwɔ nyinaa aba.
Na sɛ Farao bɛfrɛ mo, na ɔbisa mo sɛ: Mo adwuma ne sɛn a?
Monse no sɛ: Wo nkoa yɛ mmoahwɛfoɔ firi yɛn mmɔfraase de bɛsi nnɛ, yɛn ne yɛn nananom, na moatena Gosen asase so, ɛfiri sɛ Misraimfoɔ kyiri mmoahwɛfoɔ nyinaa.
Na Yosef kɔka kyerɛɛ Farao sɛ: M’agya ne me nuanom ne wɔn nnwan ne wɔn anantwie ne deɛ wɔwɔ nyinaa firi Kanaan asase so aba, na hwɛ, wɔwɔ Gosen asase so.
Na ɔde ne nuanom mu baanum kɔgyinaa Farao anim.
Na Farao bisaa ne nuanom no sɛ: Mo adwuma ne sɛn? Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo nkoa yɛ mmoahwɛfoɔ, yɛn ne yɛn nananom nso.

Na wɔka kyerɛɛ Farao bio sɛ: Yɛaba sɛ yɛrebɛtena asase yi so, ɛfiri sɛ wo nkoa nnya adidibea mma wɔn nnwan, ɛfiri sɛ ɛkɔm no mu yɛ den wɔ Kanaan asase so. Enti afei yɛsrɛ wo, ma wo nkoa ntena Gosen asase so.
Na Farao ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: W’agya ne wo nuanom aba wo nkyɛn.
Misraim asase na ɛda w’anim yi, asase no mu deɛ ɛyɛ no, ma w’agya ne wo nuanom ntena hɔ. Ma wɔntena Gosen asase so. Na sɛ wonim sɛ wɔn mu bi yɛ nsiyɛfoɔ a, fa wɔn si me mmoa a mewɔ so.
Na Yosef de n’agya Yakob kɔgyinaa Farao anim. Na Yakob hyiraa Farao.
Na Farao bisaa Yakob sɛ: Wo nkwa mu mfirinhyia yɛ ahe?

Na Yakob ka kyerɛɛ Farao sɛ: Me hɔhobea asetena mfirinhyia mu nna yɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduasa; me nkwa mfirinhyia mu nna yɛ kakraa bi ne amaneɛ nko, ɛnnuru me nananom nkwa mfirinhyia mu nna wɔ wɔn hɔhobea asetena nna mu.
Na Yakob hyiraa Farao, na ɔfirii Farao anim kɔe.
Na Yosef maa n’agya ne ne nuanom tenaberɛ, na ɔmaa wɔn asase wɔ Misraim wɔ deɛ asase no yɛ, wɔ Rameses asase so, sɛdeɛ Farao hyɛeɛ no.
Na Yosef bɔɔ n’agya ne ne nuanom ne n’agya fiefoɔ nyinaa akɔnhoma, sɛdeɛ abusua biara dodoɔ teɛ.
Na aduane nni asase biara so, na ɛkɔm no mu yɛɛ den yie maa Misraim asase ne Kanaan asase tɔɔ ɛkɔm no anim piti.
Na Yosef prapraa sika a ɛwɔ Misraim asase ne Kanaan asase soɔ nyinaa wɔ aburoo a wɔbɛtɔeɛ no mu, na Yosef de sika no kɔɔ Farao fie.
Na sika saa Misraimfoɔ ne Kanaanfoɔ ho no, Misraimfoɔ nyinaa baa Yosef nkyɛn sɛ: Ma yɛn aduane ɛ! Adɛn na sɛ sika asa nti, yɛnwuwu w’anim?
Na Yosef se: Momfa mo mmoa mmra, na sɛ mo sika asa a, mɛma mo bi magye mo mmoa.
Na wɔde wɔn mmoa bae, na Yosef maa wɔn aduane gyegyee apɔnkɔ, nnwan, anantwie ne mfunumu. Na ɔmaa wɔn aduane de gyee wɔn mmoa nyinaa afirinhyia no.

Na afe no twaa mu no, afe a ɛdi soɔ no, wɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yɛremfa nhunta me wura sɛ yɛn sika asa na mmoa akuakuo no yɛ me wura dea, na biribiara nkae wɔ me wura anim sɛ yɛn honam ne yɛn asase nko.
Adɛn nti na yɛn ne yɛn asase nwu w’anim? Tɔ yɛn ne yɛn asase, na ma yɛn aduane, na yɛde yɛn ho ne yɛn asase bɛsom Farao. Ma yɛn aduaba, na yɛntena ase, na yɛanwu amma asase yi anna mpan.
Na Yosef tɔɔ Misraim asase nyinaa maa Farao. Na Misraimfoɔ nyinaa tontɔnee wɔn mfuo, ɛfiri sɛ ɛkɔm no denee wɔn, na asase no danee Farao dea.
Na nkurɔfoɔ no deɛ, ɔdanee wɔn nkoa,
Gye asɔfoɔ nsase nko na wantɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na Farao ahyɛ kyɛfa bi ama asɔfoɔ no, na wɔdi wɔn kyɛfa a Farao de ma wɔn no nti, wɔantɔn wɔn asase.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no sɛ: Monhwɛ, ɛnnɛ matɔ mo ne mo asase mama Farao, na hwɛ, mo aduaba a momfa nkɔdua asase no soɔ nie.
Na deɛ ɛbɛsoɔ no, momfa nkyekyɛmu nnum mu baako mma Farao, na emu abupɛn nnan no nyɛ mo dea, na mode bi adua mfuo mu, na mode bi ayɛ mo ne mo fiefoɔ ne mo mma aduane.
Na wɔse: Woagye yɛn nkwa; ma yɛnnya me wura anim adom ara, na yɛbɛyɛ Farao nkoa.
Na Yosef hyɛɛ yei ho mmara wɔ Misraim a ɛwɔ hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ, sɛ wɔmfa Misraim asase so adeɛ biara nkyekyɛmu nnum mu baako mma Farao, gye asɔfoɔ asase nko na anyɛ Farao dea.
Na Yakob tenaa Misraim asase so mfeɛ dunson, na Yakob nna, ne nkwa mfirinhyia, yɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduanan nson.
Ɛda a mɛtoa nananom no, soa me firi Misraim kɔsie me wɔ me nananom amusieeɛ. Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Mɛyɛ sɛdeɛ woaka yi.
Na ɔse: Ka me ntam. Na ɔkaa no ntam. Na Israel bɔɔ ne mu ase kyerɛɛ mpa no atifi.
Na nsɛm yi akyiri no, wɔka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Hwɛ, w’agya yare. Na ɔfaa ne mmabarima baanu, Manase ne Efraim kaa ne ho.
Na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ Yakob sɛ: Hwɛ, wo ba Yosef reba wo nkyɛn. Na Israel miaa n’ani tenaa ne mpa so.
ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ, mɛma woadɔ, na mama woadɔɔso, mɛyɛ wo aman asafo, na mede asase yi bɛma w’asefoɔ a wɔbɛdi w’akyire no sɛ daa agyapadeɛ.
Na wo mma a wobɛnya wɔn wɔ wɔn akyiri no na ɛnyɛ wo dea, na wɔde wɔn nuanom din bɛfrɛ wɔn wɔ wɔn agyapadeɛ mu.
Na Israel hunuu Yosef mma no, ɔkaa sɛ: Hwannom nie?
Na enyini nti, na Israel ani so ayɛ no kusukusu a ɔnhunu adeɛ yie. Na ɔde wɔn pinii ne nkyɛn; na ɔfee wɔn ano yɛɛ wɔn atuu.
Na Israel ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Mansusu sɛ mɛhunu w’anim, na hwɛ, Onyankopɔn ama mahunu wo mma nso.
Na Yosef yii wɔn firii Yakob nantam, na ɔponoo ne mu de n’anim butuu fam.
Na Yosef faa wɔn baanu nyinaa de ne nifa sɔɔ Efraim mu de no kyerɛɛ Israel benkum, de ne benkum sɔɔ Manase mu de no kyerɛɛ Israel nifa, na ɔde wɔn pinii ne nkyɛn.
Na Israel tenee ne nifa too Efraim a ɔyɛ akumaa no atifi, ne ne benkum too Manase atifi, ɔboapa na ɔyɛɛ ne nsa saa, ɛfiri sɛ Manase ne abakan.
Na ɔhyiraa Yosef sɛ:
Onyankopɔn a me nananom Abraham ne Isak nantee n’anim no,
Onyankopɔn a wayɛne me me nkwa nna nyinaa de abɛsi nnɛ.
na wɔmfa me din ne me nananom Abraham ne Isak din mfrɛ wɔn,
na wɔnnɔɔso nyɛ pii wɔ asase so.
Na Yosef hunuu sɛ n’agya de ne nsa nifa ato Efraim atifi no, anyɛ no dɛ, na ɔsɔɔ n’agya nsa sɛ ɔnyi mfiri Efraim atifi nkɔto Manase atifi.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: M’agya, ɛnyɛ sɛ ɛteɛ ne no, na oyi ne abakan, fa wo nifa to n’atifi.
Na n’agya ampene, na ɔse: Menim, me ba, menim; ɔno nso bɛyɛ ɔman, na ɔno nso ayɛ kɛse, nanso ne nua kumaa no bɛso asene no, na n’asefoɔ bɛyɛ aman pii.
Na ɛda no ɔhyiraa wɔn sɛ:
Wo na Israel de wo bɛhyira sɛ:
Onyankopɔn nyɛ wo sɛ Efraim ne Manase.
Na ɔde Efraim dii Manase kan.
Na Israel ka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: Hwɛ, merewu, na Onyankopɔn bɛdi mo akyi, na ɔde mo asane akɔ mo nananom asase so.
Na me deɛ, mama wo asase kɛseɛ bi a ɛboro wo nuanom deɛ soɔ a mede me nkrantɛ ne me tadua megyee no Amorifoɔ nsam.
Na Yakob frɛɛ ne mma sɛ: Mommoaboa mo ano, na menka mo deɛ ɛbɛyɛ mo, nna a ɛdi akyire no mu.
Yakob mma, monhyia na montie,
montie mo agya Israel!
m’ahoɔden ne me mmaninyɛ asefire.
Woboro so anidie mu, woboro so tumi mu.
ɛfiri sɛ woforoo w’agya nnaeɛ.
Ɛno mu na woguu ɛho fi, — me mpa na woforoeɛ!
Simeon ne Lewi yɛ anuanom.
Wɔn nkrantɛ yɛ aniɛden akodeɛ.
na m’animuonyam nkɔfra wɔn asafo mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn abufuo mu na wɔkum nnipa,
na wɔn ahokyerɛ mu na wɔsɛee anantwie.
ne wɔn anibereɛ, sɛ emu yɛ den.
Mɛkyekyɛ wɔn mu wɔ Yakob mu,
na mabɔ wɔn ahwete Israel mu.
wo nsa bɛtia w’atamfo kɔn so;
w’agya mma bɛkoto w’anim.
hanam so na wode anyini, me ba.
Ɔkotoe, ɔbutuu sɛ gyata ne gyatabereɛ;
hwan na ɔbɛhwanyan no?
na mmarahyɛ poma remfiri ne nan ntam
de kɔsi sɛ ɛsodifoɔ
a aman bɛyɛ setie ama no no bɛba.
ne n’afunumu bereɛ ba wɔ bobe pa mu.
Ɔsi n’atadeɛ wɔ nsa mu,
ne ne ntoma wɔ bobe aba mogya mu.
Bobesa bɛma n’ani ayɛ kɔɔ,
na nufosuo ama ne se ayɛ fitaa.
na wahwɛ deɛ ahyɛn gyinagyina,
na ɔne Sidon abɔ hyeɛ.
Isakar yɛ afunumu hoɔdenfoɔ,
ɔbutu mmoaban ntam;
na ɔhunu sɛ homebea no yɛ
ne asase no sɛ ɛyɛ fɛ,
na ɔbrɛ ne mmatiri ase de gye adesoa,
na ɔde ɛsom adwuma ayi toɔ.
sɛ Israel mmusuakuo mu biara.
Dan bɛyɛ ɔkwan so ɔwɔ,
tempɔn so ahuritia.
Ɔka ɔpɔnkɔ nantin,
na ne so tenafoɔ ahwe n’akyi.
Gad, asafo bi retoa no,
na ɔno nso atoa wɔn aka wɔn nantin.
na ɔbɛma ahennuane a ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ.
ɔka nsɛm dɛdɛ.
dua a ɛso aba wɔ nsuo aniwa soɔ mman;
ne mman tratra ɔfasuo.
Mmɛmmatofoɔ hyɛɛ no yea,
wɔtotoo no, na wɔtaa no.
Nanso na ne tadua kura no pintinn,
na ne basa mu yɛɛ den.
Ɛfiri Yakob Tumfoɔ no nsam,
ɛfiri ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔyɛ Israel botan no mu.
Ɛfiri w’agya Nyankopɔn, ɔmmoa wo,
na ɛfiri Tweaduampɔn hɔ, ɔnhyira wo.
Ɔmfa ɔsorosoro nhyira,
ne ebunu a ɛtrɛtrɛ aseɛ mu nhyira, ne nufoɔ
ne yafunu mu nhyira nhyira wo.
ɛyɛ kɛseɛ boro daa daa mmepɔ no nhyira
a ɛkɔduru tete nteredee nkokoɔ no ahyeɛso nohoa;
ɛmmra Yosef atifi,
deɛ wɔyii no firii ne nuanom mu no mpampam.
ɔdi hanam anɔpa,
na anwummerɛ nso ɔkyɛ asadeɛ mu.
Yeinom nyinaa ne Israel mmusuakuo dummienu no, na yei ne deɛ wɔn agya ka kyerɛɛ wɔn de hyiraa wɔn. Sɛdeɛ wɔn nhyira teɛ mmaako mmaako na ɔhyiraa wɔn.
ɔbodan a ɛwɔ Makpela afuo soɔ Mamre ntentensoɔ wɔ Kanaan asase so, asase a Abraham tɔeɛ wɔ Hetini Efron nkyɛn de yɛɛ amusieeɛ no mu.
Ɛhɔ na wɔsiee Abraham ne ne yere Sara, ɛhɔ na wɔsiee Isak ne ne yere Rebeka, na ɛhɔ na mesiee Lea.
Afuo no ne ɔbodan a ɛwɔ mu no, wɔtɔɔ no Het mma nsam.
Na Yakob hyɛɛ ne mma nsamanseɛ wieeɛ no, ɔboaa ne nan ano guu mpa no so, na ɔguu n’ahome a ɛdi akyire, na ɔtii ne nananom wɔ asamando.
Na Yosef hyɛɛ ne nkoa a wɔhyɛ amu aduro sɛ wɔnhyɛ n’agya mu aduro. Na wɔhyɛɛ Israel mu aduro.
Na wɔdii ho adaduanan, nna a wɔde wie adurohyɛ no ne no. Na Misraimfoɔ suu no adaduɔson.
Na nna a wɔde suu no no twaa mu no, Yosef ka kyerɛɛ Farao fiefoɔ sɛ: Sɛ manya adom wɔ mo anim a, monkɔyi Farao asotire sɛ:
M’agya maa mekaa no ntam sɛ: Hwɛ, merewu, na ɛda a mabɔ no Kanaan asase so mafa no mu, ɛhɔ na kɔsie me. Enti afei ma menkɔ menkɔsie m’agya, na mensane memmra.
Na Farao kaa sɛ: Kɔ, na kɔsie w’agya, sɛdeɛ ɔmaa wokaa ntam no.
Na Yosef kɔɔ sɛ ɔrekɔsie n’agya; na Farao nkoa nyinaa, ne fie mpanimfoɔ ne Misraim asase so mpanimfoɔ nyinaa
ne Yosef fiefoɔ nyinaa ne ne nuanom ne n’agya fiefoɔ kaa ne ho kɔe, gye wɔn mma ne wɔn nnwan ne wɔn anantwie na wɔgyaa wɔn Gosen asase no soɔ.
Na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔsotefoɔ ne no kɔe; na ɛyɛ dɔm kɛseɛ.
Na wɔduruu Atad ayuporebea a ɛwɔ Yordan agya nohoa no, wɔtwaa kwadwom kɛseɛ a emu yɛ den wɔ hɔ, na ɔgyam n’agya nnanson.
Na ɛhɔfoɔ, Kanaanfoɔ no, hunuu esu a wɔsuu no Atad ayuporebea hɔ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Yei deɛ, Misraimfoɔ ayie a emu yɛ den nie. Enti wɔfrɛ hɔ sɛ Abel-misraim
Na ne mma yɛɛ no sɛdeɛ ɔhyɛɛ wɔn no.
Na ne mma soaa no kɔɔ Kanaan asase so kɔsiee no wɔ Makpela afuo so ɔbodan a ɛwɔ Mamre ntentensoɔ a Abraham tɔɔ ɛne afuo no wɔ Hetini Efron nkyɛn de yɛɛ asieeɛ no mu.
Na Yosef siee n’agya wieeɛ no, ɔne ne nuanom ne wɔn a wɔne no kɔsiee n’agya no nyinaa sane baa Misraim.
Na Yosef nuanom hunuu sɛ wɔn agya awuo no, wɔkaa sɛ: Ebia Yosef bɛtane yɛn, na watua yɛn bɔne a yɛyɛɛ no nyinaa so ka.
Na wɔmaa wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ Yosef sɛ: W’agya hyɛe ansa na ɔrewuo sɛ:
Monka nkyerɛ Yosef sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, fa wo nuanom amumuyɛ ne wɔn bɔne kyɛ wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔayɛ wo bɔne. Na afei yɛsrɛ wo, fa w’agya Nyankopɔn nkoa amumuyɛ no kyɛ wɔn. Na wɔkaa saa kyerɛɛ Yosef no, ɔsui.
Na ne nuanom nso ba bɛtwa hwee n’anim kaa sɛ: Hwɛ, yɛyɛ wo nkoa.
Na Yosef ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnsuro, na megyina Nyankopɔn ananmu anaa?
Na mo deɛ modwenee me ho bɔne nanso Onyankopɔn deɛ, na ɔde rebɛyɛ papa. Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ deɛ ada adi nnɛ yi, na ɔbɛgye nnipa pii nkwa.
Na afei monnsuro; na mɛhwɛ mo ne mo mma. Na ɔkyekyeree wɔn werɛ kaa wɔn akoma too wɔn yam.
Na Yosef ne n’agya fiefoɔ tenaa Misraim, na Yosef dii mfirinhyia ɔha ne du.
Na Yosef wui, berɛ a na wadi mfirinhyia ɔha ne du. Na wɔhyɛɛ ne mu aduro, na wɔde no too adaka mu wɔ Misraim.
Ruben, Simeon, Lewi, Yuda,
Isakar, Sebulon, Benyamin,
Dan, Naftali, Gad ne Aser.
Na nnipa a wɔfiri Yakob asene mu nyinaa yɛ aduɔson. Na Yosef wɔ Misraim dada.
Na Israel mma no wowoe, na wɔdɔree bebree, na wɔn ase kyenee, na wɔn ho yɛɛ den papaapa; na wɔyɛɛ asase no so ma.
Na ɔhene foforɔ bi sɔree Misraim a na ɔnnim Yosef.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne man sɛ: Hwɛ, Israelfoɔ no dɔɔso, na wɔn ho yɛ den sene yɛn.
Momma yɛmfa nyansa kwan bi so ne wɔn nni, na wɔannɔɔso, na sɛ ɛsa bi ba a, wɔankɔka yɛn atamfoɔ ho ne yɛn ammɛko, na wɔansɔre asase yi so ankɔ.
Na wɔsisii wɔn so adwumayɛfoɔ so mpanimfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa nnesoadeɛ a emu yɛ duro nhyɛ wɔn so. Na wɔkyekyeree adekora nkuro Pitom ne Raamses maa Farao.
Nanso dodoɔ a wɔhyɛɛ wɔn soɔ no, dodoɔ no ara na wɔdɔreeɛ, na wɔtrɛe. Na Misraimfoɔ suroo Israelfoɔ no.
Na wɔde nyadie yaya dii Israelfoɔ.
Wɔmaa wɔn asetena fonoo wɔn wɔ dɔteɛ ne ntaayaa ho adwuma a ɛyɛ den ne afuom adwumayɛ ahodoɔ ne nnwuma ahodoɔ nyinaa mu nyadie yaya a wɔde dii wɔn mu.
Na Misraimhene ka kyerɛɛ Hebrifoɔ awogyefoɔ a wɔn mu baako din de Sifra, na ɔbaako din de Pua no sɛ:
Sɛ mokɔgye Hebrifoɔ mmaa awoɔ, na awoeɛ hɔ mohunu sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbarima a, monku no; na sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbaa deɛ a, momma no ntena ase.
Na awogyefoɔ no suro Onyankopɔn, enti wɔanyɛ sɛdeɛ Misraimhene ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, na mmom wɔgyee mmabanin no nkwa.
Na Misraimhene frɛɛ awogyefoɔ no bisaa wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na moyɛ saa, na momma mmarima no tena aseɛ?
Na awogyefoɔ no buaa Farao sɛ: Hebrifoɔ mmaa nte sɛ Misraimfoɔ mmaa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn deɛ, wɔyɛ pirimpirim; awogyefoɔ no nnya nnuruu wɔn nkyɛn no, na wɔawo dada.
Enti Onyankopɔn ne awogyefoɔ no dii no yie. Na nkurɔfoɔ no dɔɔso ara, na wɔyɛɛ den yie.
Na ɛsiane sɛ awogyefoɔ no suro Onyankopɔn nti, ɔmaa wɔn afie mu yɛɛ yie.
Ɛnna Farao hyɛɛ ne man nyinaa sɛ: Ɔbabanin biara a wɔbɛwo no no, monkɔto no ntwene asubɔnten no mu, na mmammaa nyinaa deɛ, momma wɔntena ase.
Na ɔbaa no nyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo ɔbabanin; na ɔhunuu sɛ ne ho yɛ fɛ no, ɔde no siee abosome mmiɛnsa.
Na ɔntumi nkora no bio no, ɔfaa mmɛwa adaka bi de ama ne ɛhyɛ sraa ho, na ɔde abɔfra no too mu, na ɔde kɔsii wira mu wɔ asuo no ano.
Na ne nuabaa kɔgyinaa akyirikyiri sɛ ɔrehwɛ deɛ ɛbɛyɛ no.
Na Farao babaa siane baa asuo no ano adwareɛ, na ne mmaawa repasa asuo no nsunoa. Berɛ a Farao babaa hunuu adaka no wɔ wira no mu no, ɔsomaa n’abaawa sɛ ɔnkɔfa mmra.
Na ɔbuee soɔ no, ɔhunuu akɔkoaa no, na hwɛ, na ɔyɛ abarimaa a ɔresu. Na ɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, na ɔse: Hebrifoɔ mma no bi nie.
Ɛnna ne nuabaa no ka kyerɛɛ Farao babaa no sɛ: Menkɔ menkɔfrɛ Hebrifoɔ mmaa no mu nufomafoɔ bi memmrɛ wo, na ɔmmɛma akɔkoaa no nufoɔ mma wo anaa?
Na Farao babaa no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kɔ! Na ababaa no kɔ kɔfrɛɛ abɔfra no na bae.
Na Farao babaa no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Fa abɔfra yi kɔ kɔma no nufoɔ ma me, na mɛtua wo ka. Na ɔbaa no faa abɔfra no kɔmaa no nufoɔ.
Na abɔfra no nyinii, na ɔde no kɔmaa Farao babaa no, na ɔdanee ne ba. Na ɔtoo no din Mose, ɛfiri sɛ ɔse: Nsuo mu na meyii no firiiɛ.
Na ɔhwɛɛ ha ne ha, na ɔhunuu sɛ obiara nni hɔ no, ɔbɔɔ Misraimni no kumm no, na ɔde no siee anwea mu.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ no, ɔfirii adi, na hwɛ, na Hebrifoɔ baanu reko. Na ɔbisaa deɛ ɔdi fɔ no sɛ: Adɛn nti na woboro wo yɔnko?
Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Hwan na ɔde wo sii yɛn so otitire ne osennifoɔ? Wopɛ sɛ woku me sɛdeɛ wokum Misraimni no anaa? Na Mose suroe, na ɔse: Ampa ara, asɛm no apue!
Nso na Midian sɔfoɔ wɔ mmammaa baason; na wɔba bɛtoo nsuo de hyehyɛɛ adaaseɛ no amaama sɛ wɔrema wɔn agya nnwan anom.
Na nnwanhwɛfoɔ bi ba bɛpamm wɔn; na Mose sɔre boaa wɔn, na ɔmaa wɔn nnwan no nomee.
Na wɔbaa wɔn agya Reuel nkyɛn no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na ɛnnɛ deɛ, moaba ntɛm seyie?
Na wɔbuaa sɛ: Misraimni bi na ɔgyee yɛn firii nnwanhwɛfoɔ no nsam, na ɔtoo nsuo mpo maa yɛn, na ɔmaa nnwan no nomee.
Na ɔbisaa ne mmammaa no sɛ: Na ɔwɔ he? Adɛn nti na mogyaa ɔbarima no hɔ? Monkɔfrɛ no na ɔmmɛdidi.
Na Mose penee sɛ ɔne Midian sɔfoɔ no bɛtena. Na ɔde ne babaa Sipora maa Mose awareɛ.
Na Onyankopɔn tee wɔn apinisie no, ɔkaee n’apam a ɔne Abraham ne Isak ne Yakob pameeɛ no.
Na Onyankopɔn hwɛɛ Israelfoɔ no, ɔhunuu wɔn tebea a wɔwɔ mu no.
Berɛ bi a Mose rehwɛ n’ase Yetro, Midian sɔfoɔ nnwan no, ɔkaa wɔn de wɔn kɔɔ ɛserɛ no akyiri nohoa, kɔduruu Nyankopɔn bepɔ Horeb ho.
Na Mose kaa sɛ: Yei deɛ, mɛmane makɔhwɛ ahwɛdeɛ kɛseɛ yi, adekodeɛ a enti nkyɛkyerɛ no nhyeɛ.
Na AWURADE hunuu sɛ wamane rehwɛ no, ɔfiri nkyɛkyerɛ no mu frɛɛ sɛ: Mose, Mose! Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Menie!
Ɛnna AWURADE kaa sɛ: Ntwe mpini ha! Yi wo nan ase mpaboa, na faako a wogyina hɔ yɛ asase kronkron.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Mene w’agya Nyankopɔn no, Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no. Ɛnna Mose kataa n’anim, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔsuro sɛ ɔbɛhwɛ Onyankopɔn.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Ampa ara, mahunu me man a ɛwɔ Misraim no amanehunu, na wɔn su a wɔn so ahwɛfoɔ nti wɔsu frɛ no, mate.

Na masiane sɛ merebɛyi wɔn Misraimfoɔ nsam, na matu wɔn afiri asase no so akɔ asase pa a ɛtrɛ so, asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene wɔ soɔ: Kanaanfoɔ, Hetifoɔ, Amorifoɔ, Perisifoɔ, Hewifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ tenabea hɔ.
Na afei, hwɛ, Israelfoɔ no sufrɛ no aduru m’anim, na mahunu ɔhaw a Misraimfoɔ de ha wɔn no nso.
Na afei bra, na mensoma wo Farao nkyɛn, na kɔyi me man Israelfoɔ no firi Misraim.
Na Mose bisaa Onyankopɔn sɛ: Hwan ne me a merekɔ Farao nkyɛn makɔyi Israelfoɔ afiri Misraim?
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mɛdi w’akyi; na yei bɛyɛ wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ sɛ me na mesomaa woɔ. Wonya yi ɔman no firi Misraim ba a, mobɛsom Onyankopɔn wɔ bepɔ yi so.
Na Mose bisaa Onyankopɔn sɛ: Na sɛ meduru Israelfoɔ nkyɛn, na meka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Mo nananom Nyankopɔn asoma me mo nkyɛn, na wɔbisa me sɛ: Ne din de sɛn a, sɛn na mense wɔn?
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: ME ARA NE ME ARA. Na ɔse: Sɛdeɛ ka kyerɛ Israelfoɔ no nie: ME ARA na asoma me mo nkyɛn.
Na yei ne me din de kɔsi daa,
na yei na wɔmfa nkae me, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
Kɔ, na kɔboaboa Israel mpanimfoɔ ano, na ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: AWURADE, mo nananom Nyankopɔn, Abraham, Isak ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no ayi ne ho akyerɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ na mabɛhwɛ mo ne deɛ wɔreyɛ mo wɔ Misraim no.
Na mese: Mɛyi mo afiri Misraim amanehunu no mu akɔ Kanaanfoɔ, Hetifoɔ, Amorifoɔ, Perisifoɔ, Hewifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ asase so, asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene wɔ soɔ no.

Na wɔbɛtie wo nne, na wo ne Israel mpanimfoɔ nkɔ Misraimhene nkyɛn nkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ: AWURADE, Hebrifoɔ Nyankopɔn, abɛhyia yɛn, enti yɛsrɛ wo, ma yɛnkɔ ɛserɛ so nnansa kwan nkɔbɔ AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn, afɔdeɛ.
Na me deɛ, menim sɛ wɔde nsa a ɛyɛ den hyɛ Misraimhene mpo a, ɔremma mo kwan mma mo nkɔ;
enti mɛtene me nsa de m’anwanwadeɛ a mɛyɛ wɔ hɔ no nyinaa mabɔ Misraim, na ɛno akyiri na ɔbɛma moakɔ.
Na mɛma ɔman yi anim aba nyam wɔ Misraimfoɔ anim, na ɛbɛba sɛ morekɔ a, morenkɔ no nsapan.
Na mmaa mmisabisa wɔn afipamfoɔ ne wɔn afitenafoɔ nkyɛn dwetɛ nnwinneɛ ne sika nnwinneɛ ne ntoma, na momfa nhyehyɛ mo mmammarima ne mo mmammaa, na Misraimfoɔ nnoɔma no nyɛ mo asadeɛ.
Na Mose buaa AWURADE sɛ: Na sɛ wɔannye me anni, na wɔantie me nne, na wɔka sɛ: AWURADE nyii ne ho adi nkyerɛɛ wo ɛ!
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na ɛwɔ wo nsam yi?
Na ɔse: Poma. Na ɔse: To twene fam! Na ɔto twenee fam, na ɛdanee ɔwɔ. Na Mose dwane firii ho.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: Tene wo nsa sɔ ne dua mu. Na ɔtenee ne nsa kyeree no, na ɛdanee poma wɔ ne nsam.
Deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔagye adi sɛ AWURADE, wɔn nananom Nyankopɔn, Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn na ayi ne ho akyerɛ wo ne no.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no bio sɛ: Fa wo nsa hyɛ wo kokom! Na ɔde ne nsa hyɛɛ ne kokom, na ɔyii, na hwɛ, na ɛho agu kwata fitaa sɛ sukyerɛmma.
Na ɔse: Fa wo nsa sane hyɛ wo kokom! Na ɔsane de ne nsa hyɛɛ ne kokom, na ɔyi firii ne kokom no, na adane sɛ ne honam ara.
Na sɛ wɔannye wo anni na wɔammu kane nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no a, wɔbɛgye deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu no adi.
Na sɛ wɔannye nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ mmienu yi anni na wɔantie wo nne a, ɛnneɛ kɔsa Asubɔntene Nil mu nsuo kɔhwie gu asase pɛsɛɛ so. Na nsuo a wosaa no asuo no mu no bɛdane mogya wɔ asase pɛsɛɛ no so.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwan na ɔyɛɛ onipa ano? Anaasɛ hwan na ɔyɛ emum anaa ɔsotifoɔ, ɔdehunufoɔ anaa onifirani? Ɛnyɛ me AWURADE ara?
Na afei kɔ, na me ara mɛdi w’ano akyi na makyerɛ wo deɛ ka.
Na Mose kaa sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, AWURADE! Soma obi foforɔ biara a wopɛ.
Ɛnna AWURADE bo fuu Mose, na ɔse: Adɛn mennim sɛ Aaron wo nua Lewini no, nim kasa? Na hwɛ, wafiri adi rebɛhyia wo, na sɛ ɔhu wo a, n’akoma bɛtɔ ne yam.
Na kasa kyerɛ no, na fa nsɛm no hyɛ n’anomu; na me deɛ, mɛdi w’ano ne n’ano akyi, na makyerɛ mo deɛ monyɛ.
Na ɔbɛyɛ wo kyeame ama ɔman no, na ɔbɛdane w’ano, na woayɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn ama no.
Na poma yi a wode bɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no, fa kura.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose wɔ Midian sɛ: Sane kɔ Misraim, ɛfiri sɛ nnipa a na wɔrehwehwɛ wo aku woɔ no nyinaa awuwu.
Na Mose faa ne yere ne ne mma de wɔn tenatenaa mfunumu so, na ɔsane baa Misraim asase so. Na Mose faa Nyankopɔn poma no kurae.
Na ka kyerɛ Farao sɛ: Sɛdeɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: M’abakan ne Israel.
Na mese wo sɛ: Ma me ba nkɔ nkɔsom me. Na sɛ woampene amma no ankɔ a, hwɛ, me deɛ, mɛkum w’abakan.
Ɛnna Sipora faa twerɛboɔ de twaa ne ba no twetia, na ɔto twenee ne nan ase kaa sɛ: Woyɛ mogya ayeforɔkunu ma me!
Ɛnna ɔgyaa no. Ɛno na twetiatwa no nti Sipora kaa sɛ: Mogya ayeforɔkunu ne wo.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Aaron sɛ: Kɔ ɛserɛ so kɔhyia Mose. Na ɔkɔ kɔtoo no wɔ Nyankopɔn bepɔ no ho, na ɔfee n’ano.
Na Mose kaa AWURADE nsɛm a ɔde asoma no no nyinaa ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɔde ahyɛ ne nsa no nyinaa kyerɛɛ Aaron.
Na Mose ne Aaron kɔ kɔboaboaa Israelfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no nyinaa ano.
Na Aaron kaa nsɛm a AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose no nyinaa kyerɛɛ wɔn, na ɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no wɔ ɔman no anim.
Na Farao se: Hwan ne AWURADE a mɛtie ne nne na mama Israel akorɔ? Mennim AWURADE no, na Israel nso, meremma wɔnkɔ.
Na wɔse: Hebrifoɔ Nyankopɔn abɛhyia yɛn; enti ma yɛnkɔ ɛserɛ so nnansa kwan, na yɛnkɔbɔ AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn afɔdeɛ, na wamfa owuyadeɛ anaa nkrantɛ ammɛtua yɛn.
Na Misraimhene ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na mo, Mose ne Aaron, moyi ɔman no firi wɔn nnwuma ho? Monkɔ mo adwumaden no so.
Na Farao kaa sɛ: Monhwɛ, afei a nnipa no adɔɔso wɔ asase no so, na morepɔn wɔn afiri wɔn adwumayɛ mu yi!
Na da no ara Farao hyɛɛ ɔman no adwumayɛ so ahwɛfoɔ ne wɔn aboafoɔ no sɛ:
Mommma ɔman no ɛserɛ a wɔde bɛyɛ ntaayaa no bio sɛ akane no; wɔn ara wɔnkɔboaboa ɛserɛ ano mfa.
Na ntaayaa dodoɔ a na wɔyɛ daa no, monnye wɔn, monnyi so bi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ anihafoɔ, enti na wɔsu sɛ: Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔbɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn afɔdeɛ no.
Momma wɔn adwuma a emu yɛ den na wɔnyɛ, na wɔantie nsenhunu.
Na ɔman no adwumayɛ so ahwɛfoɔ ne wɔn aboafoɔ no firii adi bɛka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: Sɛ Farao seɛ nie: Meremma mo ɛserɛ bio.
Mo ara monkɔ nkɔpɛ ɛserɛ wɔ deɛ mobɛnya bie; na mo adwuma no nso wɔrente so hwee.
Ɛnna ɔman no bɔ petee Misraim asase nyinaa so kɔboaboaa ayuo ntwakaeɛ ano de yɛɛ ɛserɛ mehemehe no.
Na akafoɔ no piapiaa wɔn kaa sɛ: Monwie mo da koro adwuma wɔ ne berɛ mu, sɛ berɛ a na ɛserɛ wɔ hɔ no.
Na wɔhwee Israelfoɔ ahwɛfoɔ a Farao adwumayɛ so ahwɛfoɔ de asisi wɔn soɔ no kaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn nti na moanwie ntaayaa a wɔahyɛ mo nnɛ ne nnora no nyinaa sɛ akane no?
Ɛnna Israelfoɔ ahwɛfoɔ no ba bɛsu kyerɛɛ Farao sɛ: Ɛdeɛn nti na wo ne wo nkoa redi no saa?
Wɔmmaa wo nkoa ɛserɛ biara, nso wɔse yɛnyɛ ntaayaa; na hwɛ, wɔahwe wo nkoa, nso ɛyɛ wo ara wo nkurɔfoɔ no mfomsoɔ.
Na Farao buaa sɛ: Anihafoɔ, anihafoɔ na moyɛ. Enti na mose: Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔbɔ AWURADE afɔdeɛ.
Enti monkɔ nkɔyɛ adwuma, na ɛserɛ deɛ, wɔremma mo, nso ntaayaa no dodoɔ deɛ, mobɛma ara.
Na wɔkaa sɛ: Monnyi mo da koro adwuma mu ntaayaa no so ara da, na Israelfoɔ adwumayɛ so ahwɛfoɔ no hunuu sɛ amaneɛ na ato wɔn.
Na wɔfiri Farao nkyɛn reba no, wɔbɛtoo Mose ne Aaron a wɔgyina hɔ rebɛhyia wɔn,
na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: AWURADE nhwɛ mo mmu atɛn, sɛ moama yɛn ho abɔn wɔ Farao ne ne nkoa anim, na mode nkrantɛ ahyɛ wɔn nsa sɛ wɔmfa nku yɛn.
Na Mose sane baa AWURADE nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: AWURADE, adɛn na woayɛ ɔman yi bɔne sei? Adɛn na wosomaa me yi?
Na ɛfiri berɛ a mebaa Farao nkyɛn na mede wo din ne no kasaeɛ no, Farao ayɛ ɔman yi bɔne, na wo nso wonnyee wo man!
Na Onyankopɔn ne Mose kasae, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mene AWURADE,
a meyii me ho mekyerɛɛ Abraham ne Isak ne Yakob sɛ Onyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn, na me din YHWH (AWURADE) no deɛ, mamma wɔamfa anhu me.
Nanso mama m’apam a me ne wɔn pameeɛ no agyina, sɛ mede Kanaan asase a ɛyɛ wɔn ahɔhobea asase a wɔyɛɛ so ahɔhoɔ no bɛma wɔn.
Nanso mate Israelfoɔ a Misraimfoɔ di wɔn nya no apinisie, na makae m’apam no.
Ɛno nti ka kyerɛ Israelfoɔ sɛ: Mene AWURADE, na mɛgye mo afiri Misraim nkoasom mu, na mayi mo afiri wɔn nyadie no mu, na mede basa a atene ne atemmuo akɛseɛ magye mo.
Na mɛfa mo mayɛ me man, na mayɛ Onyankopɔn ama mo, na moahunu sɛ mene AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn a ɔgyee mo firii Misraim nkoasom mu.
Na mede mo bɛkɔ asase a mekaa ntam sɛ mede bɛma Abraham, Isak, Yakob no so, na mede bɛma mo sɛ agyapadeɛ. Mene AWURADE.
Na Mose kaa saa kyerɛɛ Israelfoɔ no; nanso ahometeɛ ne nkoasom denden no nti wɔantie no.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ:
Kɔ, kɔka kyerɛ Misraimhene Farao sɛ ɔmma Israelfoɔ mfiri n’asase so nkɔ.
Na Mose kasae wɔ AWURADE anim sɛ: Hwɛ, Israelfoɔ ntie me, na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Farao bɛtie me a meyɛ ano mu momonoto yi.
Na AWURADE ne Mose ne Aaron kasae, na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ Israelfoɔ ne Misraimhene Farao nkyɛn nkɔyi Israelfoɔ no mfiri Misraim asase so.
Na Simeon mma ne: Yemuel, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, Sohar ne Saulo a ɔyɛ Kanaanni baa bi ba; yeinom ne Simeon mmusua.
Na Gerson mma ne: Libni ne Simei wɔ wɔn mmusua ahodoɔ mu.
Na Kohat mma ne: Amram ne Ishar, Hebron ne Usiel. Na Kohat mfeɛ a ɔdiiɛ yɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduasa mmiɛnsa.
Na Merari mma ne: Mahli ne Musi. Yeinom ne Lewi mmusua, sɛdeɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ teɛ.
Na Amram faa n’agya nua Yokebed waree, na ɔwoo Aaron ne Mose maa no. Na Amram mfeɛ a ɔdiiɛ yɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduasa nson.
Na Ishar mma ne: Kora, Nefeg ne Sikri.
Na Usiel mma ne: Misael, Elsafan ne Sitri.
Na Aaron faa Aminadab babaa Elisaba a ɔyɛ Nahson nua waree, na ɔwoo Nadab, Abihu, Eleasa ne Itamar maa no.
Na Kora mma ne: Asir, Elkana ne Abiasaf; yeinom ne Kora mma mmusua.
Na Aaron ba Eleasa faa Putiel mma mu bi waree, na ɔwoo Pinehas maa no. Yeinom ne Lewifoɔ nananom atitire sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ.
Yeinom ne Aaron ne Mose a AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monyi Israelfoɔ mfiri Misraim asase so sɛdeɛ wɔn dɔm teɛ no.
Wɔne wɔn a wɔne Misraimhene Farao kasaa sɛ wɔbɛyi Israelfoɔ afiri Misraim akorɔ no, Mose ne Aaron korɔ no ara nie.
Na da a AWURADE ne Mose kasaa Misraim asase soɔ no,
ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mene AWURADE, ka deɛ mɛka makyerɛ woɔ nyinaa kyerɛ Misraimhene Farao.
Na Mose kaa no AWURADE anim sɛ: Hwɛ, ano mu momonoto ne me, na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Farao bɛtie me?
Wo deɛ, wobɛka deɛ mehyɛ woɔ nyinaa, na wo nua Aaron bɛka akyerɛ Farao sɛ ɔmma Israelfoɔ mfiri n’asase so nkɔ.
Na me deɛ, mɛpirim Farao akoma, na mama me nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne m’anwanwadeɛ adɔɔso Misraim asase so.
Nanso Farao rentie mo; na mede me nsa bɛto Misraim so, na mayi m’asafo, me man Israelfoɔ no, afiri Misraim asase so wɔ atemmuo akɛseɛ mu.
Na sɛ metene me nsa wɔ Misraim so na meyi Israelfoɔ firi wɔn mu a, na Misraimfoɔ bɛhunu sɛ mene AWURADE.
Na Mose ne Aaron yɛɛ sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ wɔn no, saa ara na wɔyɛeɛ.
Berɛ a wɔne Farao kɔkasaeɛ no, na Mose adi mfirinhyia aduɔwɔtwe, na Aaron nso adi mfirinhyia aduɔwɔtwe mmiɛnsa.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose ne Aaron sɛ:
