Ɛnna Ɔhene Yehoas frɛɛ Ɔsɔfoɔ Yehoiada ne asɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na monsiesiee efie no mu adango no? Afei monnnyegye sika amannifoɔ nkyɛn bio, na monyi mma na wɔmfa nyɛ efie no adango no.
Na asɔfoɔ no penee sɛ wɔrennye ɔman no hɔ sika, na wɔrenyɛ efie no mu adango no bio.

Ɛnna Ɔsɔfoɔ Yehoiada faa adaka bi, na ɔtuu ne mmuasoɔ mu tokuro, na ɔde sii afɔrebukyia ho, deɛ wɔfa ba AWURADE fie no nifa; na asɔfoɔ a wɔhwɛ ɛpono no ano no de sika a wɔde ba AWURADE fie no nyinaa guu mu.
Na sɛ wɔhunu sɛ sika pii wɔ adaka no mu a, ɔhene atwerɛfoɔ ne ɔsɔfoɔ panin no foro ba, na wɔbɛkyekyere, na wɔkan sika a wɔhu no AWURADE fie no.
Na wɔde sika a wɔakarie no hyɛɛ wɔn a wɔyɛɛ adwuma no a wɔde wɔn sisii AWURADE fie so ahwɛfoɔ no nsa, na wɔyi maa nnua adwumfoɔ ne adansifoɔ a wɔyɛ AWURADE fie no,
ne abantofoɔ, ne abotwafoɔ, ne sɛ wɔde bɛtɔ nnua ne aboɔ a wɔatwa, sɛ wɔde bɛpempam AWURADE fie adango no, ne sɛ wɔde bɛtua efie no adango no bɛsiesie ho adeɛ a wɔhwereɛ nyinaa ka.
Nanso wɔamfa sika a wɔde ba AWURADE fie no mu bi anyɛ AWURADE fie dwetɛ nyowaa, adumgya, nkoraa, ntotorobɛnto anaa sika ne dwetɛ adeɛ biara.
Na wɔde maa wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma no, na wɔde siesie AWURADE fie no.
Nanso wɔne nnipa a wɔde sika hyɛɛ wɔn nsa sɛ wɔmfa mma adwumayɛfoɔ no ammu nkonta, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛɛ no nokorɛ mu.
Asodie afɔdeɛ sika ne bɔne ho afɔdeɛ sika deɛ, wɔamfa amma AWURADE fie; ɛyɛ asɔfoɔ no dea.

Ɛnna Yudahene Yehoas faa akronkronneɛ nyinaa a n’agyanom Yuda ahemfo Yehosafat, Yehoram ne Ahasia yɛɛ no kronkron no ne n’akronkronneɛ ne sika a wɔhunuu no AWURADE fie ne ahemfie akoradeɛ mu nyinaa, na ɔsoma maa wɔde kɔmaa Siriahene Hasael; ɛnna ɔfirii Yerusalem hɔ kɔeɛ.
Na Yehoas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, wɔatwerɛ no Yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu.
Na ne nkoa sɔre pam ne tiri so, na wɔkumm Yehoas wɔ Milo dan a ɛwɔ kwan a ɛde rekɔ Sila no mu.
Na ne nkoa Simeat ba Yosakar ne Somer ba Yehosabad bɔɔ no na ɔwui; na wɔsiee no kaa n’agyanom ho, Dawid kuro mu; na ne ba Amasia bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, na ɔdii Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne akyi; wamfiri ho.
Na AWURADE bo fu tiaa Israel, na ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ Siriahene Hasael nsa ne Hasael ba Ben-hadad nsa wɔn nna nyinaa.
Na Yehoahas koto srɛɛ AWURADE, na AWURADE tiee no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunuu ɔhaw a Siriahene de reha Israel no.
Na AWURADE maa Israel ɔgyefoɔ, na wɔfirii Siriafoɔ nsa ase, na Israel mma tenaa wɔn ntomadan mu sɛ akane no.
Nanso wɔamfiri Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no fie bɔne ho; emu na wɔnanteeɛ. Na Asera nnua no nso sisii Samaria.
Na wɔannya dɔm biara amma Yehoahas gye apɔnkɔsotefoɔ aduonum ne nteaseɛnam du ne anammɔnmufoɔ mpem du, ɛfiri sɛ na Siriahene asɛe wɔn, na wayɛ wɔn sɛ mfuturo a wɔtiatia soɔ.
Na Yehoahas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ, wɔantwerɛ no Israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu?
Na Yehoahas tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no Samaria; na ne ba Yoas bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Yudahene Yoas afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nson so na Yehoahas ba Yehoas bɛdii Israel so hene wɔ Samaria mfeɛ dunsia.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, wamfiri Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne nyinaa ho; emu na ɔnanteeɛ.
Na Yoas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ, sɛ ɔne Yudahene Amasia dii ako no, wɔantwerɛ no Israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu?
Na Yoas tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na Yeroboam bɛtenaa n’adwa so; na wɔsiee Yoas Samaria kaa Israel ahemfo ho.
Ɛnna Elisa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kɔfa tadua ne agyan! Na ɔde tadua ne agyan brɛɛ no.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Israel hene no sɛ: Fa wo nsa sɔ tadua no mu. Na ɔde ne nsa sɔɔ mu; na Elisa de ne nsa guu ɔhene no nsa so.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Hini apueeɛ mpomma no! Na ɔhiniiɛ. Na Elisa se: To! Na ɔtoe. Na ɔse: AWURADE nkonimdie agyan, Siria so nkonimdie agyan! Na wobɛbɔ Siria wɔ Afek akɔsi sɛ wobɛdwerɛ wɔn.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Fa agyan no! Na ɔtasee. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Israel hene no sɛ: To bɔ fam! Na ɔto bɔɔ fam mprɛnsa, na ɔgyaeɛ.
Ɛnna Nyankopɔn nipa no bo fuu no kaa sɛ: Anka ɛsɛ sɛ woto no mprɛnnum anaa nsia; ɛno na anka wobɛbɔ Siria akɔsi sɛ wobɛdwerɛ wɔn; enti nso mprɛnsa pɛ na wobɛbɔ Siria.
Na Elisa wui, na wɔsiee no. Na afe no baeɛ no, Moabfoɔ afomfafoɔ asafo baa asase no so.
Na wɔrekɔsie onipa bi, na hwɛ, wɔhunuu asafokuo no, wɔtoo onipa no twenee Elisa da mu; na onipa no kɔkaa Elisa nnompe pɛ, ɔnyaa nkwa, na ɔsɔre gyinaa ne nan so.
Na Siriahene Hasael haa Israel, Yehoahas nna nyinaa.

Nanso AWURADE dom wɔn, na ne yam hyehyee no maa wɔn, na ɔdanee ne ho kyerɛɛ wɔn n’apam a ɔne Abraham, Isak ne Yakob pameeɛ no nti, na wampɛ sɛ ɔsɛe wɔn, na wanto wɔn antwene amfiri n’anim de bɛsi seesei.
Na Siriahene Hasael wuiɛ; na ne ba Ben-hadad bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Yehoahas ba Yehoas sane kɔgyee Hasael ba Ben-hadad nsam nkuro a ɔde ɔko bɛgyee no n’agya Yehoahas nsam no; mprɛnsa na Yoas bɔɔ no, na ɔgyee Israel nkuro no.
Ɔbɛdii hene no, na wadi mfeɛ aduonu nnum, na ɔdii hene mfeɛ aduonu nkron wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Yehoadin a ɔfiri Yerusalem.
Na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so, nanso na ɛnte sɛ n’agya Dawid; sɛdeɛ n’agya Yoas yɛeɛ no nyinaa na ɔno nso yɛeɛ,
nanso sorɔnsorɔmmea no deɛ, wɔanyi. Ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea no so.
Na ahennie no timm ne nsam no, ɔkumm ne nkoa a wɔkumm n’agya ɔhene no.
Na awudifoɔ no mma no deɛ, wanku wɔn, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no Mose mmara no mu sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ sɛ: Wɔnnkum agyanom mma nti a, nso wɔnkum mma agyanom nti, na mmom obiara bɔne so na wɔnkum no.
Ɔno na ɔkumm Edom mu nnipa mpemdu Nkyene-bonhwa mu, na ɔde ɔko faa Sela, na ɔtoo ne din Yokteel de bɛsi nnɛ.
Ɛberɛ no mu na Amasia somaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔkɔɔ Israelhene Yehu ba Yehoahas ba Yehoas nkyɛn sɛ: Bra, ma yɛnsɔ yɛn ho nhwɛ.

Na Israelhene Yehoas soma maa wɔbaa Yudahene Amasia nkyɛn sɛ: Nkasɛɛ dua a ɛwɔ Lebanon no soma maa wɔkɔɔ tweneduro a ɛwɔ Lebanon no nkyɛn sɛ: Fa wo babaa ma me ba nware. Na wiram mmoa a wɔwɔ Lebanon no sene bɛtiatiaa nkasɛɛ dua no so.
Kum deɛ woakum Edom, na w’akoma ama wo so. Ma w’animuonyam nnɔɔso mma wo na tena wo fie, na adɛn nti na wo ne mmusuo rebɛdi aperepereɛ na woahwe aseɛ, wo ne Yuda nyinaa?
Na Amasia antie. Ɛnna Israelhene Yehoas foro baeɛ, na wɔbɛhyiaam koe, ɔno ne Yudahene Amasia wɔ Bet-semes a ɛyɛ Yuda dea hɔ.
Na Yuda dii nkoguo wɔ Israel anim, na wɔdwane kokɔɔ wɔn ntomadan mu.
Na Israelhene Yoas kyeree Ahasia ba Yehoas ba Yudahene Amasia wɔ Bet-semes; na ɔbaa Yerusalem bɛdwirii Yerusalem fasuo firi Efraim pono no ho de kɔsii ntwea pono no ho basafa ahanan.
Na ɔfaa sika ne dwetɛ nyinaa ne nnwinneɛ a ɔhunuu no AWURADE fie, ne ahemfie akoradeɛ mu, ne nnommum pii, na ɔsane kɔɔ Samaria.
Na Yoas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ, deɛ ɔyɛeɛ ne ne mmaninneɛ ne sɛdeɛ ɔne Yudahene Amasia koeɛ no, wɔantwerɛ no Israel Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu?
Na Yehoas tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no Samaria kaa Israel ahemfo ho, na ne ba Yeroboam bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Yoas ba Yudahene Amasia tenaa ase Yehoahas ba Israelhene Yehoas wuo akyi mfirinhyia dunum.
Na Amasia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ no, wɔatwerɛ no Yuda Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu.
Na wɔpam ne tiri so Yerusalem, na ɔdwane kɔɔ Lakis; na wɔsoma maa wɔtii no kɔɔ Lakis, na wɔkɔkumm no wɔ hɔ.
Na wɔde no too apɔnkɔ so bae, na wɔsiee no Yerusalem kaa n’agyanom ho, Dawid kuro mu.
Ɔno na ɔkyekyeree Elat na ɔdane maa Yuda, na akyire yi no ɔhene no tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando.
Na AWURADE hunuu Israel amanehunu, sɛ ɛyɛ nwono papa, na ɔdehyeɛ ne akoa nyinaa kɔ a Israel nni ɔboafoɔ biara.
Na Yeroboam ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ, sɛdeɛ ɔkoeɛ, ne sɛdeɛ ɔdanee Damasko ne Hamat a na ɛyɛ Yuda dea no maa Israel no, wɔantwerɛ no Israel Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu?
Na Yeroboam tii n’agyanom Israel ahemfo wɔ asamando, na ne ba Sakaria bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Ɔbɛdii hene no, na wadi mfeɛ dunsia, na ɔdii hene mfirinhyia aduonum mmienu wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne na din ne Yekolia a ɔfiri Yerusalem.
Na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so, sɛdeɛ n’agya Amasia yɛeɛ no nyinaa;
gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no na wɔanyie; na ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea no so.
Na AWURADE bɔɔ ɔhene no maa no yaree kwata de kɔsii ne wuda; na ɔkɔtenaa fie foforɔ a obiara nte mu, na ɔhene ba Yotam na ɔdii efie no soɔ na ɔbuu asase no sofoɔ atɛn.
Na Asaria ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu?
Na Asaria tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no kaa n’agyanom ho Dawid kuro mu; na ne ba Yotam bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne sɛdeɛ n’agyanom yɛeɛ no; wamfiri Nebat ba Yeroboam bɔne a ɔmaa Israel yɛeɛ no ho.
Na Yabes ba Salum pam ne tiri so, na ɔbɔɔ no Ibleam kumm no, na ɔsii n’ananmu dii hene.
Na Sakaria ho nsɛm nkaeɛ no, hwɛ, wɔatwerɛ no Israel Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu.
(Ɛno ne AWURADE asɛm no a ɔka kyerɛɛ Yehu sɛ: W’awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛtɔ so nnan mu mma bɛtena Israel adwa so no baa mu.)
Yabes ba Salum bɛdii hene, Yudahene Usia afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nkron mu; na ɔdii hene bosome wɔ Samaria.
Na Gadi ba Menahem firii Tirsa foro baa Samaria, na ɔbɛbɔɔ Yabes ba Salum wɔ Samaria kumm no, na ɔsii n’ananmu dii hene.
Na Salum ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne n’apam a ɔpameeɛ no, hwɛ, wɔatwerɛ no Israel Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu.
Ɛberɛ no mu no Menahem firii Tirsa kɔkum Tifsa ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa ne ɛho asase, ɛfiri sɛ wɔanhini no nti, ɔkumm wɔn, na ɔpaepaee emu anyinsɛnfoɔ nyinaa mu.
Yudahene Asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nkron mu na Gadi ba Menahem bɛdii Israel so hene mfeɛ du wɔ Samaria.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, wamfiri Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho ne nna nyinaa.
Asiriahene Pul baa asase no so, na Menahem maa Pul dwetɛ dwetikɛseɛ apem, sɛ ɔmmoa no nhyɛ ne nsa mu den, n’ahennie no mu.
Na Menahem gyegyee Israel hɔ toɔ, mmarima a wɔbɛtumi nyinaa hɔ dwetɛ nnwetɛbena aduonum aduonum, sɛ ɔde rekɔma Asiriahene. Ɛnna Asiriahene nsa kaeɛ no ɔsaneeɛ, na wannyina asase no so hɔ.
Na Menahem ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, wɔantwerɛ no Israel Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu?
Na Menahem tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na ne ba Pekahia bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Yudahene Asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduonum mu na Menahem ba Pekahia bɛdii Israel so hene Samaria mfeɛ mmienu.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne. Wamfiri Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho.
Na ne kunini Peka a ɔyɛ Remalia ba pam ne tiri so, na ɔbɔɔ no Samaria ahemfie aban mu, ɔne Argob ne Arie, na Gileadfoɔ mma mu mmarima aduonum ka ne ho; na ɔkumm no, na ɔbɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Pekahia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, hwɛ, wɔatwerɛ no Israel Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma mu.
Yudahene Asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduonum mmienu mu na Remalia ba Peka bɛdii Israel so hene Samaria mfeɛ aduonu.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne. Wamfiri Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho.
Israelhene Peka berɛ so na Asiriahene Tiglat-pileser ba bɛfaa Iyon, Abel-bet-maaka, Yanoa, Kedes, Hasor, Gilead ne Galilea, Naftali asase nyinaa, na ɔtuu wɔn kɔɔ Asiria.
Na Ela ba Hosea pam Remalia ba Peka tiri so, na ɔbɔɔ no kumm no, na ɔbɛdii n’adeɛ Usia ba Yotam afe a ɛtɔ so aduonu mu.
Na Peka ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, hwɛ, wɔatwerɛ no Israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu.
Israelhene Remalia ba Peka afe a ɛtɔ so mmienu mu na Yudahene Usia ba Yotam bɛdii hene.
Ɔbɛdii hene no, na wadi mfeɛ aduonu nnum, na mfirinhyia dunsia na ɔdii hene Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Yerusa a ɔyɛ Sadok babaa.
Na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so, sɛdeɛ n’agya Usia yɛeɛ nyinaa na ɔyɛeɛ;
gye sorɔnsorɔmmea na wanyiyie, na ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ, hyee nnuhwam wɔ so. Ɔno na ɔsii AWURADE fie pono a ɛkorɔn no.
Na Yotam ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu?
Na Yotam tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no kaa n’agyanom ho, n’agya Dawid kuro mu, na ne ba Ahas bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Ahas bɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduonu, na ɔdii hene mfirinhyia dunsia Yerusalem. Na wanyɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE, ne Nyankopɔn, ani so sɛ n’agya Dawid.
Na ɔfaa Israel ahemfo kwan so, na ne ba mpo ɔde no bɔɔ afɔdeɛ sɛ amanaman a AWURADE tuu wɔn firii Israel mma anim no akyiwadeɛ a na wɔyɛ.
Na ɔbobɔɔ afɔdeɛ na ɔhyee nnuhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea ne nkokoɔ so ne nnua frɔmfrɔm nyinaa ase.
Ɛberɛ no mu ara na Siriahene Resin gyee Elat sane maa Siria, na ɔpamoo Yudafoɔ no firii Elat, na Edomfoɔ baa Elat bɛtenaa hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Ahas somaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔkɔɔ Asiriahene Tiglat-pileser nkyɛn sɛ: W’akoa ne wo ba ne me; foro bra bɛgye me Siriahene ne Israel hene a wɔasɔre atia me yi nsam.
Na Ahas faa dwetɛ ne sika a wɔhunuu no AWURADE fie ne ahemfie akoradeɛ mu no soma maa wɔde kɔmaa Asiriahene sɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ.
Na Asiriahene tiee no, na Asiriahene foro baa Damasko, na ɔbɛfae, na ɔtuu wɔn kɔduaa Kir, na ɔkum Resin.

Na Ɔhene Ahas sii mu kɔhyiaa Asiriahene Tiglat-pileser wɔ Damasko; na ɔkɔhunuu afɔrebukyia a ɛwɔ Damasko no, na Ɔhene Ahas de afɔrebukyia no nsɛsoɔ ne nsususoɔ sɛdeɛ ne yɛbea nyinaa teɛ soma maa wɔde brɛɛ Ɔsɔfoɔ Uria.
Na Ɔsɔfoɔ Uria sii afɔrebukyia no sɛdeɛ Ɔhene Ahas soma firii Damasko de brɛɛ no no, saa na Ɔsɔfoɔ Uria yɛ twɛnee ba a Ɔhene Ahas firi Damasko baeɛ.
Na ɔhene firi Damasko baeɛ no, ɔhene bɛhunuu afɔrebukyia no, na ɔhene twe pinii afɔrebukyia no ho, na ɔbɔɔ so ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ.
Na ɔhyee ne hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne n’aduane afɔdeɛ, na ɔhwiee n’ahwiesa, na ɔde n’asomdwoeɛ afɔdeɛ mogya petee afɔrebukyia no so.
Na kɔbere mfrafraeɛ afɔrebukyia a ɛsi AWURADE anim no, ɔtwe firii asɔredan no anim, afɔrebukyia foforɔ no ne AWURADE dan no ntam de kɔsii afɔrebukyia no nkyɛn mu atifi fam.

Na Ɔhene Ahas hyɛɛ Ɔsɔfoɔ Uria sɛ: Afɔrebukyia kɛseɛ no so na hye anɔpa hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne anwummerɛ aduane afɔdeɛ ne ɔhene hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne n’aduane afɔdeɛ ne asase yi sofoɔ nyinaa hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne wɔn aduane afɔdeɛ ne wɔn ahwiesa, na fa ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ mogya nyinaa ne okum afɔdeɛ nyinaa mogya pete so; na kɔbere mfrafraeɛ afɔrebukyia no nsi me hɔ na makɔ so abisa.
Na Ɔsɔfoɔ Uria yɛɛ sɛdeɛ Ɔhene Ahas hyɛɛ no no nyinaa.
Na ɔkwan a wɔakata soɔ a wɔfa so homeda a wɔyɛɛ no efie no mu, ne ɔhene mfikyikwan no, Asiriahene nti ɔyi kɔtoo AWURADE fie.
Na Ahas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ, deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu?
Na Ahas tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no kaa n’agyanom ho Dawid kuro mu; na ne ba Hesekia bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, nanso na ɛnte sɛ Israel ahemfo a wɔdii n’anim no.
Ɔno so na Asiriahene Salmaneser baeɛ, na Hosea bɛyɛɛ n’akoa, na ɔtuaa apeatoɔ maa no.
Na Asiriahene hunuu sɛ Hosea apam ne tiri so, sɛ wasoma abɔfoɔ ama wɔakɔ Misraimhene So nkyɛn, na wamfa apeatoɔ ankɔma Asiriahene sɛ daa afe no. Na Asiriahene bɛkyekyeree no kɔtoo nneduadan mu.
Na Asiriahene tu baa asase no nyinaa so, na ɔbaa Samaria bɛkaa no hyɛɛ mu mfeɛ mmiɛnsa.
Hosea afe a ɛtɔ so nkron mu na Asiriahene faa Samaria, na ɔtuu Israel kɔɔ Asiria, na ɔde wɔn kɔduaa Hala ne Habor, Gosan asubɔnten ho, ne Media nkuro mu.
Na ɛbaa saa, ɛfiri sɛ na Israelfoɔ ayɛ AWURADE wɔn Nyankopɔn a ɔyii wɔn Misraim asase soɔ Misraimhene Farao nsam baeɛ no bɔne, na wɔakɔsom anyame foforɔ,
na wɔanante amanaman a AWURADE tuu wɔn firii Israel mma anim no amammerɛ ne Israel ahemfo deɛ a wɔhyehyɛeɛ no mu.
Na Israelfoɔ no nam aseɛ dii nsɛm a ɛmfata, na ɛne AWURADE wɔn Nyankopɔn dii asie, na wɔsisii sorɔnsorɔmmea, wɔn nkuro nyinaa mu, ɛfiri awɛmfoɔ abantenten so kɔsi afasuo nkuro so,
na wɔyeyɛɛ adum ne Asera nnua, nkokoɔ a ɛkorɔn nyinaa so, ne nnua frɔmfrɔm nyinaa ase maa wɔn ho.
Na ɛhɔ na wɔhyee nnuhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea nyinaa, sɛ amanaman a AWURADE tutuu wɔn firii wɔn anim no, na wɔdii nsɛmmɔne de huruu AWURADE bo.
Na wɔsonsom ahonihuhuo a AWURADE aka wɔn ɛho asɛm sɛ: Monnni saa asɛm yi, no.

Na AWURADE nam n’adiyifoɔ nyinaa ne adehunufoɔ nyinaa so dii Israel ne Yuda adanseɛ sɛ: Monsane mfiri mo akwammɔne no so, na monni me mmara nsɛm ne m’ahyɛdeɛ so, sɛ mmara a mehyɛɛ mo agyanom a menam me nkoa adiyifoɔ no so memaa wɔde brɛɛ mo no nyinaa.
Nanso wɔantie, na wɔsensenee wɔn kɔn sɛ wɔn agyanom a wɔannye AWURADE wɔn Nyankopɔn annie no kɔn.

Na wɔpoo n’ahyɛdeɛ ne n’apam a ɔne wɔn agyanom pameeɛ ne n’adanseɛ a ɔdii wɔn no, na wɔkɔdii ahuhudeɛ akyi dii ahuhusɛm, na wɔkɔdii amanaman a wɔatwa wɔn ho ahyia a AWURADE hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnnyɛ sɛ wɔn no akyi.
Na wɔgyaa AWURADE wɔn Nyankopɔn mmara nyinaa, na wɔyɛɛ ahoni a wɔaguo, nantwie mma mmienu fae, na wɔyɛɛ Asera nnua, na wɔsɔree ɔsoro asafo nyinaa, na wɔsom Baal.
Na wɔmemaa wɔn mmammarima ne wɔn mmammaa fefaa ogya mu, na wɔhyehyɛɛ nkɔm bisabisaa adeɛ, na wɔtontɔn wɔn ho sɛ wɔbɛyɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne de ahuru ne bo.
Enti na AWURADE faa Israel abufuo sɛɛ, na ɔyii wɔn firii n’anim, wannya obiara sɛ Yuda abusuakuo nko.
Yuda nso anni AWURADE wɔn Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so, na wɔnantee Israel ahyɛdeɛ a wɔyɛeɛ no mu.
Enti na AWURADE poo Israel asefoɔ nyinaa, na ɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase, na ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ afomfafoɔ nsa kɔsii sɛ ɔtoo wɔn firii n’anim guiɛ.
Na Israelfoɔ kɔnantee Yeroboam bɔne a ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa mu; wɔamfiri ho
de kɔsii sɛ AWURADE yii Israel firii n’anim, sɛdeɛ ɔnam ne nkoa adiyifoɔ no nyinaa so kaeɛ no. Ɛno na wɔtuu Israel firii n’asase so kɔɔ Asiria de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Asiriahene kɔfaa nnipa firii Babel ne Kuta ne Awa ne Hamat ne Sefarwaim de wɔn bɛduaa Samaria nkuro mu sii Israelfoɔ no ananmu, na wɔdii Samaria so na wɔtenaa ne nkuro mu.
Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔn hɔ tena mfitiaseɛ mu no na wɔnsuro AWURADE, na AWURADE somaa agyata maa wɔbaa wɔn mu a wɔkunkumm wɔn mu binom.

Na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ Asiriahene sɛ: Amanaman a woatutu wɔn de wɔn abɛdua Samaria nkuro mu yi, wɔnnim asase no so Nyankopɔn no atemmudeɛ, enti wasoma agyata ama wɔaba wɔn mu, na hwɛ, wɔrekunkum wɔn, ɛsiane sɛ wɔnnim asase no so Nyankopɔn atemmudeɛ.
Ɛnna Asiriahene no hyɛɛ sɛ: Momma asɔfoɔ a moatu wɔn hɔ no mu baako nkɔ hɔ, na ɔnkɔ nkɔtena hɔ, na ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn asase no so Nyankopɔn no atemmudeɛ.
Na asɔfoɔ a wɔtuu wɔn firii Samaria no mu baako ba bɛtenaa Betel, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔnsuro AWURADE.
Nanso amanaman no yeyɛɛ wɔn anyame, na wɔde wɔn sisii sorɔnsorɔmmea adan a Samariafoɔ yeyɛeɛ no mu; ɔman biara, wɔn nkuro a wɔte mu no mu.
Na Babelfoɔ no yɛɛ Sukot Benot, na Kutfoɔ no yɛɛ Nergal, na Hamatfoɔ no yɛɛ Asima,
na Awifoɔ no yɛɛ Nibhas ne Tartak. Na Sefarwifoɔ de ogya hyehyee wɔn mma maa Adramelek ne Anamelek, Sefarwaim anyame no.
Na wɔsuroo AWURADE nso, na kuro biara yii nipa yɛɛ no sorɔnsorɔmmea sɔfoɔ, wɔn na wɔbobɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea afie no mu.
Wɔsuroo AWURADE deɛ, nanso wɔsonsom wɔn ara wɔn anyame, sɛ amanaman a wɔtuu wɔn firii hɔ baeɛ no amanneɛ teɛ.
Ɛde bɛsi nnɛ yi ara, wɔyɛ sɛ kane nneyɛɛ no.
Wɔnsuro AWURADE, nso wɔnyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn ahyɛdeɛ, anaa wɔn atemmudeɛ, anaa mmara, anaa ɛmom a AWURADE hyɛɛ Yakob a ɔtoo no din Israel no mma no.
Wɔn na AWURADE ne wɔn pameeɛ, na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnsuro anyame foforɔ, na monnsɔre wɔn na monnsom wɔn, na mommmɔ wɔn afɔdeɛ,
na mmom AWURADE a ɔde ahoɔden kɛseɛ ne basa a watene mu kɔyii mo firii Misraim asase so baeɛ no, ɔno na monsuro no, na ɔno na monsɔre no, na ɔno na mommɔ no afɔdeɛ.
Na ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ ne mmara ne ɛmom a ɔtwerɛ maa mo no, monni so nyɛ no mo nna nyinaa, na monnsuro anyame foforɔ.
Na apam a me ne mo pameeɛ no, mommma mo werɛ mmfi, na monnsuro anyame foforɔ,
na mmom AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn na monsuro no, na ɔno na ɔbɛyi mo afiri mo atamfoɔ nyinaa nsam.
Nanso wɔantie, na mmom sɛ wɔn kane yɛbea teɛ no ara na wɔyɛeɛ.
Sɛɛ na amanaman yi suro AWURADE, na wɔsonsom wɔn ahoni a wɔasensene no, wɔn mma ne wɔn mma mma nso, sɛdeɛ wɔn agyanom yɛeɛ no, saa ara na wɔn nso wɔyɛ de bɛsi nnɛ.
Ɔbɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduonu nnum, na ɔdii hene mfeɛ aduonu nkron wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Abi a ɔyɛ Sakaria babaa.
Na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so, sɛdeɛ n’agya Dawid yɛeɛ nyinaa.
Ɔyiyii sorɔnsorɔmmea no, na ɔbubuu adum no, na ɔtwitwaa Asera nnua no guiɛ, na ɔbubuu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ ɔwɔ a Mose yɛeɛ no; ɛfiri sɛ saa berɛ no, na Israelfoɔ hye aduhwam ma no, na wɔfrɛ no Nehustan.
AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn so na ɔde ne ho toeɛ, na n’akyiri no, obiara amma sɛ ɔno Yuda ahemfo nyinaa mu, na obiara anni n’anim saa.
Na ɔbataa AWURADE ho, wansane amfiri n’akyi, na ɔdii mmara nsɛm a AWURADE hyɛɛ Mose no so.
Na AWURADE dii n’akyi; baabiara a na ɔfiri korɔ no, ɔnya siadeɛ; na ɔtee Asiriahene so atua, na wansom no.
Ɔno na ɔkunkumm Filistifoɔ kɔduruu Gasa ne ɛho asase so, de firi awɛmfoɔ abantenten so kɔsii kuro a afasuo atwa ho ahyia no so.
na mfeɛ mmiɛnsa awieeɛ no wɔfae. Hesekia afe a ɛtɔ so nsia a ɛne Israelhene Hosea afe a ɛtɔ so nkron no mu na wɔfaa Samaria.
Na Asiriahene tuu Israel kɔɔ Asiria, na ɔde wɔn kɔguu Hala ne Habor, Gosan asubɔnten ho, ne Media nkuro mu,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔantie AWURADE wɔn Nyankopɔn, na wɔtoo n’apam ne deɛ AWURADE akoa Mose hyɛeɛ no nyinaa, na wɔantie na wɔanyɛ.

Na Yudahene Hesekia soma maa wɔkɔɔ Asiriahene nkyɛn wɔ Lakis sɛ: Mayɛ bɔne; sane firi me so, na deɛ wode bɛto me soɔ no, mɛsoa. Na Asiriahene hyɛɛ sɛ Yudahene Hesekia ntua dwetɛ dwetikɛseɛ ahasa ne sika dwetikɛseɛ aduasa.
Na Hesekia de dwetɛ a wɔhunuu no AWURADE fie ne ahemfie akoradeɛ mu no nyinaa mae.
Ɛberɛ no mu na Hesekia twitwaa AWURADE aban apono ne adum ho sika a Yudahene Hesekia de duraduraa ho no, na ɔde maa Asiriahene.

Ɛnna Asiriahene somaa ne sahene anaa Tartan, ne piafoɔ panin anaa Rabsaris, ne nsahyɛfoɔ panin anaa Rabsake no firi Lakis ne dɔm a emu yɛ duro baa Ɔhene Hesekia so wɔ Yerusalem; na wɔforo baa Yerusalem. Na wɔforo baeɛ no, wɔbɛgyinaa atifi tareɛ a ɛwɔ Ntomasifoɔ Asasewa no tempɔn ho no suka ho.
Na wɔbɛfrɛɛ ɔhene. Ɛnna Hilkia ba Eliakim a ɔdi efie no soɔ ne Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Sebna ne Ɔsɛnkaefoɔ Asaf ba Yoa firii adi kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn.
Na Rabsake no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monka nkyerɛ Hesekia sɛ: Sɛ ɔhenkɛseɛ no, Asiria hene no seɛ nie: Ɛdeɛn koraa na wode wo ho to soɔ yi?
Wosusu sɛ anosɛm nko yɛ akodie ho nyansa ne mmaninyɛ! Na afei, hwan so na wode wo ho toɔ a enti wote me so atua yi?
Afei, hwɛ, wode wo ho to demmire a abuo yi so, ɛne Misraim a sɛ obi twere no a, ɛwɔ ne nsam hwire mu! Saa na Misraimhene Farao teɛ ma wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ne soɔ nyinaa.

Na sɛ moka kyerɛ me sɛ: AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn so na yɛde yɛn ho toɔ a, ɛnyɛ ɔno na Hesekia ayi ne sorɔnsorɔmmea ne n’afɔrebukyia, na wase Yuda ne Yerusalem sɛ: Afɔrebukyia a ɛwɔ Yerusalem yi anim na monsɔreɛ?
Na afei bra na ɛne me wura Asiriahene nto nkyea ɛ, na mɛma wo apɔnkɔ mpem mmienu, sɛ wobɛtumi anya nnipa atenatena wɔn so anaa.
Na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔfoɔ nti, wode wo ho akɔto Misraim soɔ yi, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woadane me wura nkoa nketewa mu safohene baako ani?
Afei, mekwatii AWURADE na mebaa ha yi sɛ merebɛsɛe ha anaa? AWURADE na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Tu kɔ asase yi so kɔsɛe no.
Na Hilkia ba Eliakim ne Sebna ne Yoa ka kyerɛɛ Rabsake no sɛ: Ɛne wo nkoa nka Aramaik kasa, na yɛn deɛ, yɛte, na ɛne yɛn nnka Yuda kasa a nkurɔfoɔ a wɔreboa ɔfasuo no toɔ no teɛ mu.
Na Rabsake no bisaa wɔn sɛ: Wo wura ne wo nkyɛn na me wura somaa me sɛ memmɛka nsɛm yi anaa? Ɛnyɛ mmarima a wɔtete ɔfasuo soɔ yi nkyɛn sɛ wɔnni wɔn ara wɔn sɛbeɛ na wɔnnom wɔn dwonsɔ sɛ mo ara?
Ɛnna Rabsake no gyinaeɛ na ɔde ɛnne kɛseɛ teaa mu Yuda kasa mu kaa sɛ: Montie ɔhenkɛseɛ no, Asiriahene no asɛm:
Sɛ ɔhene seɛ nie: Mommma Hesekia nnaadaa mo, na ɔrentumi nnye mo mfiri ne nsam,
nso mommma Hesekia mmma mommfa mo ho nnto AWURADE so sɛ: Gyeɛ na AWURADE bɛgye yɛn, na wɔremfa kuro yi nhyɛ Asiriahene nsa.
Monntie Hesekia, na sɛ Asiriahene seɛ nie: Mo ne me nni asomdwoeɛsɛm, na momfiri mmra me nkyɛn, na monni mo bobe ne mo borɔdɔma no bi, na monnom mo mmura mu nsuo

nkɔsi sɛ mɛba mabɛfa mo akɔ asase a ɛte sɛ mo asase yi soɔ, ayuo ne nsa asase, aduane ne bobe nturo asase, ngodua ne ɛwoɔ asase so, na moanya nkwa na moanwu. Na sɛ Hesekia to mo tɛkyerɛmakyene sɛ: AWURADE bɛgye yɛn a, monntie.
Amanaman anyame no mu bi agye n’asase afiri Asiriahene nsam pɛn?
Ɛhe na Hamat ne Arpad anyame no wɔ? Ɛhe na Sefarwaim, Hena ne Iwa anyame no wɔ? Wɔagye Samaria me nsam?
Nsase no so anyame nyinaa mu hwannom na wɔagye wɔn nsase afiri me nsam, na AWURADE bɛgye Yerusalem afiri me nsam anaa?
Na ɔman no muaa wɔn ano, na wɔammua no asɛm biara, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ ɔhene asɛm a ɔhyɛɛ sɛ: Mommmua no!
Ɛnna Hilkia ba Eliakim a na ɔdi efie no soɔ no ne Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Sebna ne Asaf ba Ɔsɛnkaefoɔ Yoa de wɔn ntadeɛ a wɔasunsuane mu baa Hesekia nkyɛn bɛkaa Rabsake no nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no.
Na ɔsomaa Eliakim a na ɔdi efie no soɔ ne Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Sebna ne asɔfoɔ mu mpanimfoɔ a wɔfirafira ayitoma kɔɔ Amos ba Odiyifoɔ Yesaia nkyɛn,
na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ Hesekia seɛ nie: Ahohiahia ne asotwe ne nsopa da ne nnɛ, na mma aduru awotwaa ano, na ahoɔden nni hɔ a wɔde bɛwo wɔn.

Ebia AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛte Rabsake no a ne wura Asiria hene asoma no sɛ ɔmmɛsopa Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nsɛm, na nsɛm a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ateɛ no nti, watwe n’aso. Enti ma wo mpaebɔ so ma nnipa nkaeɛ a wɔwɔ hɔ no.
Na Ɔhene Hesekia nkoa no baa Yesaia nkyɛn.
Na Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ monka nkyerɛ mo wura nie: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Nsuro nsɛm a woteeɛ a Asiriahene nkoa de abɛya me no anim.
Hwɛ, mede honhom bi bɛhyɛ ne mu, na wate nsɛm bi, na wasane akɔ n’asase so, na mama no atɔ nkrantɛ ano n’asase so.
Na Rabsake no sanee, na ɔkɔtoo Asiriahene sɛ ɔne Libna reko, ɛfiri sɛ na wate sɛ watu afiri Lakis.
Na ɔtee Etiopiahene Tirhaka nka sɛ: Hwɛ, watu ne wo rebɛko. Na ɔsane somaa abɔfoɔ baa Hesekia nkyɛn bio sɛ:
Sɛ monkɔka nkyerɛ Yudahene Hesekia nie: Mma wo Nyankopɔn a wode wo ho ato ne soɔ no nnaadaa wo sɛ: Wɔremfa Yerusalem nhyɛ Asiriahene nsa.
Hwɛ, wo ara woate deɛ Asiria ahemfo ayeyɛ nsase nyinaa, asɛe no pasapasa no, na wo na wɔbɛgye woɔ anaa?
Amanaman a m’agyanom asɛe wɔn, Gosan, Haran, Resef ne Edenfoɔ a wɔwɔ Telasar no anyame no gyee wɔn anaa?
Ɛhe na Hamathene, Arpadhene, Sefarwaim kuro, Hena ne Iwahene no wɔ?
Na Hesekia gyee nwoma no abɔfoɔ no nsam, na ɔkenkanee; na ɔforo kɔɔ AWURADE fie, na Hesekia trɛɛ mu too AWURADE anim.
Na Hesekia bɔɔ AWURADE anim mpaeɛ sɛ: AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn a wote Kerubim soɔ, wo nko wone Onyankopɔn asase so ahennie nyinaa mu; wo na woyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase.
Brɛ w’aso ase, AWURADE, na tie! Bue w’ani, AWURADE, na hwɛ! Na tie Sanaherib nsɛm a wasoma sɛ wɔmfa mmɛsopa wo, Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no.
Ɛwom, AWURADE, Asiria ahemfo asɛe amanaman ne wɔn nsase,
na wɔatoto wɔn anyame agu ogya mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnyɛ anyame, na ɛyɛ onipa nsa ano adwuma, dua ne ɔboɔ nko ara, na wɔasɛe wɔn.
Enti afei, AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn, gye yɛn firi ne nsam, na asase so ahennie nyinaa nhunu sɛ wo, AWURADE, ne Onyankopɔn, wo nkutoo ara nko!
Ɛnna Amos ba Yesaia soma maa wɔkɔɔ Hesekia nkyɛn sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn seɛ nie: Deɛ wobɔɔ me ɛho mpaeɛ Asiriahene Sanaherib ho no, mate.
Yei ne asɛm a AWURADE aka agu ne soɔ no:
Ɔbaabunu Sion babaa no
bu wo animtia yi wo ahi,
Yerusalem babaa
rewoso ne ti wɔ w’akyiri.
Hwan na woasopa no na woaya no?
Na hwan so na woama
wo nne soɔ na woama w’ani atra wo ntɔn?
Wode atia Israel Kronkronni no.
W’abɔfoɔ so na wonam asopa AWURADE,
na woaka sɛ: Mede me nteaseɛnam dodoɔ no
maforo kɔ mmepɔ atifi
Lebanon mu nohoa tɔnn;
na mɛtwitwa ne ntweneduro atentene
ne pepeaa a ɛyɛ fɛ no agu na makɔduru,
n’atenaeɛ a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri,
ne kwaeɛbirentuo mu.
Me na matutu mmura
manom amannɔne nsuo,
na mede me nammuromu mawe
Misraim nsubɔntene nyinaa.
Adɛn wontee,
sɛ mefiri meyɛeɛ akyɛreɛ?
Na mefiri tete mmerɛ mu
na mehyɛɛ no saa, na mama no aba mu,
sɛ wɔnsɛe nkuro a afasuo atwa ho ahyia
mma no nnanedane akurofo akuakuo,
na emufoɔ no, wɔn nsa anso hwee yɛ,
wɔn akoma tui na wɔn ani wui,
wɔdanedanee mfofowa so ahahan
ne wira mono,
adan atifi wira ne ayuo a
amma ne ho soɔ na ahoa.
Na menim w’asetena,
ne w’adifire ne wo muba no,
ɛne wo dam a wobɔ no me soɔ no.
Ɛsiane sɛ wobɔ me so dam,
na w’ahantan aforo abɛduru m’aso mu nti,
mede me kawa bɛhyɛ wo hwenem
na mede me nnareka bɛto w’ano mu,
na masane wo afa ɔkwan a wonam
so baeɛ no so akɔ.

Na yei nyɛ wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ: Afe yi mu monni ntwakaeɛ a ɛfifiriiɛ, na afe a ɛtɔ so mmienu no mu, deɛ ɛbɛdi akyire aba. Na afe a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mu no, mongu na montwa, na montɛ bobe nturo, na monni mu aba.
Na Yuda fie mu wɔn a wɔagye wɔn afiri mu a wɔaka no, wɔn ase bɛgye nhini bio, na wɔaso aba wɔ soro.
Na Yerusalem na nnipa nkaeɛ bi bɛfire, na nnipa a wɔafiri mu anya nkwa nso afiri Sion bepɔ so, AWURADE ninkuntwe na ɛbɛyɛ yei.
Enti sɛ AWURADE se Asiriahene ho nie: Ɔremma kuro yi mu, na ɔrento agyan mma ha, na ɔremfa ɛkyɛm mmɛhyia no, na ɔrenhɔre pie ntia no.
Ɔkwan a ɔnam so baeɛ no so na ɔnam bɛsane akorɔ, na kuro yi deɛ, ɔremma mu, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Na mɛbɔ kuro yi ho ban na magye no, me ara ne m’akoa Dawid nti!
Na anadwo no ara AWURADE bɔfoɔ firi kɔkumm Asiria nsra mu nnipa mpemha aduɔwɔtwe nnum; na wɔsɔree anɔpa no, na hwɛ, na wɔn nyinaa yɛ awufoɔ afunu.
Ɛnna Asiriahene Sanaherib sii mu saneeɛ, na ɔkɔtenaa Ninewe.
Na ɔresɔre ne nyame Nisrok fie no, ne mma Adramelek ne Sareser de nkrantɛ kumm no, na wɔfiri hɔ dwane kɔɔ Ararat asase so. Na ne ba Esarhadon bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Ɛnna Hesekia danee n’ani kyerɛɛ ɔfasuo, na ɔbɔɔ AWURADE mpaeɛ sɛ:
Ao, AWURADE, kae sɛdeɛ manante w’anim nokorɛ ne akoma a ɛyɛ pɛ mu, na mayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ wɔ w’ani soɔ. Na Hesekia suu esu kɛseɛ.
Na ɛbaa sɛ, Yesaia nnya mfirii mfimfini abannwa no mu no, AWURADE asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ:

Sane kɔka kyerɛ Hesekia, me man so hwɛfoɔ no sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE, w’agya Dawid Nyankopɔn seɛ nie: Mate wo mpaebɔ, mahunu wo nisuo, hwɛ, me na mɛsa wo yadeɛ. Da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no wobɛforo akɔ AWURADE fie.
Na mede mfirinhyia dunum bɛto wo nna so, na mɛgye wo ne kuro yi afiri Asiriahene nsam, na mabɔ kuro yi ho ban, me ara ne m’akoa Dawid nti.
Na Yesaia se: Momfa borɔdɔma a wɔabɔ no ɛtoa mmra. Na momfa ntare mpɔmpɔ no so na ɔnya nkwa.
Na Hesekia bisaa Yesaia sɛ: Ɛdeɛn ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ sɛ AWURADE bɛsa me yadeɛ, na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no mɛkɔ AWURADE fie?
Na Yesaia se: Yei nyɛ wo AWURADE nsam nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ sɛ AWURADE bɛyɛ adeɛ a waka no: Sunsum no nkɔ anim ntwedeɛ du anaasɛ ɛnsane n’akyi ntwedeɛ du?
Na Hesekia se: Ɛyɛ mmerɛ ma sunsum sɛ ɛsiane ntwedeɛ du, dabi, na ma sunsum no nsane n’akyi ntwedeɛ du.
Ɛnna Odiyifoɔ Yesaia frɛɛ AWURADE, na ɔmaa sunsum no sane n’akyi ntwedeɛ du, Ahas owia dɔn so ntwedeɛ a asiane dada no so.
Ɛberɛ no mu no, Babelhene Baladan ba Merodak-baladan soma maa wɔde nwoma ne ayɛyɛdeɛ brɛɛ Hesekia, ɛfiri sɛ ɔtee sɛ Hesekia yareeɛ.

Na Hesekia tiee wɔn, na ɔkyerɛɛ wɔn n’akoradeɛ dan nyinaa, dwetɛ ne sika ne nnuhwam ne ngo pa ne n’akodeɛ dan nyinaa ne deɛ wɔhunu n’akoradeɛ mu nyinaa. Biribiara nni ne fie ne deɛ ɔdi soɔ nyinaa mu a Hesekia amfa ankyerɛ wɔn.
Ɛnna Odiyifoɔ Yesaia baa Ɔhene Hesekia nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ: Nnipa yi se sɛn, na ɛhe na wɔfiri baa wo nkyɛn yi? Na Hesekia se: Wɔfiri akyirikyiri asase bi so na ɛbaeɛ, wɔfiri Babel.
Na ɔbisaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na wɔahunu wɔ wo fie? Na Hesekia buaa sɛ: Deɛ ɛwɔ me fie nyinaa, wɔahunu; biribiara nni m’akoradeɛ mu a mamfa mankyerɛ wɔn.
Na Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ Hesekia sɛ: Tie AWURADE asɛm:
Hwɛ, nna bi reba a wɔbɛsoa deɛ ɛwɔ wo fie nyinaa ne deɛ w’agyanom akora de abɛsi nnɛ yi akɔ Babel; biribiara renka, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Na wo mma a wɔfiri wo mu a woawo wɔn no mu binom, wɔbɛfa wɔn na wɔakɔyɛ Babel hene aban mu apiafoɔ.
Ɛnna Hesekia ka kyerɛɛ Yesaia sɛ: AWURADE asɛm a woaka no, ɛyɛ. Na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ sɛ asomdwoeɛ ne nokorɛ na ɛbɛwɔ hɔ me nna mu?
Na Hesekia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne ne mmaninneɛ nyinaa ne sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ tareɛ ne suka na ɔde nsuo no baa kuro no mu no, wɔatwerɛ no Yuda Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu.
Na Hesekia tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na ne ba Manase bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne sɛ amanaman a AWURADE tuu wɔn firii Israelfoɔ anim no akyiwadeɛ.
Na ɔsane sisii sorɔnsorɔmmea a n’agya Hesekia sɛesɛee no na ɔsisii afɔrebukyia maa Baal, na ɔyɛɛ Asera nnua sɛdeɛ Israelhene Ahab yɛeɛ no, na ɔsɔree ɔsoro asafo nyinaa na ɔsom wɔn.
Na ɔsisii afɔrebukyia AWURADE fie a AWURADE kaa ho asɛm sɛ: Yerusalem na mede me din bɛto hɔ, no mu.
Na ɔsisii afɔrebukyia maa ɔsoro asafo nyinaa AWURADE fie abannwa mmienu no so.
Na ɔmaa ne babarima faa ogya mu de bɔɔ afɔdeɛ, na ɔyɛɛ abayideɛ ne adebisadeɛ, na ɔhyehyɛɛ asamanfrɛfoɔ ne adunsinfoɔ, ɔmaa bɔne a ɔyɛeɛ no dɔɔso AWURADE ani so de huruu ne bo.
Na ɔde Asera ohoni a ɔyɛeɛ no sii efie no mu, efie a AWURADE kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Dawid ne ne ba Salomo no sɛ: Efie yi ne Yerusalem na mayi Israel mmusuakuo nyinaa mu na mede me din bɛto daa.
Nanso meremma Israel nan ntu nkyini mfiri asase a mede mama wɔn agyanom no so bio. Na deɛ wɔnyɛ nkutoo ne sɛ wɔhwɛ yɛ sɛdeɛ mahyɛ wɔn nyinaa ne sɛdeɛ mmara a m’akoa Mose hyɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa teɛ.
Nanso wɔantie, na Manase de wɔn yerae maa wɔyɛɛ bɔne sene amanaman a AWURADE sɛee wɔn firii Israel soɔ no.
Na AWURADE nam ne nkoa adiyifoɔ no so kaa sɛ:
Ɛsiane sɛ Yudahene Manase ayɛ saa akyiwadeɛ yi, na wayɛ bɔne asene deɛ Amorifoɔ a wɔdii n’anim yɛeɛ nyinaa, na ɔde n’abosonhuhuo ama Yuda nso ayɛ bɔne nti,
sɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn seɛ nie: Hwɛ, mede bɔne mereba Yerusalem ne Yuda so a obiara a ɔbɛteɛ no, n’aso mmienu mu bɛyɛ no kyeoo.
Na mɛtwe Samaria susuhoma mu, ne Ahab fie so taahoma mu aba Yerusalem so, na mɛpepa Yerusalem mu sɛdeɛ wɔpepa ayowa mu, wɔpepa na wɔdane butuo;
na mɛpo m’agyapadeɛ nkaeɛ no, na mede wɔn ahyɛ wɔn atamfoɔ nsa, na wɔayɛ fonam ne fomfa adeɛ ama wɔn atamfoɔ nyinaa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔayɛ m’ani so bɔne na wɔahuru me bo firi da a wɔn agyanom firii Misraim baeɛ de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Manase ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne bɔne a ɔyɛeɛ no, wɔatwerɛ no Yuda Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu.
Na Manase tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no ne fie turo a ɛne Usa turo no mu; na ne ba Amon bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Amon bɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduonu mmienu, na ɔdii hene mfeɛ mmienu Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Mesulemet a ɔyɛ Harus a ɔfiri Yotba ba.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne sɛdeɛ n’agya Manase yɛeɛ no,
na ɔnantee ɔkwan a n’agya nantee mu no nyinaa mu, na ɔsom abosonhuhuo a n’agya someeɛ no, na ɔsɔree wɔn;
na ɔgyaa AWURADE n’agyanom Nyankopɔn, na wannante AWURADE kwan mu.
Na Amon nkoa pam ne tiri so, na wɔkumm ɔhene no wɔ ne fie.
Na asase no sofoɔ no kunkumm wɔn a wɔpamm Ɔhene Amon tiri soɔ no nyinaa, na asase no sofoɔ no de ne ba Yosia sii hene n’ananmu.
Na Amon ho nsɛm nkaeɛ, deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu?
Na wɔsiee no ne da mu, Usa turom, na ne ba Yosia bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so, na ɔnantee n’agya Dawid kwan nyinaa mu, na wammane ankɔ nifa anaa benkum.
Na Ɔhene Yosia afe a ɛtɔ so dunwɔtwe no mu no, ɔhene somaa Mesulam ba Asalia ba Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Safan maa no kɔɔ AWURADE fie sɛ:
Kɔ ɔsɔfo panin Hilkia nkyɛn, na ɔmmu sika a wɔde baa AWURADE fie a ɛpono ano ahwɛfoɔ aboa ano afiri ɔman no nsam no ho nkonta mma wo,
na wɔmfa nhyɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma no a wɔde wɔn asisi AWURADE fie soɔ no nsam, na wɔmfa mma AWURADE fie mu adwumayɛfoɔ no sɛ wɔnsiesie efie no mu adango no,
ne nnua adwumfoɔ ne adansifoɔ ne abantofoɔ no, na wɔmfa ntotɔ nnua ne aboɔ a wɔatwa, na wɔmfa nsiesie efie no;
nanso wɔne wɔn mmmu sika a wɔde ahyɛ wɔn nsa no ho nkonta, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ no nokorɛ mu.
Na Ɔsɔfo panin Hilkia ka kyerɛɛ Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Safan sɛ: Mahunu mmara nwoma no AWURADE fie. Na Hilkia de nwoma no maa Safan, na ɔkenkanee.
Na Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Safan baa ɔhene nkyɛn, na ɔde mu asɛm brɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: Wo nkoa ahwie sika a wɔhunuu no efie no mu no agu hɔ, na wɔde ahyɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma no a wɔde wɔn asisi AWURADE fie soɔ no nsa.
Na Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Safan bɔɔ din kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: Ɔsɔfoɔ Hilkia de nwoma bi ama me. Na Safan kenkanee no ɔhene anim.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene tee mmara nwoma no mu nsɛm no, ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu.
Na ɔhene hyɛɛ Ɔsɔfoɔ Hilkia ne Safan ba Ahikam ne Mikaia ba Akbor ne Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Safan ne ɔhene akoa Asaia sɛ:

Monkɔ nkɔbisa AWURADE mma me, ne ɔman yi ne Yuda nyinaa, nwoma a moahunu yi mu nsɛm no nti, na AWURADE abufuhyeɛ a adɛre atia yɛn no yɛ kɛseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ yɛn agyanom antie nwoma yi mu nsɛm no, sɛ wɔbɛyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no yɛn ho no.

Na Ɔsɔfoɔ Hilkia ne Ahikam ne Akbor ne Safan ne Asaia kɔɔ Odiyifoɔ baa Hulda a ɔyɛ Harhas ba Tikwa ba, ntadeɛ sohwɛfoɔ Salum yere nkyɛn, (nso na ɔte Yerusalem Fa a ɛtɔ so Mmienu mu), na wɔne no kasae.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn seɛ nie: Monkɔka nkyerɛ ɔbarima a ɔsomaa mo me nkyɛn no sɛ:
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Hwɛ, mede bɔne bɛba ha ne ɛhafoɔ so, sɛdeɛ nwoma a Yuda hene akenkan no mu nsɛm nyinaa teɛ,
ɛsiane sɛ wɔagya me, na wɔakɔhye aduhwam ama anyame foforɔ, sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa ano adwuma nyinaa rehuru me bo, enti m’abufuhyeɛ bɛdɛre atia ha yi, na ɛrennum.
Na Yuda hene a ɔsomaa mo sɛ mommɛbisa AWURADE no deɛ, sɛ monka nkyerɛ no nie: Sɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn seɛ nie: Nsɛm a woateɛ no deɛ,

ɛsiane sɛ w’akoma yɛ bɛtɛɛ na woabrɛ wo ho ase AWURADE anim, sɛ wotee deɛ maka no, ɛha yi ne ɛhafoɔ ho, sɛ wɔbɛdane amamfo ne nnome, na woasunsuane wo ntadeɛ mu na woasu m’anim nti, me nso mate, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Enti hwɛ, wobɛtoa w’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔasie wo damena mu asomdwoeɛ mu, na w’ani renhunu ɔhaw a mede reba ha yi soɔ no nyinaa. Na wɔde asɛm no bɛsee ɔhene.

Na ɔhene kɔɔ AWURADE fie, na Yuda mmarima nyinaa ne Yerusalemfoɔ nyinaa ne asɔfoɔ ne adiyifoɔ ne ɔman mu no nyinaa, ɛfiri nketewa so kɔsi akɛseɛ soɔ ka ne ho. Na ɔkenkanee apam nwoma a wɔhunuu no AWURADE fie no mu nsɛm no nyinaa guu wɔn nyinaa aso mu.

Na ɔhene gyinaa simpie no so, na ɔyɛɛ apam wɔ AWURADE anim, sɛ ɔde n’akoma nyinaa ne ne kra nyinaa bɛdi AWURADE akyi, na wadi ne mmara nsɛm ne n’adansesɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ so, sɛ ɔbɛma apam yi mu nsɛm a wɔatwerɛ no nwoma yi mu no atim. Na ɔman no nyinaa gyinaa apam no so hyɛɛ bɔ.

Na ɔtutuu asɔfoɔ hunu a Yuda ahemfo sisiiɛ a wɔhyee nnuhwam Yuda nkuro mu, ne Yerusalem ho sorɔnsorɔmmea soɔ, ne wɔn a wɔhyee nnuhwam maa Baal ne owia ne ɔsrane ne ɔsoro-nsoromma ne ɔsoro asafo no nyinaa.
Na ɔyii Asera no firii AWURADE fie de firii Yerusalem kɔɔ Kidron subonhwa ho, na ɔhyee no Kidron subonhwa mu, na ɔyam no sɛ mfuturo na ɔde ne mfuturo no guu nkurɔfoɔ mma adamena so.
Na ɔbubuu nnwaman adan a ɛwɔ AWURADE fie, a mmaa nwonoo ntwamutam maa Asera wɔ mu no.

Na ɔkɔfaa asɔfoɔ no nyinaa firii Yuda nkuro mu bae, na ɔguu sorɔnsorɔmmea a asɔfoɔ no hyee hɔ nnuhwam no ho fi, firi Geba kɔsii Beer-seba, na ɔdwirii sorɔnsorɔmmea a ɛwɔ deɛ wɔfa hyɛne Kuro no so hwɛfoɔ Yosua pono a ɛwɔ kuro pono no mu benkum soɔ no.
Nanso sorɔnsorɔmmea asɔfoɔ no ammɔ AWURADE afɔrebukyia so afɔdeɛ Yerusalem, na wɔdii apiti no bi, wɔn nuanom mu.
Na ɔguu Tofet
Na ɔyii apɔnkɔ a Yuda ahemfo de ama owia no, AWURADE fie no ano, de kɔɔ opiani Natan-melek da a ɛwɔ akyire abannwa mu no ho, na owia nteaseɛnam no, ɔde ogya hyee.

Na afɔrebukyia a ɛwɔ Ahas abansorodan atifi a Yuda ahemfo sisiiɛ ne afɔrebukyia a Manase sisii no AWURADE fie abannwa mmienu no soɔ no, ɔhene dwirii, na ɔyi firii hɔ, na ɔde ne mfuturo kɔguu Kidron subonhwa mu.

Na sorɔnsorɔmmea a ɛwɔ Yerusalem anim a ɛwɔ ɔsɛeɛ bepɔ nifa soɔ a Israelhene Salomo si maa Sidonfoɔ Astoret a ɛyɛ akyiwadeɛ ne Moabfoɔ Kemos, a ɛyɛ akyiwadeɛ ne Amon mma Milkom a ɛyɛ atantanneɛ no, ɔhene guu ho fi.
Na ɔbubuu adum no, na ɔtwitwaa Asera nnua no, na ɔde nnipa nnompe guguu ananmu.

Na Yosia danee ne ho na ɔhunuu adamena a ɛwowɔ bepɔ no so hɔ no, na ɔsoma maa wɔkɔfaa nna no mu nnompe bɛhyee no afɔrebukyia no so guu ho fi, sɛ AWURADE asɛm a Nyankopɔn nipa a ɔkaa nsɛm yi no paee mu kaeɛ no teɛ.
Ɛnna ɔbisaa sɛ: Nkaeɛ boɔ bɛn na ɛwɔ hɔ a mehunu yi? Na kuro no mufoɔ ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛyɛ Nyankopɔn nipa a ɔfirii Yuda baeɛ, na ɔbɛkaa adeɛ a woayɛ Betel afɔrebukyia yi no damena.
Na ɔse: Momma no nna hɔ, mma obiara nnhwanyan ne nnompe. Enti wɔanka ne nnompe ne odiyifoɔ a ɔfiri Samaria no nnompe.
Na sorɔnsorɔmmea adan a ɛwɔ Samaria nkuro mu a Israel ahemfo yeyɛeɛ sɛ wɔde rehuru AWURADE bo no nyinaa nso, Yosia yiyi kɔe, na ɔyɛɛ no sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ no Betel no ara.
Na ɔde sorɔnsorɔmmea asɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa bobɔɔ afɔrebukyia no so afɔdeɛ, na ɔhyehyee nnipa nnompe wɔ wɔn so na ɔsane baa Yerusalem.
Na ɛfiri atemmufoɔ a wɔbuu Israel atɛn no berɛ so, ne Israel ahemfo ne Yuda ahemfo nna nyinaa na wɔnnii Twam bi sɛ yei,
gye Ɔhene Yosia afe a ɛtɔ so dunwɔtwe no mu na wɔdii Twam yi maa AWURADE wɔ Yerusalem.
Na ne nsɛso hene bi anni n’anim a ɔde n’akoma nyinaa ne ne kra nyinaa ne n’ahoɔden nyinaa dane baa AWURADE nkyɛn sɛ Mose mmara no kyerɛ no, na n’akyiri nso obi ansɔre a ɔte sɛ ɔno.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Mɛyi Yuda nso afiri m’anim, sɛdeɛ meyii Israel no, na mapo Yerusalem kuro a mafa yi ne efie a mekaa sɛ: Me din bɛtena hɔ, no.
Na Yosia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda Ahemfo Berɛsosɛm Nwoma no mu.
Ne berɛ so na Misraimhene Farao Neko tu ba bɛnee Asiriahene koeɛ Eufrate asubɔnten ho. Na Ɔhene Yosia sii mu kɔhyiaa no. Na Yosia bɛtoo no no, Asiria hene kumm no Megido.
Na ne nkoa twee ne funu no teaseɛnam mu firi Megido de no baa Yerusalem, na wɔsiee no ne da mu. Na asase no sofoɔ no faa Yosia ba Yehoahas sraa no sii no hene n’agya ananmu.
Yehoahas bɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduonu mmiɛnsa, na ɔdii hene abosome mmiɛnsa wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Hamutal a ɔyɛ Yeremia a ɔfiri Libna babaa.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne sɛdeɛ n’agyanom yɛeɛ no ara.
Na Farao Neko kyekyeree no Ribla, Hamat asase so sɛ ɔnnni Yerusalem so hene, na ɔde dwetɛ dwetikɛseɛ ha ne sika dwetikɛseɛ baako toɔ too asase no so.
Na Farao Neko de Yosia ba Eliakim sii hene n’agya Yosia ananmu, na ɔsakyeraa ne din too no Yehoiakim. Na Yehoahas deɛ, ɔfaa no kɔɔ Misraim, na ɔkɔwuu wɔ hɔ.

Na dwetɛ ne sika no, Yehoiakim de maa Farao, nanso ɔbɔɔ asase no boɔ sɛ wɔmma sika no sɛdeɛ Farao kaeɛ no, obiara sɛdeɛ ne boɔbɔ teɛ no, ɔgyee dwetɛ ne sika no firii asase no so nkurɔfoɔ no nkyɛn, sɛ ɔde rekɔma Farao Neko.
Yehoiakim bɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduonu nnum, na ɔdii hene mfeɛ dubaako Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Sebuda a ɔyɛ Pedaia a ɔfiri Ruma babaa.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne sɛdeɛ n’agyanom yɛeɛ no ara.
Na AWURADE somaa Kaldeafoɔ asafo ne Siriafoɔ asafo ne Moabfoɔ asafo ne Amon asafo baa ne so, na ɔsomaa wɔn baa Yuda so sɛ wɔmmɛsɛe no, sɛdeɛ AWURADE asɛm a ɔnam ne nkoa adiyifoɔ so kaeɛ no teɛ no.
AWURADE anomu asɛm nko so na yei nam baa Yuda soɔ, sɛ ɔbɛyi wɔn afiri n’anim, Manase bɔne nti, sɛ deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa,
ne mogya a ɛdi bem nso a ɔka guiɛ, na ɔde mogya a ɛdi bem hyɛɛ Yerusalem ma no nti. Na AWURADE ampɛ sɛ ɔde kyɛ.
Na Yehoiakim ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu?
Na Yehoiakim tii n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na ne ba Yehoiakyin bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Misraimhene amfiri n’asase so amma bio, ɛfiri sɛ na Babel hene agye deɛ ɛyɛ Misraimhene dea nyinaa afiri Misraim subonhwa ano kɔsi Eufrate asubɔnten ho.
Yehoiakyin bɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia dunwɔtwe, na ɔdii hene abosome mmiɛnsa wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Nehusta a ɔyɛ Elnatan a ɔfiri Yerusalem babaa.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, sɛdeɛ n’agyanom yɛeɛ no ara.
Ɛberɛ no mu na Babelhene Nebukadnessar nkoa tu baa Yerusalem, na wɔtuaa kuro no.
Na Babelhene Nebukadnessar baa kuro no so, nso na ne nkoa aka no ahyɛ mu.
Ɛnna Yudahene Yehoiakyin de ne ho kɔmaa Babel hene, ɔno ne ne na ne ne nkoa ne ne mmapɔmma, ne n’apiafoɔ. Na Babel hene faa no, n’ahennie afe a ɛtɔ so nwɔtwe no mu.
Na ɔkɔfaa AWURADE fie akoradeɛ nyinaa ne ahemfie akoradeɛ firi hɔ kɔe, na ɔtwitwaa sika nnoɔma a Israelhene Salomo yɛɛ no AWURADE aban mu no ho sika, sɛdeɛ AWURADE kaeɛ no.
Na ɔtuu Yerusalem nyinaa ne mmapɔmma nyinaa ne mmarima a wɔbɛtumi nyinaa kɔe, nnipa mpem du na ɔde wɔn kɔeɛ; adwumfoɔ ne atomfoɔ nyinaa ka ho, na wɔannya obiara, gye asase no so nkurɔfoɔ ahiafoɔ nko.
Na ɔtuu Yehoiakyin kɔɔ Babel; na ɔhene na ne ɔhene yerenom ne n’apiafoɔ ne asase no so atumfoɔ, ɔtuu wɔn firii Yerusalem de wɔn kɔɔ Babel,
ne mmarima akofoɔ nyinaa, mpemnson, ne adwumfoɔ ne atomfoɔ apem, wɔn nyinaa mmarima a wɔtumi kɔ ɔsa, na Babel hene tuu wɔn de wɔn kɔɔ Babel.
Na Babel hene tuu Yehoiakyin adeɛ so, na ɔde n’agya nuabarima Matania a ɔsakyeraa ne din frɛɛ no Sedekia no sii n’anan.
Na ɔyɛɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne sɛ Yehoiakim yɛeɛ no ara.
Na ɛnam AWURADE abufuo so na ɔtuu Yerusalem ne Yuda firii n’anim guiɛ.
Na Sedekia tee Babel hene so atua.
Na wɔtuaa kuro no kɔsii Ɔhene Sedekia afe a ɛtɔ so dubaako no mu.
Bosome a ɛtɔ so nnan da a ɛtɔ so nkron no, na ɛkɔm no mu ayɛ den kuro no mu, na aduane biara nni hɔ mma asase no so nkurɔfoɔ no.

Ɛnna wɔtuu kuro no fasuo mu tokuro, na ɔhene ne mmarima akofoɔ no nyinaa dwanee anadwo faa afasuo mmienu a ɛwɔ ɔhene turo ho no ntam pono mu kɔe; nso na Kaldeafoɔ no atwa kuro no ho ahyia; na wɔfaa Yordan bonhwa kwan so kɔe.
Na Kaldeafoɔ dɔm tii ɔhene no, na wɔkɔtoo no Yeriko mpaperɛ so, na ne dɔm nyinaa firii ne ho hwetee.
Na wɔkyeree ɔhene no de no kɔmaa Babel hene wɔ Ribla, na ɔbuu no atɛn.
Na wɔkunkumm Sedekia mmammarima n’anim, na wɔtutuu Sedekia ani, na wɔguu no nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn na wɔde no kɔɔ Babel.
Na bosome a ɛtɔ so nnum da a ɛtɔ so nson a ɛne Babelhene Nebukadnessar afe a ɛtɔ so dunkron mu no, ankɔbeahene Nebusaradan, Babelhene akoa no baa Yerusalem,
na ɔbɛhyee AWURADE fie ne ɔhene fie ne Yerusalem afie nyinaa, na ɔde ogya hyee afie akɛseɛ nyinaa.
Na Kaldeafoɔ dɔm a wɔka ankɔbeahene no ho no dwirii Yerusalem afasuo no hyiae.
Na nkurɔfoɔ no nkaeɛ a wɔkaa kuro no mu, ne wɔn a wɔwae kɔɔ Babel hene nkyɛn, ne nkurɔfoɔ yuu no mu nkaeɛ no, ankɔbeahene Nebusaradan faa wɔn kɔe.
Na asase no so ahiafoɔ no bi deɛ, ankɔbeahene no gyaa wɔn hɔ, sɛ wɔnyɛ bobeyɛfoɔ ne akuafoɔ.
Na nkukuo ne sesa adeɛ ne adumgya ne nyowaa ne kɔbere mfrafraeɛ nnoɔma a wɔde yɛɛ ɔsom adwuma no nyinaa, wɔfae.
Saa nsramma kukuwa ne nkoraa no, deɛ ɛyɛ sika no, sika, ne deɛ ɛyɛ dwetɛ no dwetɛ na ankɔbeahene no fa kɔeɛ.
Adum mmienu no, ɛpo baako no ne nsugyeɛ nnaka a Salomo yɛ maa AWURADE fie no, nnoɔma yi nyinaa kɔbere mfrafraeɛ no, wɔankari.

Adum no baako korɔn yɛ basafa dunwɔtwe, na ɛso duntire no yɛ kɔbere mfrafraeɛ, na duntire no korɔn yɛ basafa mmiɛnsa na ntentan ne atoaa aba nsɛsoɔ wowɔ duntire no ho hyia, ne nyinaa yɛ kɔbere mfrafraeɛ. Na saa na odum a ɛtɔ so mmienu no nso teɛ, ntentan no ho.
Na awɛmfoɔ panin no faa Ɔsɔfoɔ panin Seraia ne ɔsɔfoɔ a ɔdi soɔ, Sefania, ne apono ano hwɛfoɔ baasa,

na kuro no mu nso ɔfaa opiani baako a wɔde no sii akofoɔ no soɔ, ne ɔhene afotufoɔ mu mmarima baanum a wɔhunuu wɔn kuro no mu, ne ɔtwerɛfoɔ, ɔsahene a ɔpɔn asase no so nkurɔfoɔ kɔ ɔsa no, ne asase no so nkurɔfoɔ mu mmarima aduosia a wɔhunuu wɔn kuro no mu,
na ankɔbeahene Nebusaradan faa wɔn de wɔn kɔɔ Babel hene anim wɔ Ribla.
Na Babel hene bobɔɔ wɔn kunkumm wɔn Ribla wɔ Hamat asase so. Saa na wɔtuu Yuda firii wɔn asase soɔ.

Na dɔm no asafohene nyinaa, wɔn ne wɔn mmarima tee sɛ Babel hene de Gedalia asi ɔhwɛfoɔ no, wɔbaa Gedalia nkyɛn wɔ Mispa, Netania ba Ismael ne Karea ba Yohanan ne Netofani Tanhumet ba Seraia ne Maakatni bi ba Yaasania, wɔn ne wɔn mmarima.
Na Gedalia kaa wɔn ne wɔn mmarima ntam, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnsuro Kaldeafoɔ nkoa no, montena asase yi so, na monsom Babel hene, na ɛbɛwie mo yie.
Na bosome a ɛtɔ so nson no, Elisama ba Netania ba Ismael a ɔfiri ahemfo abusua mu bae, na mmarima du ka ne ho, na wɔbɛkum Gedalia ne Yudafoɔ ne Kaldeafoɔ a wɔka ne ho Mispa no nso.
Ɛnna nkurɔfoɔ no nyinaa, ɛfiri akumaa so kɔsi ɔkɛseɛ soɔ, ne dɔm so asafohene no, sɔre kɔɔ Misraim, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔsuro Kaldeafoɔ no.
na ɔne no kasaa kasa pa, na ɔmaa n’adwa so maa no kyɛnee ahemfo a wɔne no wɔ Babel no adwa,
na ɔmaa no yii n’afiase ntadeɛ, na ɔdidii n’anim daa ne nkwa nna nyinaa.
Na nnoɔma a ɛfiri ɔhene nkyɛn a wɔde ma no no, da biara no, wɔde maa no ne nkwa nna nyinaa.
Kenan, Mahalalel, Yared,
Hanok, Metusela, Lamek,
Noa, Sem, Ham ne Yafet.
Gomer mma ne: Askenas, Difat ne Togarma.
Na Yawan mma ne: Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim ne Rodanim.
Na Kus mma ne: Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Raama ne Sabteka. Na Raama mma ne: Seba ne Dedan.
Na Kus woo Nimrod, ɔno na ɔfirii aseɛ yɛɛ otumfoɔ asase soɔ.
Na Misraim woo Ludfoɔ, Anamfoɔ, Lehabfoɔ, Naftuhfoɔ,
Patrusfoɔ, Kasluhfoɔ a Filistifoɔ firi wɔn mu ne Kaftorfoɔ.
Na Kanaan woo n’abakan Sidon, Het,
Yebusini, Amorini, Girgasini,
Hiwini, Arkini, Sinini,
Arwadni, Semarini ne Hamatni.
Na Arfaksad woo Sela, na Sela woo Eber.
Na wɔwoo mma baanu maa Eber, ɔbaako din de Peleg, (na ne berɛ so na asase mu teteeɛ). Na ne nua din de Yoktan.
Na Yoktan woo Almodad, Selef, Hasarmawet, Yera
Hadoram, Usal, Dikla,
Ebal, Abimael, Seba,
Ofir, Hawila ne Yobab. Yeinom nyinaa ne Yoktan mma.
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Tera,
Abram, anaa Abraham.
Yeinom ne wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ: Ismael abakan Nebaiot; ne Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tema,
Yetur, Nafis ne Kedema. Yeinom ne Ismael mma.
Na Abraham mpena Ketura mma: Ɔwoo Simran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Yisbak ne Sua. Na Yoksan mma ne: Seba ne Dedan.
Na Midian mma ne: Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida ne Eldaa. Yeinom nyinaa ne Ketura mma.
Elifas mma ne: Teman, Omar, Sefi, Gatam, Kenas, Timna ne Amalek.
Reuel mma ne: Nahat, Sera, Sama ne Misa.
Na Lotan mma ne: Hori ne Homam. Na Lotan nuabaa ne Timna.
Sobal mma ne: Alian, Manahat, Ebal, Sefi ne Onam. Na Sibeon mma ne: Aya ne Ana.
Ana mma ne: Dison. Na Dison mma ne: Hamran, Esban, Yitran ne Keran.
Eser mma ne: Bilhan ne Saawan ne Yaakan. Dison mma ne: Us ne Aran.
Bela wui, na Sera ba Yobab a ɔfirii Bosra bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Yobab wui, na Husam a ɔfiri Teman asase soɔ bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Husam wui, na Bedad ba Hadad a ɔkum Midian, a ɛwɔ Moab no bɛdii n’adeɛ. Na ne kuro din de Awit.
Hadad wui na Samla a ɔfiri Masreka bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Samla wui, na Saulo a ɔfiri Rehobot a ɛda asuo ho bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Saulo wui, na Akbor ba Baal-hanan bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Baal-hanan wui, na Hadad bɛdii n’adeɛ. Na ne kuro din de Pai, na ne yere din de Mehetabel a ɔyɛ Matred ba Me-sahab babaa.
Na Hadad wui.
Na Edom atitire nie: Otitire Timna, Otitire Alia, Otitire Yetet,
Otitire Oholibama, Otitire Ela, Otitire Pinon,
Otitire Kenas, Otitire Teman, Otitire Mibsar,
Otitire Magdiel, Otitire Iram. Yeinom ne Edom atitire.
Dan, Yosef, Benyamin, Naftali, Gad ne Aser.
Na n’ase Tamar woo Peres ne Sera maa no. Na Yuda mma nyinaa yɛ baanum.
Na Sera mma ne: Simri, Etan, Heman, Kalkol ne Dara, wɔn nyinaa yɛ baanum.
Na Karmi mma ne: Israel hawfoɔ Akar a ɔfom ahyiradeɛ mu no.
Na Etan ba ne: Asaria.
Na Ram woo Aminadab, na Aminadab woo Nahson, Yuda mma bapɔmma no,
na Nahson woo Salma, na Salma woo Boas,
na Boas woo Obed, na Obed woo Yisai.
Na Yisai woo n’abakan Eliab ne Abinadab a ɔtɔ so mmienu ne Sima a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa,
Netanel tɔ so nnan, Radai tɔ so nnum,
Osem tɔ so nsia, Dawid tɔ so nson.
Na wɔn nua mmaanom ne Seruia ne Abigail; na Seruia mma ne Abisai, Yoab ne Asa-el. Wɔyɛ baasa.
Na Abigail woo Amasa, na Amasa n’agya ne Ismaelni Yeter.
Na Asuba wui, na Kaleb faa Efrat waree, na ɔwoo Hur maa no.
Na Hur woo Uri, na Uri woo Besalel.
Na akyire yi no Hesron kɔɔ Makir a ɔyɛ Gilead n’agya babaa ho, na ɔwaree no, nso na wadi mfirinhyia aduosia, na ɔwoo Segub maa no,
na Segub woo Yair, ɔno na Gilead asase so nkuro aduonu mmiɛnsa yɛɛ ne dea.
Na Gesur ne Aram gyee Yair atenaeɛ no firii wɔn nsam, Kenat ne ɛho nkurowa, ɛyɛ nkuro aduosia. Yeinom nyinaa yɛ Gilead n’agya Makir mma.
Na Hesron wuu wɔ Kaleb-Efrata akyiri no, Hesron yere Abia woo Ashur a ɔyɛ Tekoa n’agya maa no.
Na Yerahmeel wɔ yere foforɔ bi a ne din de Atara, ɔne Onam ne na.
Na Yerahmeel abakan Ram mma ne: Maas, Yamin ne Eker.
Na Onam mma ne: Samai ne Yada. Na Samai mma ne: Nadab ne Abisur.
Na Abisur yere din de Abihail, na ɔwoo Ahban ne Molid maa no.
Na Nadab mma ne: Seled ne Apaim, na Seled wui a wannya mma.
Na Apaim ba ne: Yisi. Na Yisi ba ne: Sesan. Na Sesan ba ne: Ahlai.
Na Samai nua Yada mma ne: Yeter ne Yonatan. Na Yeter wui a wannya mma.
Na Yonatan mma ne: Pelet ne Sasa. Yeinom ne Yerahmeel mma.
Na Sesan nni mmammarima gye sɛ mmammaa. Na Sesan wɔ akoa Misraimni bi a ne din de Yarha.
Na Sesan de ne babaa maa n’akoa Yarha awareɛ, na ɔwoo Atai maa no.
Na Atai woo Natan, na Natan woo Sabad.
Na Sabad woo Eflal, na Eflal woo Obed,
na Obed woo Yehu, na Yehu woo Asaria,
na Asaria woo Heles, na Heles woo Eleasa,
na Eleasa woo Sisemai, na Sisemai woo Salum,
na Salum woo Yekamia, na Yekamia woo Elisama.
Na Hebron mma ne: Kora ne Tapua ne Rekem ne Sema.
Na Sema woo Raham, Yorkeam agya. Na Rekem woo Samai.
Na Samai ba ne Maon. Na Maon yɛ Bet-sur agya.
Na Kaleb mpena Efa woo Haran ne Mosa ne Gases. Na Haran woo Gases.
Na Yahdai mma ne: Regem ne Yotam ne Gesan ne Pelet ne Efa ne Saaf.
Na Kaleb mpena Maaka woo Seber ne Tirhana,
na ɔwoo Saaf a ɔyɛ Madmana n’agya, Sewa a ɔyɛ Makbena n’agya, ne Gibea n’agya. Na Kaleb babaa ne Aksa.
Yeinom ne Kaleb mma.
Efrata abakan Hur mma ne: Sobal, Kiriat-yearim a ɔyɛ n’agya,
Salma a ɔyɛ Betlehem n’agya, Haref a ɔyɛ Bet-gader n’agya.
Na Sobal a ɔyɛ Kiriat-yearim n’agya wɔ mma, wɔne Haroe ne Menuhotfoɔ wɔ afa.
Na Kiriat-yearim mmusua ne Yitrifoɔ ne Putifoɔ ne Sumatifoɔ ne Misraimfoɔ deɛ no, yeinom mu na Sorafoɔ ne Estaolfoɔ fire.
Salma mma ne: Betlehem ne Netofafoɔ Atrot-bet-yoab ne Manahatfoɔ fa ne Sorifoɔ no
ne atwerɛfoɔ mmusua a wɔte Yabes no: Tirafoɔ, Simeafoɔ, Sukafoɔ. Wɔne Kinifoɔ a wɔyɛ Hamat a ɔyɛ Rekab fie agya no asefoɔ.
Deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa ne Absalom a ɔyɛ Gesurhene Talmai babaa Maaka ba. Deɛ ɔtɔ so nnan ne Adoniya a ɔyɛ Hagit ba.
Deɛ ɔtɔ so nnum ne Sefatia a ɔyɛ Abital ba. Deɛ ɔtɔ so nsia ne Yitream a ɔyɛ ne yere Egla ba.
Hebron na wɔwoo baasia maa no, na ɔdii hɔ hene mfeɛ nson ne abosome nsia na ɔdii mfeɛ aduasa mmiɛnsa Yerusalem.
Na yeinom na wɔwoo wɔn maa no wɔ Yerusalem: Simea, Sobab, Natan ne Salomo, baanan yi yɛ Amiel babaa Bat-sua deɛ no;
ne Yibhar, Elisama, Elifelet,
Noga, Nefeg, Yafia,
Elisama, Eliada ne Elifelet, wɔyɛ baakron,
wɔn nyinaa Dawid mma, ɛsono mpenafoɔ mma. Na Tamar yɛ wɔn nuabaa.
ne ba Yoram, ne ba Ahasia, ne ba Yoas,
ne ba Amasia, ne ba Asaria, ne ba Yotam,
ne ba Ahas, ne ba Hesekia, ne ba Manase,
ne ba Amon, ne ba Yosia.
Na Yosia mma ne: N’abakan Yohanan, Yehoiakim a ɔtɔ so mmienu, Sedekia tɔ so mmiɛnsa, Salum tɔ so nnan.
Na Yehoiakim mma ne: Ne ba Yekonia, ne ba Sedekia.
Na Yekonia mma ne: Asir, ne ba Sealtiel,
ne Malkiram, Pedaia, Senasar, Yekamia, Hosama, ne Nedabia.
Na Pedaia mma ne: Serubabel ne Simei. Na Serubabel mma ne: Mesulam, Hanania ne wɔn nuabaa Selomit;
ne Hasuba, ne Ohel, ne Berekia ne Hasadia, Yusab-Hesed, wɔyɛ baanum.
Na Hanania mma ne: Pelatia ne Yesaia, Refaia mma, Arnan mma, Obadia mma, Sekania mma.
Na Sekania mma ne: Semaia; Semaia mma ne: Hatus, Yigal, Baria, Nearia ne Safat, wɔyɛ baasia.
Na Nearia mma ne: Elioenai, Hiskia ne Asrikam, wɔyɛ baasa.
Na Elioenai mma ne: Hodawia, Eliasib, Pelaia, Akub, Yohanan, Delaia ne Anani, wɔyɛ baason.
Na Sobal ba Reaia woo Yahat, na Yahat woo Ahumai ne Lahad, yeinom ne Sorafoɔ mmusua.
Na yeinom ne Etam agya deɛ: Yesreel ne Yisma ne Yidbas, na wɔn nua din de Haslelponi;
ne Penuel a ɔyɛ Gedor agya ne Eser a ɔyɛ Husa agya, yeinom ne Betlehem agya Efrata abakan Hur mma.
Na Ashur a ɔyɛ Tekoa agya wɔ yerenom baanu, Hela ne Naara.
Na Naara woo Ahusam, Hefer, Temeni ne Ahastari maa no. Yeinom ne Naara mma.
Na Hela mma ne: Seret, Yesohar ne Etnan.
Na Kos woo Anub, Sobeba ne Aharhel Harum ba mmusua.
Na Yabes nyaa animuonyam sene ne nuanom; na ne na too no din Yabes, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkaa sɛ: Mede yea na ɛwoo no.
Na Yabes frɛɛ Israel Nyankopɔn sɛ: Sɛ anka worehyira me na woatrɛ me hyeɛ mu na wo nsa adi m’akyi na woamma bɔne bi ammɛyɛ me na yea bi ammɛka me ɛ! Na Onyankopɔn maa deɛ ɔsrɛɛ no baa mu.
Na Kelub, Suha nua, woo Mehir a ɔne Eston agya.
Na Eston woo Bet-rafa, Pasea ne Tehina, Ir-Nahas agya; yeinom ne Reka nkurɔfoɔ.
Na Kenas mma ne: Otniel ne Seraia; na Otniel mma ne: Hatat.
Na Meonotai woo Ofra. Na Seraia woo Yoab, Ge-harasim
Na Yefune ba Kaleb mma ne: Iru, Ela ne Naam; na Ela ba ne: Kenas.
Na Yehalelel mma ne: Sif ne Sifa, Tiria ne Asarel.
Na Esra mma ne: Yeter, Mered, Efer ne Yalon; na Mered yere woo Miriam, Samai ne Yisba a na ɔyɛ Estemoa agya.
Na ne yere a ɔyɛ Yudani woo Yered a ɔyɛ Gedor agya ne Heber a ɔyɛ Soko agya ne Yekutiel a ɔyɛ Sanoa agya. Na yeinom ne Farao babaa Bitia a Mered waree no no mma.
Na Hodia yere a ɔyɛ Naham nuabaa mma ne: Garmini Keila agya ne Maakani Estemoa agya.
Na Simon mma ne: Amnon ne Rina, Ben-hanan ne Tilon. Na Yisi mma ne: Sohet ne Ben-sohet.
Yuda ba Sela mma nie: Er a ɔyɛ Leka agya ne Lada a ɔyɛ Maresa agya ne Bet-asbea nwera adwumfoɔ mmusua,
ne Yokim ne Koseba mmarima ne Yoas ne Saraf a wɔyɛ efiewuranom, Moab ne Yasubi-Lehem; (na nsɛm yi yɛ adada).
Wɔn ne nkukunwomfoɔ ne wɔn a wɔte Netaim ne Gedera wɔ ɔhene nkyɛn, n’adwumam hɔ na wɔteɛ.
ne ba Salum, ne ba Mibsam, ne ba Misma.
Na Misma mma ne: Ne ba Hamuel, ne ba Sakur, ne ba Simei.
Na Simei wɔ mmammarima dunsia ne mmabaa nsia; na ne nuanom nni mma bebree, na wɔn abusua nyinaa ase ankyene sɛ Yuda mma.
Na wɔtenaa Beer-seba, Molada, Hasar-saulo,
Bilha, Esem, Tolad,
Betuel, Horma, Siklag,
Bet-markabot, Hasar-susim, Bet-biri ne Saaraim. Yeinom ne wɔn nkuro bɛduruu Dawid ahennie so.
Na wɔn nkuraa ne Etam, Ain, Rimon, Token ne Asan, nkuro nnum,
ne wɔn nkuraa a ɛwowɔ nkuro yi nyinaa ho de kɔsii Baal. Yei ne wɔn tenabea ahodoɔ ne wɔn mmusua nkaneeɛ.
Na Mesobab, Yamlek, Amasia ba Yosa,
Yoel ne Asiel ba Seraia ba Yosibia ba Yehu,
ne Elioenai, Yaakoba, Yesohaia, Asaia, Adiel, Yesimiel, Benaia,
ne Semaia ba, Simri ba, Yedaia ba, Alon ba, Sifi ba Sisa,
yeinom a wɔabobɔ wɔn din yi yɛ wɔn mmusua mu mmapɔmma, na wɔn mpanimfie trɛɛ pii pa ara.
Na wɔsii mu kɔɔ deɛ wɔnam kɔ Gedor, bonhwa no apueeɛ fam sɛ wɔrekɔhwehwɛ adidibea ama wɔn nnwan.
Na wɔhunuu adidibea frɔmfrɔm a ɛyɛ, na asase no mu trɛ tɛtrɛɛ, na ɛso dwo komm; na wɔn a wɔtete hɔ kane no firi Ham.

Ɛnna yeinom a wɔatwerɛ wɔn din no kɔeɛ, Yudahene Hesekia berɛ so, kɔtoaa Maonfoɔ a wɔhunuu wɔn hɔ no ne wɔn ntomadan, na wɔsɛee wɔn pasapasa de bɛsi nnɛ, na wɔtenatenaa wɔn ananmu, ɛfiri sɛ na adidibea wɔ hɔ ma wɔn nnwan.
Na Simeon mma no ara mu mmarima ahanum firii wɔn mu sii mu kɔɔ Seir bepɔ so, na Pelatia ne Nearia ne Refaia ne Usiel a wɔyɛ Yisi mma di wɔn anim.
Na wɔkɔkunkum Amalek adwanefoɔ no nkaeɛ, na wɔtenaa hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Yuda ho yɛ den ne nuanom mu, na ɔbapɔmma firii ne mu deɛ, nanso abakanyɛ no danee Yosef deɛ),
Ruben, Israel abakan no mma ne: Hanok, Palu, Hesron ne Karmi.
Yoel mma ne: Ne ba Semaia, ne ba Gog, ne ba Simei,
ne ba Mika, ne ba Reaia, ne ba Baal,
ne ba Beera a Asiriahene Tilgat-pilneser tuu no kɔeɛ no; ɔno ne Rubenfoɔ bapɔmma.
Na ne nuanom, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ wɔn awoɔ ahodoɔ so anatoɔ mu ne: Otitire Yeiel ne Sakaria,
ne Yoel ba Sema ba Asas ba Bela a ɔtenaa Aroer de kɔsii Nebo ne Baal-meon ho.
Na apueeɛ fam nso ɔtena de kɔsii anwea pradada so a ɛfiri Eufrate asubɔnten ano; na wɔn mmoakuo dɔɔso Gilead asase so.
Na Saulo nna mu no, wɔne Hagarfoɔ a wɔtotɔɔ wɔn nsa ano dii ako, na wɔtenatenaa wɔn ntomadan mu Gilead apueeɛ fam nyinaa.
Na Gad mma tenaa wɔn ntentensoɔ, Basan asase so de kɔduruu Saleka:
Yoel ne panin, na Safam di hɔ, ne Yanai ne Safat wɔ Basan.
Na wɔn nuanom sɛdeɛ wɔn mpanimfie teɛ ne: Mikael, Mesulam, Seba, Yorai, Yakan, Sia ne Eber, wɔyɛ baason.
Yeinom ne Bus ba, Yahdo ba, Yesisai ba, Mikael ba, Gilead ba, Yaroa ba, Huri ba, Abihail mma;
Guni ba, Abdiel ba, Ahi di wɔn mpanimfie so panin.
Na wɔtenaa Gilead a ɛwɔ Basan ne ɛso nkurowa mu ne Saron nkuraa nyinaa mu, deɛ wɔn hyeɛ kɔsoeɛ.
Wɔtwerɛɛ wɔn nyinaa anatoɔ Yudahene Yotam berɛ so ne Israelhene Yeroboam nna mu.

Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ ne Manase abusuakuo fa no, nnipa a wɔtumi wɔn ho mu mmarima a wɔkura akyɛm ne nkrantɛ, na wɔkuntunu tadua na wɔasua akodie no yɛ nnipa mpem aduanan nnan ne ahanson aduosia a wɔtumi kɔ ɔsa.
Na Hagarfoɔ, Yetur, Nafis ne Nodab dii ako,
na wɔnyaa mmoa faa wɔn so, na wɔde Hagarfoɔ ne wɔn a wɔka wɔn ho no nyinaa hyɛɛ wɔn nsa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔteaa mu frɛɛ Onyankopɔn ɔko no mu, na ɔtiee wɔn, ɛnam sɛ wɔn ani da ne soɔ nti.
Na wɔsoaa wɔn mmoakuo no, wɔn yoma mpemnum ne nnwan mpemahanu aduonum, ne mfunumu mpemmienu ne nnipa mpemha, nnommum.
Na apirafoɔ pii totɔe, na Nyankopɔn nkyɛn na ɛdɔm no firi baeɛ. Na wɔtenatenaa wɔn ananmu de kɔsii otukorɔ no mu.
Na yeinom ne wɔn mpanimfie atitire: Efer, Yisi, Eliel, Asriel, Yeremia, Hodawia ne Yahdiel, nnɔmmarima a wɔtumi wɔn ho, nnipa a wɔwɔ din, wɔn mpanimfie so atitire.
Na wɔfom wɔn agyanom Nyankopɔn, na wɔkɔdii asase no so aman a Onyankopɔn sɛee wɔn wɔn anim no anyame akyi adwamammɔ mu.

Ɛnna Israel Nyankopɔn hwanyan Asiriahene Pul ne Asiriahene Tilgat-pilneser honhom, na ɔtuu Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ ne Manase abusuakuo fa no de wɔn kɔduaa Hala, Habor, Hara ne Gosan asubɔnten ho de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Kehat mma ne: Amram, Yishar ne Hebron ne Usiel.
Na Amram mma ne: Aaron, Mose ne Miriam. Na Aaron mma ne: Nadab, Abihu, Eleasa ne Itamar.
Eleasa woo Pinehas. Pinehas woo Abisua,
na Abisua woo Buki, na Buki woo Usi,
na Usi woo Seraia, na Seraia woo Meraiot.
Meraiot woo Amaria, na Amaria woo Ahitub,
na Ahitub woo Sadok, na Sadok woo Ahimaas,
na Ahimaas woo Asaria, na Asaria woo Yohanan,
na Yohanan woo Asaria. (Ɔno na ɔdii sɔfoɔ wɔ asɔredan a Salomo sii no Yerusalem no mu).
Na Asaria woo Amaria, na Amaria woo Ahitub,
na Ahitub woo Sadok, na Sadok woo Salum,
na Salum woo Hilkia, na Hilkia woo Asaria,
na Asaria woo Seraia, na Seraia woo Yehosadak.
Na Yehosadak deɛ, AWURADE maa Nebukadnessar so maa no bɛtuu Yuda ne Yerusalem kɔeɛ no, ɔkɔɔ bi.
Na yeinom ne Gersom mma din: Libni ne Simei.
Na Kehat mma ne: Amram, Yishar, Hebron ne Usiel.
Merari mma ne: Mahli ne Musi. Na yeinom ne Lewifoɔ mmusua, sɛdeɛ wɔn agyanom teɛ no:
Gersom deɛ ne: Libni, Yahat, Sima,
Yoa, Ido, Sera, ne Yeaterai.
Kehat deɛ ne: Aminadab, Kora, Asir,
Elkana ne ne ba, Ebiasaf ne ne ba Asir,
ne ba Tahat, ne ba Uriel, ne ba Usia ne ne ba Saulo.
Na Elkana mma ne: Amasai ne Ahimot,
ne ba Elkana, ne ba Elkana-sofai ne ne ba Nahat,
ne ba Eliab, ne ba Yeroham, ne ba Elkana.
Na Samuel mma ne: Abakan Yoel, ne Abiya deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu.
Merari deɛ ne: Mahli, ne ba Libni, ne ba Simei, ne ba Usa,
ne ba Sima, ne ba Hagia, ne ba Asaia.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a Dawid de sisii AWURADE fie dwontoɔ som soɔ, firi berɛ a adaka no nyaa ahomeeɛ no,
na wɔyeyɛɛ dwom mu asomfo ahyiaeɛ ntomadan no tenabea no anim de kɔsii sɛ Salomo sii AWURADE fie no Yerusalem, na wɔgyinagyinaa wɔn afa wɔn som no mu.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔgyinaa hɔ ne wɔn mma no: Kehat mma no mu: Ɔdwontoni Heman, Yoel ba, Samuel ba,
Elkana ba, Yeroham ba, Eliel ba, Yoa ba,
Suf ba, Elkana ba, Mahat ba, Amasai ba,
Elkana ba, Yoel ba, Asaria ba, Sefania ba,
Tahat ba, Asir ba, Ebiasaf ba, Kora ba,
Yishar ba, Kehat ba, Lewi ba, Israel ba,
ne ne nua Asaf a ɔgyina ne nifa soɔ, Asaf, Berekia ba, Simea ba,
Mikael ba, Baaseia ba, Malkia ba,
Etni ba, Sera ba, Adaia ba,
Etan ba, Simma ba, Simei ba,
Yahat ba, Gersom ba, Lewi ba,
ne wɔn nuanom Merari mma a wɔgyinagyina benkum soɔ: Etan, Kisi ba, Abdi ba, Maluk ba,
Hasabia ba, Amasia ba, Hilkia ba,
Amsi ba, Bani ba, Samer ba,
Mahli ba, Musi ba, Merari ba, Lewi ba.
Na wɔn nuanom, Lewifoɔ no, wɔde wɔn maa Nyankopɔn fie tenabea no som nyinaa.
Na Aaron ne ne mma ne wɔn a wɔhye afɔdeɛ, ɔhyeɛ afɔrebukyia ne aduhwam hyeɛbukyia no soɔ, wɔyɛ kronkronbea adwuma no nyinaa, na wɔpata ma Israel sɛdeɛ Nyankopɔn akoa Mose hyɛeɛ no ara.
Na yeinom ne Aaron mma: Ne ba Eleasa, ne ba Pinehas, ne ba Abisua,
ne ba Buki, ne ba Usi, ne ba Seraia,
ne ba Meraiot, ne ba Amaria, ne ba Ahitub,
ne ba Sadok, ne ba Ahimaas.
na wɔmaa wɔn Hebron, Yuda asase so ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase a ɛtwa ho hyia;
na kuro no ho mfuo ne ɛho nkuraa no deɛ, wɔde maa Yefune ba Kaleb.
Na wɔmaa Aaron mma, Yuda nkuro, dwanekɔbea kuro Hebron, Libna ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase, Yatir, Estemoa ne ɛho asase,
Hilen ne ɛho asase, Debir ne ɛho asase,
Asan ne ɛho asase ne Bet-semes ne ɛho asase.
Na Benyamin abusuakuo mu nso: Geba ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase, Alemet ne ɛho asase ne Anatot ne ɛho asase. Wɔn nkuro nyinaa yɛ dummiɛnsa wɔn mmusua no mu.
Na Gersom mma, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ no, wɔde Isakar abusuakuo ne Aser abusuakuo ne Naftali abusuakuo ne Manase abusuakuo a ɛwɔ Basan no mu nkuro dummiɛnsa maa wɔn.
Merari mma, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ no, wɔde ntonto yii Ruben abusuakuo ne Gad abusuakuo ne Sebulon abusuakuo mu nkuro dummienu maa wɔn.
Na Israelfoɔ no de nkuro no ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase memaa Lewifoɔ no,
na wɔde ntonto yiyii Yuda mma abusuakuo ne Simeon mma abusuakuo ne Benyamin mma abusuakuo mu nkuro a wɔabobɔ din yi.
Na Kehat mma mmusua no hyeɛ so nkuro wɔ Efraim abusuakuo mu,
na wɔmaa wɔn nkuro, dwanekɔbea kuro Sekem ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase, Efraim bepɔ so ne Geser ne ɛho asase,
Yokmeam ne ɛho asase, Bet-horon ne ɛho asase,
Ayalon ne ɛho asase, ne Gat-Rimon ne ɛho asase;
ne Manase abusuakuo fa no mu: Aner ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase ne Bileam ne ɛho asase wɔde maa Kehat mma a wɔkaeɛ no abusua.
Na wɔde Golan a ɛwɔ Basan ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase, ne Astarot ne ɛho asase a ɛwɔ Manase abusuakuo fa no abusua mu no maa Gerson mma;
ne Isakar abusuakuo mu: Kedes ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase, Daberat ne ɛho asase;
Ramot ne ɛho asase ne Anem ne ɛho asase;
ne Aser abusuakuo mu: Masal ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase ne Abdon ne ɛho asase,
Hukok ne ɛho asase ne Rehob ne ɛho asase;
ne Naftali abusuakuo mu: Kedes a ɛwɔ Galilea ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase ne Hamon ne ɛho asase ne Kiriataim ne ɛho asase.
Na wɔde Rimono ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase, ne Tabor ne ɛho asase a ɛwɔ Sebulon abusuakuo mu no maa Merari mma nkaeɛ;
ne Yordan, Yeriko agya nso, Yordan apueeɛ fam, Ruben abusuakuo mu: Beser wɔ ɛserɛ so ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase ne Yahsa ne ɛho asase
ne Kedemot ne ɛho asase ne Mefaat ne ɛho asase.
Ne Gad abusuakuo mu: Ramot a ɛwɔ Gilead ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase ne Mahanaim ne ɛho asase,
ne Hesbon ne ɛho asase ne Yaser ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase.
Na Tola mma ne: Usi, Refaia, Yeriel, Yahmai, Yibsam ne Semuel, wɔn na wɔyɛ Tola mpanimfie atitire, mmarima akofoɔ, wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu. Dawid berɛ so na wɔn dodoɔ yɛ mpem aduonu mmienu ne ahansia.
Na Usi mma ne: Yisrahia. Na Yisrahia mma ne: Mikael, Obadia ne Yoel, Yisia, wɔn baanum nyinaa yɛ atitire.
Na wɔn a wɔka wɔn ho, sɛdeɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ ne wɔn mpanimfie teɛ no, akodie dɔm asafo, yɛ mmarima mpem aduasa nsia; na wɔwɔ yerenom ne mma pii.
Na wɔn nuanom a wɔfiri Isakar mmusua nyinaa mu no nyinaa yɛ mmarima akofoɔ mpemaduɔwɔtwe nson a wɔkan wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ teɛ no.
Na Bela mma ne: Esbon, Usi, Usiel, Yerimot ne Iri, wɔyɛ baanum, wɔn mpanimfie so atitire, mmarima akofoɔ; wɔn dodoɔ yɛ mpemaduonu mmienu ne aduasa nnan.
Na Beker mma ne: Semira, Yoas, Eliesa, Elioenai, Omri, Yeremot, Abia, Anatot ne Alamet. Yeinom nyinaa yɛ Beker mma.
Na wɔn dodoɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua ne wɔn mpanimfie atitire teɛ, yɛ mmarima akofoɔ mpemaduonu ne ahanu.
Na Yediael mma ne: Bilhan. Na Bilhan mma ne: Yeus, Benyamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Setan, Tarsis ne Ahisahar.
Yeinom nyinaa yɛ Yediael mma, sɛ wɔn agyanom atitire teɛ, mmarima akofoɔ mpemdunson ne ahanu, nnipa a wɔtumi kɔ ɔsa.
Na Supim ne Hupim yɛ Ir mma. Husim yɛ Aher mma.
Na ne babarima a ɔtɔ so mmienu din de Selofehad; na Selofehad nyaa mmammaa.
Na Makir yere Maaka woo ɔbabarima a ɔtoo no din Peres, na ne nua din de Seres. Na ne mma ne: Ulam ne Rakem.
Na Ulam mma ne: Bedan. Yeinom ne Manase ba Makir ba Gilead mma.
Na ne nuabaa Moleket woo Isod ne Abi-eser ne Mahla.
Na Semida mma ne: Ahian, Sekem, Likhi ne Aniam.
ne Sabad, ne ba, ne Sutela, ne ba, ne Eser ne Elad. Na Gad mmarima a wɔwoo wɔn asase no soɔ no kumm wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔsiane kɔɔ sɛ wɔrekɔfa wɔn mmoakuo akɔ.
Na wɔn agya Efraim gyam wɔn nna pii, na ne nuanom ba bɛkyekyeree ne werɛ.
Na ɔne ne yere daeɛ, na ɔnyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Beria, ɛfiri sɛ adebɔne na ɛbaa ne fie.
Na ne babaa ne Seera a ɔkyekyeree anafoɔ ne atifi Bet-horon ne Usen-seera.
Na ne ba ne Refa ne Resef, ne ba Tela, ne ba Tahan,
ne ba Ladan, ne ba Amihud, ne ba Elisama,
ne ba Nun, ne ba Yosua.
Na wɔn agyapadeɛ ne wɔn tenabea ne Betel ne ɛho nkurowa, ne apueeɛ fam Naaran ne atɔeɛ fam Geser ne ɛho nkurowa ne Sekem ne ɛho nkurowa kɔduru Asa ne ɛho nkurowa.
Na Manase mma nkyɛn mu bi wowɔ Bet-sean ne ɛho nkurowa, Taanak ne ɛho nkurowa, Megido ne ɛho nkurowa, Dor ne ɛho nkurowa. Yeinom mu na Israel ba Yosef mma teɛ.
Na Beria mma ne: Heber ne Malkiel, ɔne Birsait agya.
Na Heber woo Yaflet, Somer, Hotam ne wɔn nuabaa Sua.
Na Yaflet mma ne: Pasak, Bimhal ne Aswat. Yeinom ne Yaflet mma.
Na Semer mma ne: Ahi ne Rohga, Yehuba ne Aram.
Na ne nua Helem mma ne Sofa, Yimna, Seles ne Amal.
Sofa mma ne: Suah, Harnefer, Saulo, Beri ne Yimra;
Beser, Hod, Sama, Silsa, Yitran ne Beera.
Na Yeter mma ne: Yefune, Pispa ne Ara.
Na Ula mma ne: Arah, Haniel ne Risia.
Yeinom nyinaa yɛ Aser mma mpanimfie so atitire, mmarima akofoɔ a wɔayi wɔn, mmapɔmma mu atitire; na wɔn a wɔkan wɔn maa ɔsakorɔ sɛdeɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ teɛ no yɛ mmarima mpemaduonu nsia.
Noha a ɔtɔ so nnan ne Rafa a ɔtɔ so nnum.
Na Bela mma ne: Adar, Gera, Abihud,
Abisua, Naaman, Ahoa
Gera, Sefufan ne Huram.
Na yeinom ne Ehud mma, (yeinom ne Gebafoɔ agyanom atitire, na wɔtuu wɔn kɔɔ Manahat),
ne Naaman ne Ahia ne Gera, ɔno na ɔtuu wɔn kɔeɛ, na ɔwoo Usa ne Ahihud.
Na Saharaim woe wɔ Moab asase so, nso na wagya ne yerenom Husim ne Baara kwan.
Na ɔne ne yere Hodes woo Yobab, Sibia, Mesa, Malkam
Yeus, Sakia ne Mirma. Yeinom ne ne mma a wɔyɛ agyanom atitire.
Na ɔne Husim woo Abitub ne Elpaal.
Na Elpaal mma ne: Eber, Misam ne Semed a ɔkyekyeree Ono ne Lod ne ɛho nkurowa,
Beria ne Sema, (wɔn ne Ayalonfoɔ agyanom atitire, wɔn na wɔpamm Gatfoɔ).
Na Ahio, Sasak, Yeremot,
Sebadia, Arad, Eder,
Mikael, Yispa, Yoha ne Beria mma.
Na Sebadia, Mesulam, Hiski, Heber,
Ismerai, Yislia, Yobab ne Elpaal mma.
Na Yakim, Sikri, Sabdi,
Elienai, Siletai, Eliel,
Adaia, Beraia, Simrat ne Simei mma.
Na Yispan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Sikri, Hanan,
Hanania, Elam, Antotia,
Yifdeia, Penuel ne Sasak mma.
Na Samserai, Seharia, Atalia,
Yaaresia, Elia, Sikri ne Yeroham mma.
Yeinom ne agyanom atitire, wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ so atitire. Yeinom tenaa Yerusalem.
ne n’abakan Abdon, Sur, Kis, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio ne Seker.
Na Miklot woo Simea; na wɔn nso wɔtenaa wɔn nuanom ntentensoɔ Yerusalem kaa wɔn nuanom ho.
Na Yonatan ba ne Merib-baal, na Merib-baal woo Mika.
Na Mika mma ne: Piton, Melek, Tarea ne Ahas.
Na Ahas woo Yehoada, na Yehoada woo Alemet, Asmawet ne Simri. Na Simri woo Mosa.
Na Mosa woo Binea, ne Rafa, ne Elasa, ne Asel.
Na Asel wɔ mmammarima baasia, na wɔn din nie: Asrikam, Bokeru, Ismael, Searia, Obadia ne Hanan. Yeinom nyinaa yɛ Asel mma.
Na ne nua Esek mma ne: N’abakan Ulam, Yeus a ɔtɔ so mmienu, ne Elifelet a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa.
Na Ulam mma yɛ mmarima ahoɔdenfoɔ a wɔtumi wɔn ho, wɔkuntunu tadua, na wɔwɔ mma bebree ne mma mma ɔha aduonum. Yeinom nyinaa yɛ Benyamin mma asefoɔ.
Na wɔn a wɔdii kan sane bɛtenaa wɔn agyapadeɛ so wɔ wɔn nkuro mu no ne asɔfoɔ, Lewifoɔ ne asɔrefie asomfoɔ.
Na Yerusalem deɛ, Yuda mma ne Benyamin mma ne Efraim ne Manase mma no mu binom tenatenaa hɔ:
Bani a ɔfiri Peres a ɛwɔ Yuda mma mu no ba Imri ba Omri ba Amihud ba Utai.
Na Silonifoɔ mu deɛ: Abakan Asaia ne ne mma.
Na Sera mma mu: Yeuel ne ne nuanom, ahansia aduɔkron.
Na Benyamin mma mu: Hasenua ba Hodawia ba Mesulam ba Salu,
ne Yeroham ba Yibneia ne Mikri ba Usi ba Ela ne Yibnia ba Reuel ba Sefatia ba Mesulam,
ne wɔn nuanom, wɔn mmusua so, nnipa ahankron aduonum nsia. Mmarima yi nyinaa yɛ agyanom atitire, wɔn mpanimfie so.
Na asɔfoɔ no mu: Yedaia, Yehoiarib ne Yakin,
ne Ahitub ba Meraiot ba Sadok ba Mesulam ba Hilkia ba Asaria a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn fie bapɔmma;
ne Malkia ba Pasur ba Yeroham ba Adaia ne Imer ba Mesilemit ba Mesulam ba Yahsera ba Adiel ba Masai
ne wɔn nuanom, wɔn mpanimfie so atitire, apem ahanson aduosia, mmarima a wɔtumi Nyankopɔn fie som adwuma no.
Na Lewifoɔ mu deɛ: Merari ba Hasabia ba Asrikam ba Hasub ba Semaia,
Bakbakar, Heres, Galal ne Asaf ba Sikri ba Mika ba Matania,
ne Yedutun ba Galal ba Semaia ba Obadia ne Elkana ba Asa ba Berekia a ɔte Netofafoɔ nkuraa mu no.
Na apono ano ahwɛfoɔ no: Salum, Akub, Talmon, Ahiman ne wɔn nuanom. Salum na ɔdi tire.
Na ɛde bɛsi sɛsɛɛ wɔwɔ ɔhene pono ano apueeɛ fam, wɔn ne Lewi mma nsra apono ano ahwɛfoɔ.
Na Kora ba Ebiasaf ba Kore ba Salum ne ne nuanom n’agya fie mu, Korafoɔ no, wɔwɔ ɔsom adwuma no so rewɛn ntomadan no pono ano, sɛdeɛ na wɔn agyanom wɔ AWURADE nsraban no mu rewɛn emu hyɛne no.
Na Eleasa ba Pinehas na na ɔdi wɔn so bapɔmma kane no, na AWURADE dii n’akyi.
Meselemia ba Sakaria ne ahyiaeɛ ntomadan no pono ano hwɛfoɔ.

Wɔn a wɔyii wɔn de wɔn sisii apono ano hwɛfoɔ nyinaa yɛ ahanu ne dummienu. Wɔn na wɔkan wɔn twerɛɛ wɔn din mmusua soɔ, wɔn nkuraa so, wɔn nso na Dawid ne Ɔdehununi Samuel de wɔn sisii wɔn nokorɛdie adwuma so.
Na wɔne wɔn mma wɔ apono no ano AWURADE fie, ntomadan fie no, rewɛn;
mframa nnan no ano deɛ, apueeɛ, atɔeɛ, atifi ne anafoɔ fam apono ano ahwɛfoɔ no wɔ.
Na ɛsɛ wɔn nuanom a wɔwɔ wɔn nkuraa ase no sɛ wɔba nnanson nnanson firi berɛ so kɔ berɛ soɔ bɛka wɔn ho.
Na nokorɛdie adwuma mu na apono ano hwɛfoɔ mpanin baanan no, Lewifoɔ no wɔ, na wɔdi Nyankopɔn fie mpumpunu ne adekora adan no soɔ.
Na Nyankopɔn fie no ho na wɔteteeɛ hyia anadwoɔ berɛ biara, na wɔn so na ɔwɛn no da, na wɔn nso na na wɔhinihini apono no daa anɔpa.
Na wɔn mu binom hwɛ ɔsom nnoɔma no so, na wɔbu ano de ba mu, na wɔbu ano de firi adi.
Na wɔde wɔn mu binom asisi nnoɔma ne kronkronbea nnoɔma no nyinaa ne esiam, nsa, ngo, ohwamfufuo ne nnuhwam no so.
Na asɔfoɔ mma no binom de nnoɔma frafra yɛɛ nnuhwam sra ngo no.
Na Matitia a ɔfiri Lewi mma mu a ɔyɛ Korani Salum abakan no, wɔde no sii ɛkyeɛ nnadeɛ mu atodeɛ to so.
Na Kohatfoɔ mma a wɔyɛ wɔn nuanom no mu binom dii kyerɛ paanoo no so, sɛ wɔnsiesie no daa homeda.
Yeinom ne Lewifoɔ mu agyanom atitire, atitire sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ. Yeinom na wɔtete Yerusalem.
Na n’abakan ne Adbon; ne nuanom Sur, Kis, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Sakaria ne Miklot.
Na Miklot woo Simeam; na wɔn nso tenaa wɔn nuanom ntentensoɔ wɔ Yerusalem, wɔne wɔn nuanom.
Na Ner woo Kis, na Kis woo Saulo, na Saulo woo Yonatan, Malki-sua, Abinadab ne Esbaal.
Na Yonatan ba ne Merib-baal, na Merib-baal woo Mika.
Na Mika mma ne: Piton, Melek, Tarea ne Ahas.
Na Ahas woo Yara, na Yara woo Alemet, Asmawet, ne Simri, na Simri woo Mosa,
na Mosa woo Binea; ne ne ba Refaia, ne ba Elasa, ne ba Asel.
Na Asel wɔ mmammarima baasia, na wɔn din nie: Asrikam, Bokeru ne Ismael ne Searia ne Obadia ne Hanan. Yeinom ne Asel mma.
Na Filistifoɔ tu saa Saulo ne ne mma, na Filistifoɔ kumm Yonatan, Abinadab ne Malkisua a wɔyɛ Saulo mma no.
Na ɔko no den Saulo so, na agyantofoɔ bɛtoo no, na agyantofoɔ no too agyan wɔɔ no.
Na Saulo ka kyerɛɛ n’akodeɛkurani sɛ: Twe wo nkrantɛ na fa wɔ me, na momonotofoɔ yi amma ammɛbɔ me adapaa. Na n’akodeɛkurani no ampene, na ɔsuroo pii. Enti Saulo faa ne nkrantɛ na ɔhwee so.
Na n’akodeɛkurani no hunuu sɛ Saulo atɔ no, ɔno nso hwee ne nkrantɛ so na ɔtɔe.
Na Saulo wui, na ne mma baasa no ne ne fiefoɔ nyinaa totɔɔ prɛko.
Na Israelfoɔ a wɔwɔ bonhwa no mu nyinaa hunuu sɛ asraafoɔ no adwaneɛ, na Saulo ne ne mma atotɔ no, wɔgyigyaa wɔn nkuro hɔ dwanee. Na Filistifoɔ ba bɛtenatenaa mu.
Na ɛbaa sɛ adeɛ kyeeɛ no, Filistifoɔ baa atɔfoɔ no ho nnoɔma yiyie, na wɔhunuu Saulo ne ne mma baasa no sɛ wɔatotɔ Gilboa bepɔ soɔ.
Na wɔyiyii wɔn ho nnoɔma, na wɔfaa ne ti ne n’akodeɛ soma maa wɔde kyinii Filistifoɔ asase so, sɛ wɔnkɔpae nkyerɛ wɔn ahoni ne ɔman no.
Na wɔde n’akodeɛ no kɔsiee wɔn anyame fie, na ne tikwankoraa deɛ, wɔde kɔfam Dagon fie.
Na Yabes-gileadfoɔ nyinaa tee deɛ Filistifoɔ ayɛ Saulo nyinaa no,
akofoɔ no nyinaa sɔresɔree, na wɔkɔfaa Saulo amu, ne ne mma no amu no, na wɔde baa Yabes, na wɔbɛsiee wɔn nnompe no dupɔn a ɛwɔ Yabes no ase, na wɔdii mmuada nnanson.
Na Saulo wui ne fom a ɔfom AWURADE no, ne AWURADE asɛm a wanni soɔ no, ne sɛ nso ɔkɔbisaa samanfrɛni hɔ adeɛ hwehwɛɛ n’akyiri kwan.
Na wanhwehwɛ AWURADE akyiri kwan nti, na ɔkumm no, na ɔdanee ahennie no maa Yisai ba Dawid.

Na kane a na Saulo di hene no, wo ara na wode Israel firii adie na wode wɔn baa mu. Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn aka akyerɛ wo sɛ: Wo na wobɛyɛne me man Israel, na wo ara na wobɛdi me man Israel so bapɔmma.
Na Israel mpanimfoɔ nyinaa baa ɔhene no nkyɛn Hebron, na Dawid ne wɔn pam AWURADE anim wɔ Hebron, na wɔsraa Dawid ngo sii no Israel so hene, sɛdeɛ AWURADE asɛm a ɔnam Samuel so kaeɛ no teɛ.
Na Dawid ne Israel nyinaa sii mu kɔɔ Yerusalem, a na ɛne Yebus no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛhɔ na na Yebusifoɔ a wɔyɛ asase no sofoɔ no teɛ.
Na Yebusifoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ Dawid sɛ: Woremma ha. Nanso Dawid faa Sion aban a ɛne Dawid kuro no.
Na Dawid kaa sɛ: Obiara a ɔbɛkum Yebusifoɔ kane no, ɔbɛyɛ otitire ne ɔsafohene. Ɛnna Seruia ba Yoab foro kɔɔ kane, na ɔyɛɛ otitire.
Na Dawid tenaa aban no mu, saa nti na wɔfrɛ no Dawid kuro.
Na Dawid kyekyeree kuro no hyiae de firi Milo ara de twaa ho hyiae. Na Yoab siesiee kuro no nkaeɛ no.
Na Dawid kɔɔ so ara yɛɛ kɛseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Asafo AWURADE dii n’akyi.
Na yeinom ne nnɔmmarima a na Dawid wɔ no dodoɔ: Hakmonini Yasobeam, ɔdi akunini tire, ɔno na ɔde ne pea kumm nnipa ahasa prɛko pɛ.
Ɔno na na ɔne Dawid wɔ Pas-damim no, na Filistifoɔ aboaboa wɔn ano wɔ hɔ sɛ wɔrebɛdi ako, na asasewa bi wɔ hɔ a atokoɔ ayɛ so ma, na ɔman no dwanee firii Filistifoɔ anim.
Ɔno ne nkaeɛ no kɔgyinaa asasewa no mfimfini gyee wɔn ho, na wɔkum Filistifoɔ no. Na AWURADE de nkonimdie kɛseɛ gyee wɔn.
Nso ɛberɛ no mu, na Dawid wɔ bepɔ so atenaeɛ no mu, na Filistifoɔ bansifoɔ wɔ Betlehem.
Na Dawid kɔn dɔe, na ɔkaa sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛma me Betlehem asubura a ɛwɔ kuro pono ho no mu nsuo anom?
Na mmarima baasa no te faa Filistifoɔ nsraban no mu kɔsaa Betlehem asubura a ɛwɔ kuro pono ho no mu nsuo de brɛɛ Dawid. Nanso Dawid ampɛ sɛ ɔnom, na ɔhwie gu maa AWURADE,
na ɔkaa sɛ: Me Nyankopɔn mma no mpare me sɛ mɛyɛ yei. Mennom mmarima yi mogya wɔn kra so anaa? Na wɔn nkwa na wɔde too hɔ kɔfa baeɛ yi. Na wampɛ sɛ ɔnom. Yei na nnɔmmarima baasa no yɛeɛ.
Na Yoab nua Abisai nso di baasa no ti. Ɔno nso na ɔhwinhwim ne pea atɔfoɔ ahasa soɔ, na ɔwɔ din baasa no mu.
Nnipa baasa no mu, na ɔwɔ animuonyam sene baanu no, na ɔdi wɔn safohene, nanso wanto akane baasa no.
Yehoiada ba Benaia yɛ ɔbarima katakyie a ɔfiri Kabseel a ɔyɛɛ nnoɔma akɛseɛ. Ɔno na ɔkum Moabni Ariel mma baanu no. Na ɔno nso na ɔsiane kɔkum gyata, abura bi mu, da bi a sukyerɛmma atɔ.

Na ɔno ara nso na ɔkɔkumm Misraimni barima bi a ne tentene yɛ basafa mmienu ne fa. Na Misraimni no kura pea a ɛte sɛ ntomanwomfoɔ nsadua wɔ ne nsam, na ɔde poma siane kɔɔ ne nkyɛn, na ɔhwimm Misraimni no nsam pea no de ɔno ara ne pea no kumm no.
Yei na Yehoiada ba Benaia yɛeɛ, na ɔwɔ din nnɔmmarima baasa no mu.
Hwɛ, na ɔwɔ animuonyam sene akunini aduasa no, nanso akane baasa no deɛ, wanto wɔn. Na Dawid de no sii n’ankɔbeafoɔ so.
Na dɔm no mu nnɔmmarima no ne: Yoab nua Asahel, Betlehemni Dodo ba Elhanan,
Harorini Samot, Pelonni Heles,
Tekoani Ikes ba Ira, Anatotni Abieser,
Husani Sibekai, Ahohini Ilai,
Netofani Maharai, Netofani Baana ba Heled.
Ribai a ɔfiri Gibea a ɛwɔ Benyamin mma mu ba Itai, Piratonni Benaia,
Nahale-gaasni Hurai, Arabani Abiel,
Baharumni Asmawet, Saalbonni Eliahba,
Gisoni Hasem mma, Hararini Sage ba Yonatan,
Hararini Sakar ba Ahiam, Ur ba Elifal,
Mekerani Hefer, Pelonni Ahia,
Karmelni Hesro, Esbai ba Naarai,
Natan nua Yoel, Hagri ba Mibhar,
Amonni Selek, Berotni Naharai a ɔyɛ Seruia ba Yoab akodeɛkurani,
Yitrini Ira, Yitrini Gereb,
Hetini Uria, Ahlai ba Sabad,
Rubenni Sisa ba Adina a ɔyɛ Rubenfoɔ so otitire, na nnipa aduasa ka ne ho;
Maaka ba Hanan, Mitni Yosafat,
Asteratni Usia, Aroerni Hotam mma Sama ne Yeiel,
Simri ba Yediael ne Tisini Yoha a ɔyɛ ne nua,
Mahawini Eliel, Elnaam mma Yeribai ne Yosawia, Moabni Yitma,
Eliel, ne Obed, ne Mesobaini Yaasiel.
taduakurafoɔ a wɔtumi de nifa ne benkum to aboɔ ne agyan tadua soɔ.
Saulo nuanom a wɔfiri Benyamin mu: Gibeani Semaa mma Ahieser a ɔdi tire ne Yoas ne Asmawet mma Yesiel ne Pelet ne Beraka ne Anatotni Yehu,
ne Gibeonni Ismaia, aduasa no mu dɔmmarima, na ɔdi aduasa no so, ne Yeremia ne Yahasiel ne Yohanan ne Gederani Yosabad,
Elusai ne Yerimot ne Bealia ne Semaria ne Harifini Sefatia.
Elkana ne Yesia ne Asarel ne Yoeser ne Yasobeam, Korafoɔ,
ne Yoela ne Sebadia, Yeroham mma a wɔfiri Gedor.
Eser di wɔn panin, Obadia di hɔ, Eliab tɔ so mmiɛnsa,
Mismana tɔ so nnan, Yeremia tɔ so nnum,
Atai tɔ so nsia, Eliel tɔ so nson,
Yohanan tɔ so nwɔtwe, Elsabad tɔ so nkron,
Yeremia tɔ so du, Makbanai tɔ so dubaako.
Yeinom firi Gad mma mu, wɔyɛ dɔm no mu atitire. Ɔbaako, akumaa koraa bɛtumi ɔha, na ɔkɛseɛ bɛtumi apem.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔtwaa Yordan, bosome a ɛdi kan no mu, berɛ a na ayiri asram ne nsunoa nyinaa so no, na wɔkaa mmonhwa no mufoɔ nyinaa guiɛ, apueeɛ fam ne atɔeɛ fam.
Na Benyamin ne Yuda mma mu binom nso baa Dawid nkyɛn atenaeɛ no mu hɔ.

Na Dawid firii adi baa wɔn anim na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ: Sɛ asomdwoeɛ so na moreba me nkyɛn, sɛ morebɛboa me a, ɛnneɛ mɛnya mo ho akoma pa sɛ yɛbɛyɛ baako. Na sɛ moreba abɛyi me ama m’atamfoɔ, nanso amumuyɛ biara nni me nsam yi, ɛnneɛ yɛn agyanom Nyankopɔn bɛhwɛ na wabu atɛn.
Ɛnna honhom kaa Amasai, aduasa no mu otitire, na ɔkaa sɛ:
Yɛyɛ wo dea, O Dawid;
na yɛwɔ w’afa, O Yisai ba!
