Monnɔ AWURADE, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa.
AWURADE hwɛ wɔn a wɔdi nokorɛ so,
na ɔtua deɛ ɔdi ahantansɛm no ka ma no boro so.
mo a motwɛn AWURADE nyinaa.
na wɔakata ne bɔne soɔ.
Nhyira ne onipa a AWURADE mmu n’amumuyɛ ngu ne soɔ,
na nnaadaa nni ne honhom mu.
m’apinisie a mesii no daa nyinaa nti.
Na awia ne anadwo wo nsa yɛɛ me so duru,
me mu nsuo twee, na mekusaa sɛ awia berɛ mu.
na mankora m’amumuyɛ so.
Mekaa sɛ: Mɛka me mmarato makyerɛ AWURADE.
Wo na wode me bɔne so mmusuo kyɛeɛ.
Yei nti teeni biara mmɔ wo mpaeɛ da a ɔbɛhu woɔ no.
Ampa ara, sɛ asu kɛseɛ yiri a, ɛremfa ɔyaa korɔ.
Wone me huntabea,
wobɛbɔ me ho ban na me ho annwan me,
na wode nkwagyeɛ nnwom atwa me ho ahyia.
ɔkwan a wobɛfa soɔ,
m’ani wɔ wo so, na mɛtu wo fo.
nnareka ne ɛho homa na wɔde to wɔn ano mu twe wɔn,
anka wɔrentwe mmɛn wo.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ yea dɔɔso,
na deɛ ɔde ne ho to AWURADE soɔ no,
wɔde adɔeɛ bɛdi no barehyia.
Akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa, momfa anigyeɛ nhuro!
ɛsɛ wɔn a wɔtene no sɛ wɔyi no ayɛ.
momfa sankuo a ɛso homa du nto no dwom!
mommɔ sankuo yie nka ɛnne ho!
Na AWURADE asɛm tene,
na ne nnwuma nyinaa wɔ nokorɛ mu.
Ɔdɔ asɛntenenee ne atemmuo,
AWURADE adɔeɛ ahyɛ asase so ma.
na ɔde n’anomu honhom yɛɛ emu asafo nyinaa.
ɔde ebunu sie deɛ ɛhɔ dɔ.
Ma asase nyinaa sofoɔ nsuro AWURADE,
wɔn a wɔte wiase nyinaa mfɛre no;
na ɔno na ɔka a, ɛba mu,
ɔno na ɔhyɛ a, ɛgyina hɔ.
AWURADE ma amanaman agyina dane hunu,
ɔma aman adwene yɛ ɔkwa.
AWURADE agyina deɛ, ɛgyina hɔ daa,
n’akomam adwene wɔ hɔ ma awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa.
ne ɔman a wayi wɔn de ayɛ ɔno ara n’apɛgyadeɛ.
AWURADE firi soro hwɛ,
ɔhunu nnipa mma nyinaa.
Ɔte ne tenaberɛ na ɔhwɛ
asase sotefoɔ nyinaa.
Ɔno na ɔnwono wɔn nyinaa akoma,
ɔhu wɔn nnwuma nyinaa mu.
ɔbrane mfa ahoɔden kɛseɛ nnye ne ho.
na wɔmfa n’ahoɔden dodoɔ nnye onipa.
ɛwɔ wɔn a wɔn ani da n’adɔeɛ soɔ no so,
na wama wɔanya nkwa ɛkɔm mu.
yɛn boafoɔ ne yɛn kyɛm ne no.
Na ne mu na yɛn akoma bɛtɔ yɛn yam,
ɛfiri sɛ yɛde yɛn ho ato ne din kronkron so.
AWURADE, ma w’adɔeɛ ntena yɛn so,
sɛdeɛ yɛn ani da wo soɔ no.
n’ayeyie wɔ m’anomu daa yi.
AWURADE mu na me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho,
ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛte, na wɔn ani agye.
Mo ne me nkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ,
na momma yɛmmom mma ne din so.
Mahwehwɛ AWURADE, na wabua me,
na wagye me afiri deɛ mesuro nyinaa mu.
Wɔn a wɔhwɛɛ no no anim tee,
na wɔn anim angu ase.
Ohiani yi teaa mu, na AWURADE tiee no,
na ɔgyee no n’ahohia nyinaa mu.
na ɔgye wɔn.
nhyira ne onipa a ɔdwane kɔtoa no.
na biribiara remmɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no.
na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ AWURADE no adepa biara remmɔ wɔn.
Mma, mommra, monyɛ aso mma me!
Mɛkyerɛ mo AWURADE suro.
na ɔpɛ onyinkyerɛ sɛ ɔbɛhunu papa?
Kora wo tɛkyerɛma, bɔne ho,
ɛne w’ano, nnaadaasɛm ho.
hwehwɛ asomdwoeɛ, na ti no.
AWURADE ani wɔ ateneneefoɔ so,
na n’aso tie wɔn sufrɛ.
sɛ ɔbɛhye wɔn ase, asase so.
Ateneneefoɔ su frɛ, na AWURADE tie,
na ɔgye wɔn firi wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu.
na ɔgye wɔn a wɔn honhom apɛkyɛ.
na AWURADE gye no ne nyinaa mu.
Ɔhwɛ ne nnompe nyinaa,
sɛdeɛ emu baako mpo mmu.
Bɔne bɛkum ɔbɔnefoɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtane ɔteneneeni no bɛbrɛ mu.
AWURADE gye ne nkoa kra,
na wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa wɔremmu wɔn fɔ.
AWURADE, wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ham no nham,
wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ko no nko!
na sɔre bɛboa me.
Twe pea na si wɔn a wɔtaa me no kwan,
ka kyerɛ me kra sɛ: W’agyenkwa ne me!
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no mfa ahohora nsane wɔn akyi!
Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ ntɛtɛ, mframa anim,
na ma AWURADE bɔfoɔ nsum wɔn ngu!
Ma wɔn akwan mu nnuru sum na ɛnyɛ torotorotoro,
na AWURADE bɔfoɔ ntaa wɔn!
na wɔatu me kra amena kwa.
na ma ne fidie a wasum ahunta no nyi no,
ma ɔmfa bubububu nhwe mu!
Na me kra bɛdi ahurisie AWURADE mu,
na ne ho asane no, ne nkwagyeɛ mu.
Me nnompe nyinaa bɛka sɛ:
AWURADE, hwan na ɔte sɛ wo
a wogye ɔmanehunufoɔ
deɛ ɔyɛ den sene no no nsam
ne ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani firi ne dwotwafoɔ no nsam.
Adansefoɔ nkontompofoɔ sɔre;
adeɛ a mennim na wɔbisa me.
me kra adi basugya.
mefira ayitoma,
mede mmuada mebrɛɛ me kra ase,
na mebɔɔ mpaeɛ maa no sane bɛguu me kokom.
Meyɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ m’adamfo ne me nua,
mesii me tiri ase twann
sɛ obi a ɔregyam ne na.
Na ɛnam sɛ merekɔhwe aseɛ nti,
wɔn ani gye na wɔbɔ kyenku,
nkwahumafoɔ ne nnipa a mennim wɔn bɔ me so kyenku,
wɔya ara na wɔnnyae.
wɔtwɛree wɔn se guu me so.
Gye me kra firi wɔn sɛeɛ mu,
m’ade korɔ firi agyata nsam!
mɛyi wo ayɛ ɔman dodoɔ mu.
ani nnnye me ho,
mma wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no mmmu me anikyeɛ!
Na wɔnka asomdwoeɛ nsɛm,
na wɔdwene nkontomposɛm tia
wɔn a wɔdwo, asase so.
wɔse: Wiɛ, wiɛ,
yɛn ani ahunu!
AWURADE, woahunu, mmua w’ano,
AWURADE, mfiri me nkyɛn nkɔ akyiri!
me Nyankopɔn ne m’AWURADE, bɛdi m’asɛm!
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, fa wo tenenee so bɛbu me atɛn,
na mma wɔn ani nnnye me ho!
Mma wɔnnka no wɔn akoma mu sɛ:
Wiɛ, deɛ yɛpɛ ni!
Mma wɔnnka sɛ: Yɛamene no.
ma wɔn ani nwu na wɔn anim ngu ase.
Wɔn a wɔdi me so akokurokosɛm no,
ma aniwuo ne ahohora nsi wɔn aduradeɛ!
ma wɔnni ahurisie na wɔn ani nnye;
ma wɔnka daa sɛ:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ,
sɛ n’akoa yiedie sɔ n’ani.
Na me tɛkyerɛma bɛka wo tenenee
ne w’ayeyie daa nyinaa.
wɔ n’akoma mu:
Nyankopɔn suro biara
nni n’ani so.
Na ɔbu ne ho bi ɔno ara ani so
sɛ wɔrenhunu n’amumuyɛ na wɔakyi.
N’anomu nsɛm yɛ ahuhusɛm ne nnaadaa,
wagyae nimdeɛsua ne papayɛ.
ɔde ne nan asi ɔkwan a ɛnyɛ so;
bɔne deɛ, ɔnkyi.
na wo nokorɛ kɔduru wiem tɔnn.
w’atemmuo te sɛ ebunu a emu dɔ.
AWURADE, wogye nnipa ne mmoa nkwa.
Ao, Onyankopɔn, hwɛ sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ no si so fa!
Na nnipa mma de wɔn ho kɔhyɛ wo ntaban nwunu ase.
na woma wɔnom w’anigyeɛ asubɔnten.
wo hann mu na yɛhunu hann.
Ma w’adɔeɛ nkyɛre mma wɔn a wɔni woɔ,
ne wo tenenee mma akoma mu teefoɔ.
Mma ɔhantanni nan nntia me,
na mma abɔnefoɔ nsa nnsum me!
Ɛnneɛ na amumuyɛfoɔ atotɔ,
wɔasum wɔn ahwehwe fam a wɔntumi nsɔreɛ.
mma wo bo nnha wo amumuyɛfoɔ ho;
na ɛrenni da bi na wɔatwa wɔn agu sɛ ɛserɛ,
na wɔakusa sɛ wura mono a wɔatwa.
tena asase so, na di nokorɛ,
na ma w’ani nka AWURADE ho,
na wama wo deɛ w’akoma pɛ.
na fa wo ho to ne so, na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ,
ne wo bem sɛ owigyinaeɛ.
Nha wo ho, deɛ ne kwan asi no yie no nti,
onipa a ɔdi ne bo soɔ no nti.
Ma abufuo ntwa, na gyae bo bɔne yɛ,
nha wo ho, na ɛbɛwie bɔne nko,
na wɔn a wɔtwɛn AWURADE no, wɔn na wɔbɛnya asase no adie.
na wɔhwehwɛ ne tenaberɛ a, na ɔnni hɔ.
na wɔagye wɔn ani asomdwoeɛ bebree mu.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ susu ɔteneneeni ho asɛm,
na ɔtwɛre ne se gu ne so,
ɛfiri sɛ wahunu sɛ ne da reba.
na wɔakuntunu wɔn tadua mu
sɛ wɔbɛma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani ahwe ase,
na wɔaku wɔn a wɔn abrabɔ yɛ:
Wɔn nkrantɛ bɛwɔ wɔn ara wɔn akoma mu,
na wɔn tadua abubu.
sene abɔnefoɔ bebree ahonyadeɛ dodoɔ,
na abɔnefoɔ abasa bɛbubu,
na AWURADE wowa ateneneefoɔ.
AWURADE nim wɔn a wɔdi mu no nna,
na wɔn agyapadeɛ bɛtena hɔ daa.
na wɔbɛmee, ɛkɔm nna mu.
na AWURADE atamfoɔ bɛyɛ sɛ ɛserɛ so nhwiren,
wɔbɛhye awie sa sɛ wisie.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ fɛm, na ɔntua,
na ɔteneneeni hunu mmɔbɔ, na ɔma.
na wɔn a wabɔ wɔn dua no, wɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
AWURADE na ɔde onipa anammɔn sisi yie,
na ne kwan sɔ n’ani,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE kura ne nsam.
nanso menhunuu onipa tenenee a wɔapa no
anaasɛ n’asefoɔ resrɛ aduane.
Ɔhunu mmɔbɔ daa, na ɔde fɛm,
na n’asefoɔ nso yɛ nhyira.
na woatena hɔ daa;
na ɔrennya n’ahotefoɔ.
Ɔhwɛ wɔn so daa,
na abɔnefoɔ asefoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
na wɔatena so daapem.
Ɔteneneeni ano ka nyansasɛm,
na ne tɛkyerɛma bu atɛntenenee;
na ne nan nwatiri.
na ɔhwehwɛ sɛ ɔku no.
na sɛ wɔbu no atɛn a, ɔremmu no fɔ.
na ɔbɛma wo so, na woanya asase no atena so;
sɛ wɔhye abɔnefoɔ ase a, wobɛhunu.
na ɔdennane sɛ dua frɔmm a anya asiyɛ,
na mehwehwɛɛ no, nanso manhu no.
sɛ saa onipa no awieeɛ yɛ asomdwoeɛ.
Na mmaratofoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛsɛe wɔn nyinaa prɛko,
abɔnefoɔ ase deɛ, wɔbɛhye.
ɔne wɔn dwanekɔhyɛbea, ahohia da mu.
ɔyi wɔn firi abɔnefoɔ nsam, na ɔgye wɔn nkwa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔde wɔn ho to ne so.
Ao, AWURADE, ntwi m’anim w’abufuo mu,
na ntwe m’aso w’anibereɛ mu;
na wo nsa aduru me so.
ahoɔden bi nni me honam mu,
me bɔne nti
nkwahosan bi nni me nnompe mu;
ɛdɛn me so sɛ adesoa duruduro.
M’akuro bɔn na aporɔ
m’agyimisɛm nti.
Mapompono na mapua koraa,
da mu nyinaa mede awerɛhoɔ menam foofoo.
Na ahyehyekuro ayɛ m’asene mu ma,
na ahoɔden bi nni me honam mu;
mahodwo na mabubu pasaa,
m’akoma apinisie nti mesu denden.
AWURADE, deɛ mepɛ nyinaa da w’anim,
na m’apenepene nhunta wo.
M’akoma bɔ paripari, m’ahoɔden atu,
na m’aniwa hann mpo nni me ho bio.
na m’abusuafoɔ gyinagyina akyirikyiri.
Na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra no asum me mfidie,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no ka me sɛeɛ ho asɛm,
na wɔdwene nnaadaasɛm da mu nyinaa.
na mete sɛ emum a ɔmmue n’ano.
Na mayɛ sɛ onipa a ɔnte asɛm
na n’anomu nni ntuatuaano.
Na wo, AWURADE, na m’ani da wo soɔ,
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, wobɛbua.
Na mese: Mma wɔn ani nnnye wɔ me ho,
na sɛ me nan watiri a, wɔanhoahoa wɔn ho wɔ me so.
Na mereyɛ mahwe ase,
na me yea wɔ m’anim daa.
me bɔne nti me werɛ aho.
Na m’atamfoɔ ho yɛ wɛwɛwɛ, wɔn ho yɛ den,
na wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no dɔɔso.
papa a medi akyire nti wɔpɛ me ho asɛm.
AWURADE, nnya me,
me Nyankopɔn, mma wo ne me ntam nnware.
Yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me,
AWURADE, m’agyenkwa!
na mamfa me tɛkyerɛma manyɛ bɔne.
Mede nnareka bɛsɔ m’ano,
sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ wɔ m’anim yi.
memuaa m’ano, papa ho,
nanso me yea mu yɛɛ den.
M’akoma yɛɛ hyerehyere wɔ me mu,
meredwendwen no, na ogya no redɛre,
na mede me tɛkyerɛma mekasae.
ne me nna kakra a wɔasusuo no.
Ma menhunu me kyɛre a mammɛkyɛre.
na me mfeɛ nyɛ hwee w’anim.
Ampa ara, onipa asi so sɛ deɛn ara a,
na ɔyɛ huruhuro ara kwa.
Ampa ara, wɔha wɔn ho huruhuro ho,
ɔhyɛ da so, na ɔnnim deɛ ɔbɛboa ano.
Na afei, AWURADE,
ɛdeɛn na meretwɛn?
Wo so na m’ani da.
Gye me firi me mmarato nyinaa mu,
mfa me mma, na ɔkwasea mmmɔ me ahohora.
ɛfiri sɛ wo na woayɛ.
Yi wo haw firi me so.
Wo nsa ano hweɛ rehye me.
twe onipa aso a,
woma n’ahoɔfɛ hye sɛdeɛ nweweboaa yɛ.
Ampa ara, nnipa nyinaa yɛ ahuruhuro.
na yɛ aso tie me sufrɛ.
Mmua w’ano me nisuo ho,
na meyɛ wo hɔhoɔ,
meyɛ ɔmamfrani sɛ m’agyanom nyinaa.
ansa na mafiri ha, na wɔanhu me bio.
Twɛn na metwɛnee AWURADE,
na ɔyɛɛ aso maa me, na ɔtee me sufrɛ.
Na ɔyii me firii ɔsɛeɛ amena mu,
firii atɛkyɛ mu,
na ɔde me nan sii ɔbotan so,
ɔmaa m’anammɔn tintimii.
yɛn Nyankopɔn ayeyie.
Nnipa bebree bɛhunu asuro,
na wɔabata AWURADE ho.
Nhyira ne onipa a
ɔde n’ani ato AWURADE soɔ,
na ɔnnane n’ani nkyerɛ ahantanfoɔ
ne wɔn a wɔmane di atorɔ.
w’anwanwadeɛ ne w’adwene, woama no adɔɔso ama yɛn,
wɔrentumi mfa biribiara nto wo ho;
anka mɛka na makasa ho,
ɛdɔɔso sene sɛ wɔbɛtumi akan.
woasiesie aso de ama me,
wommisa ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ
ne bɔne ho afɔdeɛ.
Ɛnna mekaa sɛ: Hwɛ, mereba,
wɔatwerɛ me ho asɛm nwoma mmobɔeɛ no mu.
Deɛ mepɛ ne sɛ mɛyɛ deɛ wo, me Nyankopɔn, wopɛ,
na wo mmara wɔ m’akomam.
asafo kɛseɛ mu,
hwɛ, meremmua m’ano,
AWURADE, wonim.
Mankora wo tenenee m’akomam,
maka wo nokorɛ ne wo nkwagyeɛ,
mansi w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ so
asafo kɛseɛ mu.
Wo, AWURADE, worensi me
wo mmɔborɔhunu so,
w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ
bɛbɔ me ho ban daa.
Na bɔne a wɔnnim ano
atwa me ho ahyia,
m’amumuyɛ asɔ me mu
a ɛmma menhunu adeɛ bio,
ɛdɔɔso sene me tiri so nwi,
na m’akoma agya me.
AWURADE, ma no nyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛgye me,
AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me!
asɛe no no ani nwu,
na wɔn anim ngu ase,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne nsane wɔn akyi, na wɔnnane ahohorafoɔ.
ma wɔn ho nnwiri wɔn, wɔn aniwuo akatua so.
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ nyinaa
nni ahurisie, na wɔn ani nnye wo ho;
ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagyeɛ nka daa sɛ:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ.
nanso AWURADE dwene me ho.
Wone me boafoɔ ne me gyefoɔ, me Nyankopɔn,
ntwentwɛn wo nan ase!
AWURADE bɛgye no, da bɔne mu.
AWURADE bɛhwɛ no so,
na wama no nkwa,
na wɔahyira no asase so.
Na worenyi no nhyɛ n’atamfo a wɔpɛ no nsa.
AWURADE bɛwowa no yadeɛ mpa so;
ne yadeɛ a ɔyare da hɔ nyinaa, wodane ma no si no yie.
sa me kra yadeɛ, na mayɛ wo bɔne!
M’atamfoɔ kasa me ho bɔne sɛ:
Da bɛn na ɔbɛwuo na ne din ayera?
Na sɛ ɔba bɛhwɛ me a, ɔka atorosɛm,
n’akoma tase nsɛnhunu fa,
ɔfiri adi kɔbɔ dawuro.
Wɔn a wɔtane me nyinaa tutu me ho asu,
wɔsusu me ho bɔne ka sɛ:
Abusudeɛ akuta no,
na afei ɔda hɔ yi, ɔrensɔre bio.
a ɔdii m’aduane bie no, wama ne nantin so atia me.
Na wo, AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na ma me so, na mentua wɔn so ka!
Yei ho na mɛhunu sɛ wopɛ me:
Sɛ m’atamfoɔ renni me so ahurisie.
Na me deɛ, wosɔ me mu ma megyina hɔ, me mu a medie mu,
na wode me gyina w’anim pintinn daa.
ɛfiri teteete de rekɔ daa.
Amen ne Amen.
Sɛdeɛ ɔforoteɛ pere
hwehwɛ nsuwa no,
sɛ me kra pere hwehwɛ wo,
Onyankopɔn, ne no.
Da bɛn na mɛba mabɛfiri Nyankopɔn anim?
awia ne anadwo,
sɛ wɔse me daa sɛ:
Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
na mehwie me kra wɔ me mu,
sɛdeɛ me ne asafokuo
nante kɔɔ Nyankopɔn fie,
na me ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔnam yuu hyɛ fa no
de ayeyie ne aseda nnwom kɔeɛ no.
na wosi me mu apini?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ
ne me Nyankopɔn.
Me kra aboto wɔ me mu,
enti mekae wo,
Yordan ne Hermon mmepɔ asase so,

Adɛn nti na wo werɛ afiri me?

yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn sɛ:

Wobɔɔ aman, na wɔn deɛ,

Na ɛnyɛ wɔn ara afena na wɔde nyaa asase no,

ne w’anim hann,

hyɛ na Yakob nnya nkwagyeɛ ara nko.

na m’afena nso rennye me.
Na woagye yɛn yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ nsam,

Nyankopɔn mu na yɛhoahoa yɛn ho da mu nyinaa,
na yɛyi wo din ayɛ daapem.
Nanso woato yɛn agu, na woabɔ yɛn ahohora,
na wo ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ.
Womaa yɛdanee yɛn akyiri kyerɛɛ yɛn ahodwanfoɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtane yɛn fom yɛn fa.
Wode yɛn maa sɛ nnwan a wɔdie,
na woabɔ yɛn ahwete amanaman mu.
Woantɔn wo nkurɔfoɔ annye hwee,
woamfa wɔn annye aboɔden.
ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia no fɛdie, ne ehuro.
Wode yɛn ayɛ akasabebuo amanaman mu,
woma aman bobɔ wɔn tiri nko wɔ yɛn ho.
Daa nyinaa m’ahohora da m’anim,
na aniwuo akata me so,
deɛ ɔbɔ me ahohora na ɔsopa me no nne
ne ɔtamfoɔ ne ɔweretɔfoɔ nti.
Yei nyinaa aba yɛn so,

na yɛntwaa w’apam no ho nkontompo.
Yɛn akoma nsanee n’akyi,
na yɛn anammɔn nteree wo kwan ho.
Nanso woabubu yɛn pasaa, deɛ sakraman wɔ,

Na ɔno na ɔnim akoma mu ahuntasɛm.

Wɔde anigyeɛ ne ahosan na ɛde wɔn reba,

Wo mma bɛsi w’agyanom ananmu,

Wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn ahonyadeɛ so,

Me man, montie, na merebɛkasa;
Israel tie, na merebɛdi wo adanseɛ:
Me, Onyankopɔn, meyɛ wo Nyankopɔn.
na wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ wɔ m’anim daa.
Meremfa wo fie mu nantwinini,
wo nnwammuo mu mpapo,
ɛfiri sɛ kwaeɛ mu mmoa nyinaa wɔ me,
mmepɔ apem so mmoa.
Menim mmepɔ so ntakraboa nyinaa,
na wiram mmoadoma nyinaa wɔ me hɔ.
Sɛ ɛkɔm de me a, anka merense wo,
na wiase ne ne mayɛ wɔ me.
Medi anantwinini nam?
Na menom mpapo mogya?
Bɔ aseda afɔdeɛ ma Onyankopɔn,
na tua w’aboadeɛ ma deɛ ɔwɔ ɔsorosoro no;
na mɛgye wo na woahyɛ me animuonyam.
Adɛn nti na woka m’ahyɛdeɛ,
na wode w’ano bɔ m’apam din,
na wo korɔ yi ara wokyiri animka,
na woto me nsɛm gu w’akyire?
na wo ne awaresɛefoɔ bɔ.
Wogyaa w’ano mu kɔ bɔne mu,
na wo tɛkyerɛma toatoa nnaadaasɛm.
Wotena ase ka wo nua ho nsɛm,
wo na ba mpo, wosopa no.
wosusu sɛ mete sɛ wo ara,
mɛka w’anim na mede mataataa w’anim.
Mo a mo werɛ firi Onyankopɔn no, monnwene yei ho ɛ,
na mantete mo asinasini a ɔgyefoɔ biara nni hɔ.
Deɛ ɔde aseda bɔ afɔdeɛ no hyɛ me animuonyam,
na deɛ n’akwan teeɛ no,
mɛkyerɛ no Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.
wo mmɔborɔhunu a ɛdɔɔso nti pepa me mmarato.
na prapra me ho firi me bɔne mu.
na me bɔne wɔ m’anim daa.
na mayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ w’ani so bɔne,
na woadi bem wo kasa mu,
na wo ho ate, w’atemmuo mu.
na bɔne mu na me na nyinsɛnee me.
Hwɛ, wopɛ nokorɛ me sawa mu,
na ma menhunu nyansa me mu ahuntaeɛm.
dware me, na mayɛ fitaa asene nwera.
na nnompe a woabubuo no adi ahurisie.
Yi w’ani firi me bɔne ho hunta,
na pepa m’amumuyɛ nyinaa.
na yɛ honhom foforɔ a aseɛ tim wɔ me mu.
Nto me mfiri w’anim ntwene,
na nyi wo kronkronyɛ honhom mfiri me so.
Ma mennya wo nkwagyeɛ ho abotɔyam bio,
na ayamyie honhom nsɔ me mu.
Mɛkyerɛ mmaratofoɔ w’akwan,
na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adane aba wo nkyɛn.
Onyankopɔn, me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,

na mede m’ano makyerɛ w’ayeyie.
ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ nsɔ w’ani.

daa nyinaa.

Nkɔnkɔnsa tɛkyerɛma,
wopɛ amammɔsɛm ara nko.

Hwɛ, onipa a wamfa
Onyankopɔn anyɛ ne dwanekɔbea,
na ɔde ne ho too n’ahodeɛ bebree no soɔ,
na ɔhyɛɛ ne ho den, n’anibereɛ mu, no nie.
Nyankopɔn fie,
mede me ho meto Nyankopɔn adom so
daa daa.
Mɛyi wo ayɛ daa,
sɛ wo na woyɛeɛ,
na mɛtwɛn wo din, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ,
w’ahotefoɔ anim.
Ogyegyentwie se n’akomam sɛ:
Nyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.
Wɔasɛe, na wɔyɛ amumuyɛdeɛ a wɔkyire,
obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.
Onyankopɔn firi soro
hwɛ nnipa mma,
sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma,
obi a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan.
Nanso wɔn nyinaa amane,
wɔn nyinaa aporɔ,
obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa,
ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
Amumuyɛfoɔ anhunu de,
wɔn a wɔdi me man sɛdeɛ wɔdi aduane,
na wɔnsɔre Onyankopɔn?
Ɛno na wɔn ho popoeɛ,
deɛ ahopopoɔ nnie hɔ,
na Onyankopɔn petee wɔn a wɔbɔɔ wo so nsraban nnompe,
woahyɛ wɔn aniwuo, na Onyankopɔn apa wɔn.
Hwan na ɔde Israel nkwagyeɛ bɛfiri Sion aba?
Da a Onyankopɔn de ne man agyapadeɛ bɛsane aba no,
Yakob bɛdi ahurisie, na Israel ani agye.
na fa wo tumi di m’asɛm ma me.
Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso tie m’anomu nsɛm;
na ananafoɔ asɔre atia me,
na atirimuɔdenfoɔ rehwehwɛ me kra,
wɔamfa Onyankopɔn anyɛ wɔn ani so biribi.
Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn ne me boafoɔ,
AWURADE nko ne deɛ ɔsɔ me kra mu.
Ɔbɛma m’atɛfoɔ bɔne asane akɔ wɔn so,
fa wo nokorɛ yi wɔn hɔ.
Mɛbɔ ayamyie afɔdeɛ ama wo;
AWURADE, mɛyi wo din ayɛ sɛ ɛyɛ.
na m’ani ahunu deɛ mepɛ m’atamfoɔ ho.
Onyankopɔn, yɛ aso tie me mpaebɔ,

Wɛn w’aso ma me, na gye me so.

ne ɔbɔnefoɔ ahodwan nti.
Na wɔbɔ mmusuo gu me so,

M’akoma pere wɔ me mu,
na owuo ho hu agu me so.

na ahoyera akata me so.
anka mɛtu makɔtena baabi.
Aane, anka mɛdwane makɔ akyirikyiri,
na makɔtena serɛ so.

ne ahum yi mu.
na mahunu amimdie ne aperedie, kuro no mu.
Awia ne anadwo wɔnam
n’afasuo so twa ho hyia,

Amammɔsɛm wɔ mu,
na nhyɛsoɔ ne nnaadaa
mpa n’abɔntene so.
Na ɛnyɛ ɔtamfoɔ na ɔbɔ me ahohora,
ɛno deɛ, anka mɛtie.
Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔkyiri me na ɔkyerɛ ne ho wɔ me soɔ,
anka mede me ho bɛhunta no.
me yɔnko ne me manni,

na yɛnam yɔɔ kɔ Nyankopɔn fie.
Ma owuo nto nsi wɔn so,
ma wɔnsiane nkɔ Asamando anikan,
na nsɛmmmɔne wɔ wɔn tenabea ne wɔn mu.
Me deɛ, mɛsu mafrɛ Onyankopɔn,
na AWURADE abɛgye me.
Anwummerɛ ne anɔpa ne awigyina
na mɛdwene me tirim na masi apini,
na ɔbɛte me nne.
Wagye me kra asomdwoeɛ mu,
na wɔammɛn me,
na wɔn a wɔne me anya dɔɔso.
Na ɔno na ɔte hɔ firi teteete.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔnsakyera,
nanso wɔnsuro Onyankopɔn.
Ɔtene ne nsa ne nnamfonom so,
wabu n’apam so.
na ɔko wɔ n’akomam.

m’asɛefoɔ a wɔyɛ m’atamfoɔ atorofoɔ dɔɔso,
deɛ memfaeɛ no,
wɔse mennane memma.
Onyankopɔn, wonim me nkwaseasɛm,
na me mfomsoɔ nhunta wo.
AWURADE, asafo AWURADE Nyankopɔn,
mma wɔn a wɔtwɛn woɔ ani nnwu me ho,
Israel Nyankopɔn,
mma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ no anim nngu ase, me nti.
na aniwuo ahyɛ m’ani so ma.
mayɛ me na mma mu ɔnanani.
na wɔn a wɔbɔ wo ahohora ahohorabɔ aba me so.
Na me kra suu mmuada mu,
na ɛdanee me ahohorabɔ.
Mede ayitoma meyɛɛ me ntoma
na mayɛ wɔn akasabebuo.
na nsanomfoɔ de me to dwom.
adom berɛ mu,
Onyankopɔn, w’adɔeɛ kɛseɛ nti,
fa wo nkwagyeɛ nokorɛ gye me so.
Yi me firi atɛkyɛ mu, na mammem,
ma wɔnyi me mfiri wɔn a wɔkyiri me nsam
ne abunu mu.
Mma asuo a ayire no mmfa me,
na mma ebunu mmmene me,
na mma amena nnka me nnhyɛ mu mmmua n’ano.
AWURADE, gye me so, na w’adɔeɛ yɛ,
dane w’ani kyerɛ me,
sɛdeɛ wo mmɔborɔhunu bebree no teɛ.
Na nyi w’ani nhunta w’akoa,
na me ho dwane me, gye me so ntɛm.
Twe bɛn me kra, na bɛgye no,
m’atamfoɔ nti gye me.
Wonim m’ahohora
ne m’aniwuo ne me nsopa,
w’ani tua m’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa.
na mehwɛ deɛ ɔrebɛma me due kwan a, obi mma,
mehwehwɛ awerɛkyekyefoɔ a, menhunu bi.
na me sukɔm mu wɔmaa me nsa kekakeka sɛ mennom.
na wɔdi yie a, ma no nyɛ afidie mma wɔn.
Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu,
na wɔanhunu adeɛ,
na ma wɔn sisi mpopo daa,
ma w’ani mmere wɔn so,
na w’awerɛhoɔ ne w’abufuo nka wɔn.
na obiara nntena wɔn ntomadan mu.
na wɔka wɔn a woapira wɔn no yea kyerɛ.
na mma wɔmmma wo tenenee mu.
na mma wɔnntwerɛ wɔne ateneneefoɔ din mmmom.
Na me deɛ, meyɛ ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ɔwerɛhoni,
Onyankopɔn, ma wo nkwagyeɛ mma me so.
Mede dwontoɔ bɛyi Nyankopɔn din ayɛ,
na mede aseda makamfo no.
asene nantwinini a ɔwɔ mmɛn na ne tɔte mu apaeɛ.
mo a mohwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan,
mo akoma nnya nkwa.
Na AWURADE tie ahiafoɔ,
na ɔnto ne nkurɔfoɔ nneduafoɔ ho mpe.
Ma ɔsoro ne asase nyi no ayɛ,
ɛpo ne deɛ ɛkeka ne ho wɔ mu nyinaa.
Na Onyankopɔn bɛgye Sion
na wakyekyere Yuda nkuro,
na wɔatena mu, na ayɛ wɔn dea.
Na ne nkoa asefoɔ bɛnya adi,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ ne din no atena mu.
AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra ani nwu
na wɔn anim ngu ase,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne nsane wɔn akyi
na wɔnnane ahohorafoɔ.
Wɔn a wɔse “wiɛ, wiɛ” no,
ma wɔnsane wɔn akyi,
wɔn aniwuo akatua ho.
Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ nyinaa nni ahurisie
na wɔn ani nnye wo ho,
na ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagyeɛ no nka daa sɛ:
Ma wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ.
Na me deɛ, meyɛ mmɔbɔ, na meyɛ ohiani.
Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm ma me.
Wone me boafoɔ ne me gyefoɔ,
AWURADE, ntwentwɛn wo nan ase.
Wo AWURADE na madwane mabɛtoa woɔ,
m’anim rengu ase da biara da.
Fa wo tenenee yi me, na gye me,
yɛ aso ma me, na gye me nkwa.
Woahyɛ sɛ wɔnnye me nkwa,
na wone me botan ne me ho fasuo.
Me Nyankopɔn, gye me firi ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam,
gye me omumuyɛfoɔ ne otirimuɔdenfoɔ nsam.
Na wo, AWURADE, ne m’anidasoɔ,
deɛ mefiri me mmɔfraase mede me ho metoo ne soɔ.
woyii me firii me na yam,
wo na mɛyi wo ayɛ daa.
na wone me dwanekɔhyɛbea a ɛyɛ den.
W’ayeyie ne w’anidie
bɛhyɛ m’anomu ma da mu nyinaa.
na sɛ m’ahoɔden sa a, nnya me.
Na m’atamfoɔ ka me ho asɛm,
na wɔn a wɔtɛ me kra bom tu agyina
ka sɛ: Onyankopɔn apa no;
monti no nkye no,
na obi nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye no.
Onyankopɔn, mma me ne wo ntam nnware,
me Nyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
Me kra ho asɛmpɛfoɔ ani bɛwu na wɔayera,
ahohora ne nsopa bɛkata wɔn a
wɔpɛ me bɔne so.
Na me deɛ, mɛtwɛn ara daa,
na mede bi maka w’ayeyie nyinaa ho.
ɛbɛka wo nkwagyeɛ da mu nyinaa
a mennim ano.
Mede AWURADE Nyankopɔn ahoɔdenneɛ bɛba abɛkae wo tenenee
a ɛyɛ wo nkutoo dea no.
na maka w’anwanwadeɛ no mabɛduru sɛsɛɛ.
kɔsi sɛ mɛka wo tumi ho asɛm makyerɛ nkyirimma,
na maka wo mmaninyɛ makyerɛ wɔn a wɔbɛba nyinaa.
wo tenenee kɔ sorosoro,
wo a woayɛ ade akɛseɛ,
Onyankopɔn, hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ?
wobɛma yɛanya nkwa bio,
na woatwe yɛn
afiri asase akunu mu asane aba.
Wobɛma me kɛseyɛ adɔ,
na woadane w’ani akyekyere me werɛ.
Me nso mede bɛnta bɛyi wo ayɛ,
me Nyankopɔn, ne wo nokorɛ,
mede sankuten bɛto wo,
O Israel Hotefoɔ no, dwom.
Meto ayeyie dwom ma wo a,
m’ano ne me kra
a woagye no no ho bɛsane no.
Mede me tɛkyerɛma
nso bɛka wo tenenee ho asɛm daa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no ani awu,
na wɔn anim agu ase.
Onyankopɔn, fa w’atemmuo ma ɔhene,
ne wo tenenee ma ɔhene ba.
Ma no mfa tenenee nni wo man so,
na ɔmfa atemmuo nhwɛ w’amanehunufoɔ.
na nkokoɔ nso de tenenee aba.
na wagye ahiafoɔ mma nkwa,
na wabubu nhyɛsofoɔ mu pasapasa.
Owia ne ɔsrane da so wɔ hɔ yi,
wɔbɛsuro wo, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
Ɔbɛba sɛ osuo a ɛtɔ gu ɛserɛ a wɔahu soɔ so,
sɛ osu kɛseɛ a ɛtɔ dwodwo asase mu.
Ɔteneneeni bɛsi frɔmm ne berɛ so,
na asomdwoeɛ pii bɛba akɔduru sɛ ɔsrane nni hɔ bio.
de afiri asubɔnten no so akɔsi asase ano.
na n’atamfo atafere mfuturo.
bɛba abɛyɛ ayɛ,
Saba ne Seba ahemfo bɛba abɛkyɛ adeɛ.
amanaman nyinaa bɛsom no.
ne ɔmanehunufoɔ a ɔnni boafoɔ.
Ɔbɛkora ɔbrɛfoɔ ne ohiani,
na wagye ahiafoɔ nkwa.
na wɔn mogya boɔ ayɛ den n’anim.
na ɔde Seba sika no bi bɛma no,
na ɔno nso bɛbɔ mpaeɛ ama no daa,
ahyira no da mu nyinaa.
Asase no so aburoofuo bɛduru mmepɔ atifi,
ɛso aba bɛwoso
sɛ Lebanon,
na nkuro no asoa
sɛ asase so nwira.
na owia wɔ hɔ yi ne din asi so,
na nnipa de no ahyira wɔn ho,
na amanaman nyinaa ahyira no.
Nhyira ne AWURADE Nyankopɔn,
Israel Nyankopɔn a ɔno nko yɛ anwanwadeɛ,
na n’animuonyam nhyɛ asase nyinaa ma.
Amen ne Amen.
Yisai ba Dawid mpaebɔ asa.
Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn yɛ ma Israel,
ma wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ.
m’anammɔn reyɛ awatiri.
ɛfiri sɛ mehunuu abɔnefoɔ yie a wɔdie no.
Wɔnhunu owuo mu aninyanneɛ,
na wɔwɔ honam ne ahoɔden.
Ɔdasani haw deɛ, wɔnni bi,
nanso wɔnnwane wɔn ho sɛ nnipa binom.
Enti ahantan adi wɔn kɔn ho barehyia,
na akakabensɛm asi wɔn aduradeɛ.
wɔn akoma mu adwene firi bu so.
Wɔsi atwetwe na wɔde adwemmɔne ka amimdie asɛm,
wɔka akokurokosɛm.
Wɔma wɔn ano to ɔsoro,
na wɔn tɛkyerɛma nenam asase so.
Enti wɔn nkurɔfoɔ twe bɛdane wɔn,
na wɔnya nsuo kuruwa ma nom.
nimdeɛ wɔ ɔsorosoroni no tirim anaa?
Hwɛ, yeinom ne abɔnefoɔ,
nanso wɔn ho dwo wɔn daa, wɔama wɔn adeɛ adɔɔso.
Ampa ara, mate m’akoma ho kwa,
na mahohoro me nsa bemdie mu kwa,
nanso wɔaha me da mu nyinaa
na wɔatwe m’aso anɔpa biara.
Sɛ mese: Mɛka no sɛɛ deɛ a,
anka matwa wo mmasantene nkontompo.
Na mesusuu ho sɛ mɛhunu adeɛ yi,
ɛyɛɛ m’ani so den dodo,
kɔsii sɛ mekɔɔ Nyankopɔn kronkron mu hɔ na
mekɔhunuu deɛ akyire ɛkɔwiee wɔn.
Ampa ara, wode wɔn gyina deɛ ɛhɔ yɛ torɔ,
wode wɔn hwe fam bubu wɔn pasaa.
Hwɛ sɛ wɔadane sɛ amamfo seesei ara,
ehu ama wɔawie sa.
Sɛ daeɛ a wɔaso anyane,
na wo, AWURADE, wokanyane wo ho a,
woma ani pa wɔn sunsumban soɔ.
Sɛ ɛyɛ m’akoma awerɛho
na me sawa mu wowɔ me a,
na mayɛ sɛ aboa, w’ani so.
Na me deɛ, mɛtena wo nkyɛn daa,
woasɔ me nsa nifa mu.
Wonam w’atirimpɔ so kyerɛkyerɛ me kwan,
na akyire yi no, woagye me akɔ animuonyam mu.
Hwan na mewɔ no ɔsoro?
Na sɛ wowɔ me a, menhwehwɛ asase so hwee.
Onyankopɔn ne m’akoma botan ne me kyɛfa daa.
Na hwɛ, wɔn a wɔfiri wo nkyɛn kɔ akyiri no bɛyera,
wobɛsɛe wɔn a wɔfiri wo nkyɛn kɔbɔ adwaman nyinaa.
Na me deɛ, Nyankopɔn nkyɛn tena yɛ ma me,
mede AWURADE Nyankopɔn mayɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea
na maka wo nnwuma nyinaa.
Onyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woasum yɛn agu koraa,
na w’abufuo rehye w’adidibea nnwan?
woagye wɔn sɛ w’agyapadeɛ mantam no,
Sion bepɔ a wobɛtenaa soɔ no.
Ma wo nan so bɛhwɛ daa amamfo no,
ɔtamfoɔ asɛe kronkronbea hɔ ade nyinaa.
W’atamfo teateam w’ahyiaeɛ mu,
wɔasi wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ de ayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ.
Wɔyɛɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔma mmonnua so kɔ soro
de rebɛbu kwae mu nnupa,
na afei — ɛho nnwinneɛ nyinaa,
wɔde akuma ne asaeɛ abubu.
wɔagu deɛ wo din tenaeɛ no ho fi.
Momma yɛmmia wɔn nkɔ fam prɛko.
Wɔahyehye Nyankopɔn ahyiaeɛ nyinaa asase so.
Yɛnhunu yɛn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ,
odiyifoɔ bi nni hɔ bio,
na yɛn mu biara nnim da ko a ɛbɛkɔ akɔsie.
Onyankopɔn, ɔhohiahiafoɔ nka ahohorasɛm nkɔsi da bɛn?
Ɔtamfoɔ ngu wo din ho fi daa anaa?
Adɛn nti na wotwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa?
Yi firi wo kokom, wie wɔn.
Nanso Onyankopɔn ne me hene firi teteete,
ɔyɛ ɔgyeɛ adwuma asase so.
wobobɔɔ nsuo atweaseɛ ti, nsuo no ani.
Wopɛkyɛɛ dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn ti,
wode no yɛɛ ɛserɛ sofoɔ aduane.
womaa asukɛseɛ a ɛsene daa wee.
wo na woasiesie akanea ne owia.
Wo na woatwa asase ano nyinaa hyeɛ,
wo na woyɛɛ ahuhuro ne awɔ berɛ.
Kae yei sɛ atamfoɔ bɔɔ AWURADE ahohora,
AWURADE, na ɔman agyegyentwie guu wo din ho fi.
Mfa w’anyankuku kra nhyɛ mmoa nsa,
mma wo werɛ mmfiri wo mmɔborɔfoɔ kra da.
Ma w’ani mmra apam no so,
na atirimuɔdensɛm tenabea ayeyɛ asase so nkokoam ma.
Mma deɛ wɔhyɛ no soɔ mmfa ahohora nnsane mmma,
ma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani nyi wo din ayɛ.
Onyankopɔn, sɔre, bɛdi wo ara w’asɛm,
kae sɛdeɛ nkwasea bɔ wo ahohora da mu nyinaa.
Mma wo werɛ mmfiri w’atamfo nne,
wɔn a wɔsɔre tia woɔ no gyegyeegye a ɛkɔ soro daa yi.
na wo din abɛn; wɔka w’anwanwadeɛ kyerɛ.
Mɛba berɛ a ɛsɛ mu,
na me ara mabɛbu atɛntenenee.
Asase ne wɔn a wɔte soɔ nyinaa mu hodwo a,
me na mede mu afadum mesisi hɔ.
Mese ahokyerɛfoɔ sɛ: Monnyɛ ahokyerɛ.
Na mese abɔnefoɔ sɛ: Mommma abɛn no so.
Mommma mo abɛn so nnkɔ soro,
monnto bamkɔn nnkasa.
Na ɛmfiri apueeɛ, na ɛmfiri atɔeɛ,
nanso ɛmfiri mmepɔ serɛ so,
ɔbɛbrɛ oyi ase, na wama oyi so.
na emu bobesa ani firi ahuro,
mfrasa ayɛ mu ma, na ɔhwie bi; ampa ara,
aseɛ puo mpo, asase so abɔnefoɔ nyinaa bɛfefe anom.
Na me deɛ, mɛka ɛho asɛm daa,
mɛto Yakob Nyankopɔn ayeyie dwom,
na abɔnefoɔ mmɛn nyinaa, mɛbubu,
teneneefoɔ mmɛn na wɔbɛma soɔ.
Yuda mu na wɔahunu Onyankopɔn,
ne din so Israel mu.
na ne tenabea wɔ Sion.
ɔkyɛm ne nkrantɛ ne ɔsa.
W’anim yɛ nyam,
na ɛhran sene asadeɛ mmepɔ no.
Wɔasɛe abrane akokoɔdurufoɔ no,
wɔatɔ nko da wɔn nna,
na ahoɔdenfoɔ no mu biara anhunu ne nsa.
Yakob Nyankopɔn, w’ateatea nti
na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ nyinaa adeda nnahɔɔ.
Wo na wo ho yɛ hu,
na sɛ wo bo refu a,
hwan na ɔbɛtumi agyina w’anim?
asase suroe na ɛtɛm dinn,
berɛ a Onyankopɔn sɔre bɛbuu atɛn,
sɛ ɔbɛgye wɔn a wɔdwoɔ asase soɔ nyinaa no.
Na nnipa abufuhyeɛ dane wo ayeyie,
wode abufuhyeɛ a ɛboro soɔ bɔ abɔsoɔ.
Ma wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa
mfa ayɛyɛdeɛ mmrɛ deɛ ne ho yɛ hu no.
Ɔhu atumfoɔ home gu,
ne ho yɛ asase so ahemfo hu.
na masu mafrɛ no;
mɛma me nne so makyerɛ Onyankopɔn,
na ɔbɛyɛ aso ama me.
M’ahohia da mu na mehwehwɛɛ AWURADE,
me nsam atene anadwo nyinaa,
na ɛmpa aba, me kra po awerɛkyekyerɛ.
Mekae Onyankopɔn a, mesi apini,
medwene a, me honhom tɔ piti.
Wokura m’anisuatɛtɛ mu,
ɛpempem me, na mentumi menkasa.
tete mmerɛ no mu mfeɛ.
Mekae m’anadwo dwom, medwene m’akomam,
na me honhom hwehwɛm pɛsɛpɛsɛ.
na ɔrennom bi bio anaa?
N’adɔeɛ awie mutwa koraa anaa?
N’asɛm a ɔkaeɛ no asa ama awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa anaa?
Onyankopɔn werɛ afiri adom,
anaasɛ ɔde abufuo atwe ne mmɔborɔhunu ato ne yam?
Ɛnna mese: Me dadwene a ɛda me soɔ ne sɛ,
ɔsorosoroni no nifa asakyera.
Mɛkae AWURADE nneyɛɛ maka,
aane, mɛkae wo tete anwanwadeɛ,
na masusu w’adwuma nyinaa ho,
na madwene wo nneyɛɛ ho.
hwan na ɔyɛ nyame kɛseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn?
Wone Onyankopɔn a woyɛ anwanwadeɛ,
woama wɔahunu wo tumi, aman mu.
Wode wo nsa na agye wo man,
Yakob ne Yosef mma no.
Asuasu hunuu wo, Onyankopɔn,
asuasu hunuu wo, na wɔbɔɔ binim,
abunu nso wosowosoe.
Amununkum tɔɔ osuo bibibibi,
ewiem tɔnn gyegyee,
w’agyan nso pepaa anyinam,
w’aprannaa boboom, ahum a ɛdi kyinhyia mu.
Anyinam hyerɛn wiase,
asase popoe na ɛwosoe.
Wo kwan faa ɛpo mu,
na wo tempɔn nsuo pii mu,
na wɔanhunu w’anammɔn.
bɛgyaa wo man sɛ nnwankuo.
Me man, monyɛ aso mma me nkyerɛkyerɛ,
monwɛn mo aso mma m’anomu nsɛm.
mɛyi atetesɛm adi sɛ akasabebuo.
na yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn no,
yɛremfa nhunta wɔn mma,
yɛreka nkyirimma AWURADE ayeyisɛm,
ne ne tumidie, ne n’anwanwadeɛ a wayɛ no.
Ɔde adanseɛ tintim Yakob mu,
na ɔhyɛɛ mmara Israel mu,
ɛno na ɔde hyɛɛ yɛn agyanom
sɛ wɔmma wɔn mma nhunu,
na nkyirimma,
mma a wɔbɛwo wɔn no, ahunu,
na wɔsi so a, wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn mma,
sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ani nto Nyankopɔn so,
na wɔn werɛ mmfiri Nyankopɔn nneyɛɛ,
na wɔnni ne mmara nsɛm so.
mma asoɔdenfoɔ ne atuatefoɔ,
mma a wɔmfa wɔn akoma nsi tee,
na wɔn honhom nni Nyankopɔn nokorɛ.
Efraim mmabanin, taduakurafoɔ, bɛmmatofoɔ,
wɔdane wɔn ani ɔko da.
Wɔanni Nyankopɔn apam so,
na ne mmara nso, wɔampɛ sɛ wɔnante mu.
Na wɔn werɛ firii ne nneyɛɛ
ne n’anwanwadeɛ a ɔde kyerɛɛ wɔn no.
Misraim asase so, Soan petee mu.
na ɔmaa nsuo gyinaa sɛ ekuo.
na anadwo nyinaa ɔde ogya kanea nso gyaa wɔn.
na ɔmaa wɔnom sɛ asukɛseɛ.
Ɔmaa nsubɔntene firii ɔbotan mu bae,
na ɔmaa nsuo senee sɛ asutene.
Nanso wɔkɔɔ so ara yɛɛ no bɔne,
tee ɔsorosoroni no anim atua anwea pradada so.
bisaa no aduane sɛdeɛ wɔn kɔn dɔeɛ,
na wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn sɛ:
Onyankopɔn bɛtumi ato pono ɛserɛ so anaa?
Hwɛ, ɔbɔɔ ɔbotan ma nsuo tui,
na asubɔnten senee;
paanoo nso, ɔbɛtumi ama,
na wapɛ nam ama ne man anaa?
na ogya sɔɔ Yakob mu,
na abufuo nso sɔre tiaa Israel,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔannye Onyankopɔn anni,
na wɔamfa wɔn ho anto ne nkwagyeɛ so.
Nanso ɔhyɛɛ ewiem tɔnn ɔsoro,
na ɔhinii ɔsoro apono,
na ɔde ɔsoro aduane maa wɔn.
Atumfoɔ aduane na onipa diiɛ,
ɔmaa wɔn aduane di mee.
Ɔmaa apueeɛ mframa bɔe ɔsoro,
na ɔde ne tumi twee anafoɔ mframa bae,
na ɔtɔɔ nam guu wɔn so sɛ mfuturo,
ne ntakraboa sɛ mpoano anwea.
Na ɔmaa wɔtotɔɔ wɔn nsraban mu
de twaa wɔn tenabea ho hyiae.
Na wɔdi mee boroo so,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔmaa wɔn wɔn akɔnnɔdeɛ.
Wɔnnya nnyaee wɔn akɔnnɔ no,
wɔn aduane da so wɔ wɔn anomu no,
na ɔkunkumm wɔn mu abrane no mu bi,
na ɔde Israel mmeranteɛ hwehwee fam.
Yei nyinaa mu na wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne,
na wɔannye n’anwanwadeɛ no anni.
ne wɔn mfeɛ ehu mu.
Ɔreku wɔn no, na wɔhwehwɛɛ no,
na wɔsane bɛpɛɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan ntɛm,
na wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn ne wɔn botan,
na ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn ne wɔn gyefoɔ.
Wɔde wɔn ano dɛfɛdɛfɛɛ no,
na wɔde wɔn tɛkyerɛma dii atorɔ kyerɛɛ no,
na wɔn akoma deɛ, ɛntim ne ho,
na wɔanni n’apam mu nokorɛ.
Na ɔno deɛ, ɔyɛ ntimmɔborɔ nti,
ɔkataa wɔn amumuyɛ so,
na wansɛe nnipa;
na ɔtaa sianka n’abufuo,
na wanhwanyan n’awerɛhoɔ nyinaa.
mframa a ɛkorɔ na ɛnsane n’akyiri bio.
na wɔanho ne werɛ anwea pradada soɔ!
Na wɔsane sɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe,
na wɔyii Israel Kronkronni no ahi.
Wɔankae ne tumi,
da a ɔyii wɔn firii ɔhohiahiafoɔ nsam,
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, Soan petee mu no.
na wɔantumi annom wɔn nsuwansuwa.
ne mponkyerɛne maa wɔbɛsɛee wɔn.
na ɔde wɔn adwumadeɛ maa ntutummɛ.
na ɔde nsukyenkyeneeɛ bɔɔ wɔn akyee nnua,
na ɔyii wɔn afieboa maa asukɔtweaa,
ne wɔn mmoakuo maa asraman.
Ɔtoo n’abufuo hyehyeɛ no guu wɔn so,
anibereɛ, ahi ne ahohia,
abɔfoɔ bɔne a ɔsomaa wɔn baa wɔn soɔ no.
wankora wɔn kra amfiri owuo mu,
na ɔyii wɔn nkwa maa owuyadeɛ.
wɔn ahoɔden asefire, Ham ntomadan mu.
na ɔkaa wɔn sɛ mmoakuo, ɛserɛ so,
na wɔn atamfoɔ deɛ, ɛpo no kataa wɔn so.
bepɔ a ne nsa nifa gyeeɛ no so.
Ɔpampamm amanaman, wɔn anim,
na ɔtwee wɔn awunnyadeɛ so ntonto kyɛɛ no homa so,
na ɔmaa Israel mmusuakuo tenatenaa wɔn ntomadan mu.
Nanso wɔsɔɔ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn hwɛe tee no atua,
na n’adansesɛm no, wɔanni so.
wɔmanee sɛ tadua daadaafoɔ.
na wɔde wɔn ahoni maa no twee ninkunu.
Onyankopɔn tee, na ne bo fui,
na Israel ho yɛɛ no nwunu koraa.
ntomadan a ɔsii nnipa mu no.
Ɔde n’ahoɔden hyɛɛ nnommumfa mu,
na ɔde n’animuonyam hyɛɛ ɔtamfoɔ nsa.
Ɔgyaa ne man maa nkrantɛ,
na ne bo fuu n’agyapadeɛ.
Ogya hyee wɔn mmeranteɛ,
na wɔn mmabaa nso, wɔanto wɔn ayeforɔ dwom.
na wɔn akunafoɔ annya asuyɛ.
Na AWURADE nyanee sɛ obi a ɔfiri nna mu,
sɛ ɔkatakyie a nsa ma no huro,
na ɔbobɔɔ n’atamfo maa wɔsanee wɔn akyi,
ɔbɔɔ wɔn daa adapaa.
na Efraim abusuakuo no, wamfa;
Sion bepɔ a wadɔ no no.
Na ɔsii ne kronkronbea sɛ ɔsoro
sɛ asase a ɔde atim hɔ daa no.
na ɔfaa no firii nnwammuo mu.
sɛ ɔmmɛyɛne ne man Yakob
ne n’agyapadeɛ Israel.
Na ɔyɛnee wɔn akoma mudie so,
na ɔde ne nsam nimdeɛ kyerɛɛ wɔn kwan.
Onyankopɔn, amanaman aba w’agyapadeɛ mu,
wɔagu w’asɔrefie kronkron ho fi,
wɔama Yerusalem ayɛ agoago.
Wɔde wo nkoa amu
ama ewiem nnomaa adi,
wɔde w’ahotefoɔ nam ama asase so mmoa.
Wɔahwie wɔn mogya agu sɛ nsuo
de atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia,
na deɛ ɔsie wɔn nni hɔ.
fɛdie ne ahiyie ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia.
na wo ninkuntwe adɛre sɛ ogya?
a wɔnni woɔ
ne ahennie
a wɔmmɔ wo din no so,
na wɔamene Yakob,
na wɔahye ne tenabea ase.
Nkae akanefoɔ amumuyɛ mfa ngu yɛn so,
yɛ ntɛm ma w’ayamhyehyeɛ mmɛhyia yɛn,
na wɔabrɛ yɛn ase fɔmm.
Di boa yɛn, yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
wo din animuonyam nti na yi yɛn,
na wo din nti kata yɛn bɔne so.
Wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
Ma wɔnhunu amanaman mu, yɛn anim,
sɛ wotɔ wo nkoa mogya a wɔka guiɛ no so were.
sɛ wo nsa kɛseyɛ teɛ no, kora owuo mma.
dane no mprɛnson gu wɔn kokom.
Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo man ne w’adidibea nnwan no,
yɛbɛda wo ase daa,
yɛbɛka w’ayeyie akyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa.
wo a woka Yosef sɛ nnwankuo,
wo a wote Kerubim soɔ, pue hran.
Efraim ne Benyamin ne Manase anim
na ma wo homene soɔ,
na bra bɛgye yɛn.
na ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, wo bo bɛfu
atia wo man mpaebɔ akɔsi da bɛn?
na wode nisuo maa wɔnomee.
Wode yɛn yɛɛ ntɔkwa maa wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho,
na yɛn atamfoɔ sereseree wɔ wɔn mu.
na ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
wotutuu amanaman na wobɛtɛe.
Woyii n’anim kwan, na ɛgyee nhini,
na ɛyɛɛ asase ma.
Ne nwunu kataa mmepɔ so,
na ne nhoma kataa Nyankopɔn tweneduro so.
Ɛbaebaee ne mman mu kɔduruu ɛpo ho,
na n’abasa frɔmfrɔm kɔɔ asubɔnten no ho.
ma wɔn a wɔnam kwan soɔ nyinaa tete no yi?
Kwaeɛm kɔkɔte sɛe no,
na petee mu mmoa we.
Asafo Nyankopɔn, sane w’akyiri ɛ!
Brɛ w’ani ase firi soro hwɛ,
na bɛhwɛ obobe yi,
na bɛwowa deɛ wo nifa tɛeɛ no,
ne ɔba a woafa no ayɛ wo deɛ no pintinn.
Wɔde ogya ahye no, wɔatwitwa no,
w’anim ateatea nti wɔresɛe.
Fa wo nsa kata wo nifa nipa no so,
onipa ba a woafa no ayɛ wo deɛ pintinn no so,
na yɛrentwe mfiri wo nkyɛn.
Ma yɛnnya nkwa, na yɛmmɔ wo din.
ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
Mommɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn, yɛn ahoɔden,
monhuro mma Yakob Nyankopɔn.
Monto dwom na monyan mpintin,
mommɔ sanku dɛdɛ ne bɛnta.
ɔsrane korokumatwa mu, mma yɛn afahyɛ da.
Na ɛne sɛnnahɔ ma Israel,
atorɔmudeɛ ma Yakob Nyankopɔn.
Ɔde adi adanseɛ, Yosef mu,
ɛberɛ a ɔfirii adi faa Misraim asase soɔ,
metee obi a menni no kasa.
Meyii ne mmatiri firii adesoa ase,
ne ne nsa firii kɛntɛn ho;
mefiri aprannaa mu megyee wo so.
Mesɔɔ wo mehwɛɛ Meriba asuo ho.
Me man, tie, na menni wo adanseɛ,
O Israel, sɛ wobɛtie me a!
na nsɔre onyame nanani biara.
Me ara mene AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn
a meyii wo Misraim asase so mebaeɛ no,
trɛ wo anomu tɛtrɛɛ na menhyɛ no ma.
Nanso me man antie me nne,
na Israel ampene me.
maa wɔnantee wɔn ara tirim agyina a wɔtuiɛ mu.
Ao, sɛ me man tie me ɛ,
sɛ Israel nante m’akwan so ɛ!
Anka ɛrenkyɛ na mabrɛ wɔn atamfoɔ ase,
na madane me nsa matia wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ.
Anka AWURADE atamfoɔ bɛbrɛ wɔn ho ase ama no,
na wɔn berɛ akyɛre akɔsi daa.
na mede abotan mu woɔ bɛma woamee.
ɔbu atɛn anyame ntam.
na moahwɛ abɔnefoɔ anim akɔsie?
monni asɛntenenee mma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne mmɔborɔni.
Monnye ɔbrɛfoɔ ne ohiani,
monhwim wɔn mfiri abɔnefoɔ nsam.
Wɔnnim de, na wɔnte aseɛ,
esum mu na wɔnante korɔ,
asase nnyinasoɔ nyinaa rewoso.
na mo nyinaa yɛ ɔsorosoroni no mma,
nanso mobɛwuwu sɛ nnipa pɛ,
na moatotɔ sɛ ahemfo mu biara.
Ao! Onyankopɔn, sɔre ɛ, bu asase atɛn,
na wo na wobɛdi adeɛ, amanaman nyinaa mu.
Onyankopɔn, nyɛ komm,
mmua w’ano, na nhome, Onyankopɔn.
Na hwɛ, w’atamfo yɛ gyegyeegye,
na wɔn a wɔkyiri woɔ ama wɔn tiri so.
na wɔkɔ wɔn a wɔahunta no tiri so agyina.
Wɔka sɛ: Mommra mma yɛnku wɔn ase mfiri ɔman no mu,
na wɔankae Israel din bio.
Na wɔde akoma korɔ tu agyina,
wo tiri so na wɔpam.
Edom ntomadan ne Ismaelfoɔ,
Moab ne Hagarfoɔ,
Gebal ne Amon ne Amalek,
Filistifoɔ asase ne wɔn a wɔte Tiro.
Asiria nso de ne ho bataa wɔn ho,
wɔaboa Lot mma.
sɛ Yabin, Kison subɔn mu.
Wɔsɛee wɔ Endor,
na wɔyɛɛ sɛ nwira dodoɔ maa asase.
na yɛ wɔn ahemfo nyinaa sɛ Sebah ne Salmuna,
Momma yɛmfa Nyankopɔn afie nni, no.
Me Nyankopɔn, yɛ wɔn sɛ ahum a ɛdi kyinhyia,
sɛ mframa anim ntɛtɛ.
Sɛ ogya a ɛhye kwaeɛ
na ogyaframa tafere mmepɔ ho no,
saa ara na fa w’ahum taa wɔn,
na fa wo mframa denden no yi wɔn hu.
AWURADE, ma wɔn ani nwu,
na wɔmmisa wo din akyiri kwan.
Ma wɔn anim ngu ase na wɔmmɔ twi daa,
na wɔmmɔ adapaa na wɔnyera,
wo a wo din de AWURADE no,
wo nko ara ne ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.
asafo AWURADE.
AWURADE adihɔ no nti,
m’akoma ne me honam di ahurisie
ma Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ.
na asomfenakatakyi anya ebuo
a ɔbɛto ne mma agu mu,
ɛne w’afɔrebukyia no, asafo AWURADE,
me Hene ne me Nyankopɔn.
wɔbɛkɔ so ayi wo ayɛ.
Nhyira ne onipa a n’ahoɔden wɔ wo mu,
na Sion atempɔn no wɔ n’akomam.
Wɔtwam nisuo bɔn no mu a,
wɔdanedane no deɛ mmasuo wɔ,
bereamporɔsuo nso de nhyira pii kata so.
Wɔnante firi ahoɔden mu kɔ ahoɔden mu
bɛpue Nyankopɔn anim, Sion.
AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso, Yakob Nyankopɔn!
na hwɛ deɛ woasra no no anim.
sene nna apem.
Mepɛ me Nyankopɔn fie nammɔnnampan mu tena mmom
sene sɛ mɛtena abɔnefoɔ ntomadan mu.
AWURADE ma adom ne animuonyam,
ɔmfa papa nkame
wɔn a wɔnam tee no.
Asafo AWURADE, nhyira ne onipa
a ɔde ne ho to wo soɔ.
AWURADE, woadom w’asase,
wode Yakob agyapadeɛ asane aba,
woakata wɔn bɔne nyinaa so.
Woatwe w’anibereɛ nyinaa,
woadane afiri w’abufuo hyehyeɛ no mu.
Yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na twa wo bo a ɛfu yɛn no to wo yam.
Wobɛtwe w’abufuo mu akɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ mu?
Worensane mma yɛn nkwa,
na wo man ani nnye wo ho?
AWURADE, ma yɛnhunu w’adɔeɛ,
na fa wo nkwagyeɛ ma yɛn.
Ampa, ɔka asomdwoeɛsɛm kyerɛ ne man ne n’ahotefoɔ,
na mma wɔnnsane nnkɔ nkwaseadeɛ mu.
Ampa ara, ne nkwagyeɛ bɛn wɔn a wɔsuro no,
na animuonyam atena yɛn asase so.
Adom ne nokorɛ bɛhyia,
na tenenee ne asomdwoeɛ adi mfeano.
Nokorɛ bɛfifiri asase so,
na tenenee afiri soro ahwɛ.
Nso AWURADE bɛma papa,
na yɛn asase bɛma ne nnɔbaeɛ.
Tenenee bɛdi n’anim,
na asi n’anammɔn kwan so.
AWURADE, brɛ w’aso ase tie me,
na meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani.
wo, me Nyankopɔn, gye w’abɔfra
a ɔde ne ho twere woɔ.
na wo na mesu mefrɛ wo da mu nyinaa.
Ma w’akoa kra ani nnye,
na wo, AWURADE, na mema me kra so mema.
na w’adɔeɛ dɔɔso ma wɔn a wɔfrɛ woɔ nyinaa.
AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ,
na tie me nkotosrɛ nne.
na wobɛgye me so.
na biribiara nte sɛ wo nnwuma.
Amanaman a woyɛeɛ nyinaa bɛba
abɛkoto w’anim, AWURADE,
na wɔabɛhyɛ wo din animuonyam.
Na woyɛ kɛseɛ, na woyɛ anwanwadeɛ,
wo nkutoo ne Onyankopɔn.
mɛnante wo nokorɛ mu;
ka m’akoma bom ma no nsuro wo din.
O AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mede m’akoma nyinaa bɛda wo ase,
na mahyɛ wo din animuonyam daa,
sɛ w’adɔeɛ so wɔ me soɔ,
na woayi me kra afiri Asamando bunu mu.
Onyankopɔn, ahantanfoɔ asɔre atia me,
na atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo rehwehwɛ me kra,
na wɔamfa wo ansi wɔn ani so.
wo boasetɔ kyɛ, na w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ dɔɔso.
fa w’ahoɔden ma w’akoa,
na gye w’afenaa ba nkwa.
Yɛ me ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ma no nsi me yie,
na m’atamfoɔ nhunu, na wɔn ani nwu,
sɛ wo, AWURADE, woaboa me akyekyere me werɛ.
AWURADE kuro a ɔkyekyereeɛ wɔ mmepɔ kronkron so.
AWURADE dɔ Sion apono sene Yakob tenabea nyinaa.
Wɔka wo ho animuonyamsɛm,
Nyankopɔn kuro.
din wɔ wɔn a wɔni me mu mpo a,
yeinom wɔwoo wɔn hɔ ara.
Na Sion ho deɛ, wɔbɛka sɛ:
Wɔwoo wɔn nyinaa mmaako mmaako wɔ ne mu,
na ɔno na ɔma n’ase tim, ɔsorosoroni no.
Sɛ AWURADE twerɛ aman din a, ɔbɛka sɛ:
Oyi, wɔwoo no hɔnom.
Na nnwontofoɔ ne asafoɔ bɛka sɛ:
Me mmasuo nyinaa wɔ wo mu.
AWURADE, me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
mesu mefrɛ, w’anim, awia ne anadwo,
ma me mpaebɔ nnuru w’anim,
na brɛ w’aso ase ma me nteamu.
Na nnebɔne afono me kra,
na me kra rebɛn Asamando.
Wɔkane me fra wɔn a wɔkɔ Amena mu mu,
mayɛ sɛ ɔbarima a ɔnni mmoa biara.
Wɔato me atwene awufoɔ mu
sɛ atɔfoɔ a wɔde wɔn agu ɛda mu
a wonkae wɔn bio,
na wɔatwa wɔn afiri wo nsam.
Wode me ato Amena donkodonko mu,
esum mu, ebunu ase tɔnn.
na woma w’asorɔkyeɛ nyinaa gu me so.
afiri me nkyɛn kɔ akyirikyiri,
wode me ayɛ wɔn akyiwadeɛ,
woato me mu a meremfiri adie.
Amaneɛ ama m’ani akusa,
mefrɛ wo, AWURADE, da mu nyinaa,
metrɛ me nsam mekyerɛ wo.
anaasɛ nsamanfoɔ bɛsɔre ayi wo ayɛ?
Wɔbɛka w’adɔeɛ ɛda mu
anaa wo nokorɛdie ɔsɛeɛ amena mu?
Wɔbɛhunu w’anwanwadeɛ, esum mu,
ne wo tenenee awerɛfire asase so?
Na me deɛ, wo, AWURADE, na mesu mefrɛ,
na me mpaebɔ tua wo nhema.
AWURADE, adɛn na woto me kra twene,
adɛn nti na wode w’anim hunta me?
Meyɛ mmɔborɔni, na mereyɛ mawu firi me mmɔfraase,
wo ho hu akuta me, na metɔ ntintan.
W’abufuo abu afa me so,
wo ho hu atware me;
atwa me ho ahyia te sɛ nsuo da mu nyinaa,
ɛbom twa me ho kanko.
na me manni kɔ sum mu.
Mɛto AWURADE adɔeɛ ho dwom daa,
mede m’ano bɛka wo nokorɛdie makyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ;
na mɛka sɛ: Adɔeɛ bɛsi so daa,
ɔsoro hɔ na wode nokorɛdie atintim.
maka ntam makyerɛ m’akoa Dawid:
Mɛma w’asefoɔ atim akɔsi daa,
na mama w’ahennwa asi so akɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ so.
Na ɔsoro yi wo, AWURADE, anwanwadeɛ ayɛ,
ne wo nokorɛ nso wɔ akronkronfoɔ asafo mu.
hwan na ɔsɛ AWURADE, anyame mma mu?
Onyankopɔn a ne ho yɛ hu, akronkronfoɔ dwabɔ kɛseɛ no mu,
na wɔsuro no sene wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa.
hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ?
Otumfoɔ AWURADE, wo nokorɛdie atwa wo ho ahyia.
sɛ n’asorɔkyeɛ sɔre a, wo na wodwodwo ano.
wode wo tumi nsa abɔ w’atamfo apansam.
wiase ne ne mayɛ, wo na wohyɛɛ aseɛ.
Atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam, wo ara na wobɔeɛ,
Tabor ne Hermon di wo din mu ahurisie.
Tumi basa ne mmarimayɛ wɔ wo,
wo nsa yɛ den, wɔama wo nifa so.
adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ gyina w’anim.
Nhyira ne ɔman a wɔnim osebɔ
na wɔnante wo, AWURADE, anim hann mu.
Wo din mu na wɔn ho bɛsɛpɛ wɔn daa nyinaa,
na wo tenenee mu na wɔama wɔn soɔ.
Na wɔn ahoɔden ahyehyɛdeɛ ne wo,
na w’adom mu na wɔama yɛn abɛn soɔ.
na Israel Kronkronni no na yɛn hene wɔ no.
kyerɛɛ w’ahotefoɔ sɛ:
Madi maboa ɔbarima bi,
mama obi a wɔayi no firi ɔman no mu so.
mede me ngo kronkron masra no.
Ɔno na me nsa bɛma no atim,
na me basa nso ahyɛ no den.
Ɔtamfoɔ bi rensisi no,
na obusuyɛfoɔ bi renhyɛ no so.
Na mɛbubu n’anim ahohiahiafoɔ,
na mabobɔ wɔn a wɔtane no.
na me din mu na wɔbɛma n’abɛn soɔ.
na mede ne nifa masi nsubɔntene so.
me Nyankopɔn ne me nkwagyeɛ botan!
Na me nso mede no bɛyɛ m’abakan,
asase so ahemfo mu pumpuni.
na m’apam atim hɔ ama no.

w’aprannaa nne nti na ɛyɛɛ ntɛm kɔeɛ,
mmepɔ memaa wɔn ho so, ɛsene kɔɔ abɔn mu,
deɛ woasiesie ama no hɔ.
Woatwa ɔhyeɛ sɛ ɛnntra,
na ansane ammɛkata asase so.
Ɔyi nsuo aniwa, abɔn mu,
ɛsene nenam mmepɔ ntam.
Ɛma wiram mmoa nyinaa nom bi,
atorɔmo de kum wɔn sukɔm.
Ɛso na ewiem nnomaa teteɛ,
nnua mman mu na wɔfiri ma wɔn nne soɔ.
Ɔfiri ne soro mpia mu gu mmepɔ so nsuo,
wo nnwuma so aba mee asase.
ne afuomduane a onipa yɛ ho adwuma,
sɛ ɔbɛma aduane afiri asase mu.
na wama ngo ayɛ onipa anim dɛhyɛdɛhyɛ,
na aduane awowa ɔdasani akoma.
Wɔma AWURADE nnua nso mee,
Lebanon ntweneduro a ɔduaeɛ no.
Ɛhɔ na nnomaa yɛ wɔn mpirebuo,
asukɔnkɔn wɔ ne fie, pepeaa nnua so.
Mmepɔ atentene yɛ dwanekɔbea ma akyekyeregya,
na abotan yɛ ma mmoakua.
owia nim ne tɔberɛ.
Woma sum duru, na adeɛ sa,
ɛno mu na kwaeɛ mu mmoa nyinaa keka wɔn ho.
Gyataburuwa bobom di mmoa akyi,
na wɔkɔpɛ wɔn aduane, Nyankopɔn nsam.
Owia pue a, wɔtwe wɔn ho,
na wɔbutubutu wɔn atu mu.
Onipa firi kɔ n’adwuma
ne ne dwumadie ho kɔsi anwummerɛ.
AWURADE, sɛdeɛ wo nnwuma si dɔɔso fa,
nyansa mu na woyɛɛ ne nyinaa,
w’abɔdeɛ ahyɛ asase so ma.
Ɛpo ni, ɛso, na ɛtrɛ kakraa,
ɛhɔ na mmoa manyamanya a ɛnni ano nenam,
mmoa nketewa ne akɛseɛ.
Ɛhɔ na ahyɛn nenam,
dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn a woyɛɛ no sɛ ɔngoro mu no ni.
sɛ ma wɔn wɔn aduane, ne berɛ mu.
Woma wɔn, na wɔtase,
wobue wo nsam, na adepa mee wɔn.
woyi wɔn ahome, na wɔgyaa mu,
na wɔsane kɔ wɔn mfuturo mu.
Wosoma w’ahome ba, na wode bɔ wɔn,
na woma asase ani yɛ foforɔ.
Ma AWURADE animuonyam ntena hɔ daa,
ma AWURADE ani nnye ne nnwuma mu.
ɔka mmepɔ na ɛfiri wisie.
Mete aseɛ yi, mɛto dwom mama AWURADE,
mewɔ hɔ yi, mɛto ayeyie dwom mama me Nyankopɔn.
Ɔmma m’adwene yi nyɛ no fɛ,
na me nso m’ani bɛgye AWURADE ho.
Ma nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nsa asase so,
na mma abɔnefoɔ nntena hɔ bio.
Me kra, hyira AWURADE.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ.
mommɔ ne din,
momma wɔnhunu ne nneyɛɛ, aman mu.
Monto dwom mma no, monto ayeyie dwom mma no,
monnwene n’anwanwadeɛ nyinaa ho nka.
Momfa ne din kronkron nhyehyɛ mo ho,
wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ AWURADE no akoma ntɔ wɔn yam.
Mompɛ AWURADE ne ne tumi akyiri kwan,
monhwehwɛ n’anim daa.
Monkae n’anwanwadeɛ a wayɛ,
n’ahodwirideɛ ne n’anom atemmusɛm no,
mo, n’akoa Abraham asefoɔ,
Yakob a ɔyii no no mma.
Ɔno ne AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn,
n’atemmuo wɔ asase nyinaa so.
Ɔkae n’apam no de kɔsi daa,
asɛm a ɔhyɛ maa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ apem no,
apam a ɔne Abraham pameeɛ no
ne ne ntam a ɔkaa Isak no,
na ɔde sii hɔ maa Yakob sɛ ahyɛdeɛ,
na ɔde maa Israel sɛ daa apam no,
sɛ mo apɛgyadeɛ a wɔkyɛ no homa soɔ.
Ɛberɛ a nnipa no ano nnɔɔso,
wɔyɛ kakraa bi ne ahɔhoɔ wɔ hɔ
na wɔnenam firi ɔman mu kɔ ɔman mu,
wɔfiri ahennie bi mu kɔ ɔman foforɔ bi mu no,
na wɔn nti ɔkaa ahemfo anim sɛ:
Monnka me nnipa a wɔasra wɔn no,
na monnyɛ m’adiyifoɔ bɔne bi.
ɔbubuu aduane poma nyinaa mu;
wɔtɔn Yosef maa no kɔyɛɛ akoa.
Wɔde mpokyerɛ miaa ne nan,
de no too dadeɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu
kɔsii berɛ a n’asɛm baa mu,
AWURADE asɛm sɔɔ no hwɛe.
deɛ ɔdi aman soɔ no maa wɔkɔsanee no.
Ɔde no sii ne fie so panin,
ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa sodifoɔ,
sɛ ɔnkyerɛ n’asafohene deɛ ɔpɛ,
na ɔnkyerɛ ne mpanimfoɔ nyansa.
na Yakob bɛsoɛɛ Ham asase so sɛ hɔhoɔ.
na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ den sene wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ.
Ɔdanee wɔn akoma sɛ wɔntane ne man,
na wɔmfa aniteɛ nhyɛ ne nkoa so.
Ɔsomaa n’akoa Mose ne Aaron
a ɔyii no no.
ne anwanwadeɛ, Ham asase so.
Ɔsomaa esum maa no duruu sum,
nanso wɔannwene ne nsɛm ho.
Ɔdanee wɔn nsuo mogya,
na ɔde kum wɔn mpataa.
Wɔn asase dɔɔ mponkyerɛne manyamanya
maa wɔbaa wɔn ahemfo mpia mu.
Ɔkasae, na anwansena borebore bae,
ntontom baa wɔn asase nyinaa so.
Ɔde asukɔtweaa yɛɛ wɔn osutorɔ
maa ogyaframa baa wɔn asase so.
Na ɔbobɔɔ wɔn bobe ne wɔn borɔdɔma,
na ɔbubuu wɔn asase so nnua.
Ɔkasae, na ntutummɛ bae
ne mmɛbɛ a wɔn dodoɔ nni ano,
na wɔbɛdii wɔn asase so ahahan nyinaa,
na wɔdii wɔn mfuo so aduane.
Na ɔbobɔɔ wɔn asase so mmakan nyinaa,
wɔn ahoɔden nyinaa mu mma a ɛdi kan.
na onipa a ɔyɛ mmerɛ biara nni ne mmusuakuo mu.
Wɔn adifire yɛɛ Misraimfoɔ anigyeɛ,
na wɔn ho hu tɔɔ wɔn so.
ne ogya, sɛ ɛnyɛ hann anadwo.
na ɔde ɔsoro aduane maa wɔmee.
ɛtenee anwea pradada so sɛ asubɔnten.
Na ɔkaee n’asɛm kronkron no,
ɔkaee n’akoa Abraham,
na ɔyii ne man maa wɔde abotɔyam firii adi,
ɔmaa wɔn a ɔyii wɔn no de ahurisie kɔe.
Na ɔde amanaman nsase maa wɔn,
na wɔdii nkurɔfoɔ adwuma so adeɛ,
sɛ wɔnhwɛ n’ahyɛdeɛ nyɛ,
na wɔnni ne mmara so.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monna AWURADE ase, na ɔyɛ,
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi aka AWURADE mmaninneɛ,
na wama wɔate n’ayeyie nyinaa?
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔkura atemmuo mu,
ne deɛ ɔdi asɛntenenee daa nyinaa.
AWURADE, wo man ho anisɔ no mu, kae me,
wo nkwagyeɛ mu bɛhwɛ me,
na menhunu wɔn a woayi wɔn no nnepa,
na m’ani nnye wo nkurɔfoɔ no anigyeɛ ho bi,
na me ne w’agyapadeɛ nhyehyɛ yɛn ho.
yɛafom, yɛayɛ bɔne kɛse.
wɔankae w’adɔeɛ dodoɔ no,
na wɔtee atua ɛpo ho, Mmɛwa Po ho.
Nanso ne din nti ɔgyee wɔn,
sɛ ɔbɛma wɔahunu ne mmaninyɛ.
Ɔteateaa Mmɛwa Po no maa no wee,
na ɔde wɔn faa abunu mu sɛ anwea pradada so.
Na ɔgyee wɔn firii deɛ ɔkyiri wɔn no nsam,
na ɔyii wɔn firii ɔtamfoɔ nsam,
na nsuo kataa wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ so,
wɔn mu baako mpo anka.
wɔtoo n’ayeyie dwom.
Wɔn werɛ firii ne nneyɛɛ ntɛm,
wɔantwɛn n’agyinatuo.
na wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe anwea pradada so.
Ɛnna ɔmaa wɔn deɛ wɔbisaeɛ,
nanso ɔmaa ɔfɔn baa wɔn kra mu.
ne Aaron, AWURADE hotefoɔ no.
Asase mu bue menee Datan,
na ɛkataa Abiram asafo so.
Na ogya sɔ kɔkaa wɔn asafo,
ogyaframa taferee abɔnefoɔ no.
na wɔkotoo ohoni a wɔguiɛ.
yɛɛ no nantwie a ɔwe wira nsɛso.
ɔyɛɛ nnoɔma akɛseɛ Misraim,
ɔyɛɛ anwanwadeɛ Ham asase so,
ne ahudeɛ, Mmɛwa Po ho no.
nanso Mose a ɔyii no no
kɔgyinaa n’anim sii abuo no ano,
sɛ ɔbɛyi n’abufuo, na wansɛe wɔn.
wɔannye n’asɛm anni.
Wɔnwiinwii wɔn ntomadan mu,
na wɔantie AWURADE asɛm.
Ɛnna ɔmaa ne nsa so tiaa wɔn
sɛ ɔbɛma wɔatotɔ ɛserɛ so,
na wabɔ wɔn asefoɔ agu amanaman mu,
na wapansam wɔn, nsase so.
na wɔdii adefunu afɔrebɔdeɛ,
na wɔde wɔn nneyɛɛ huruu no,
na owuyadeɛ baa wɔn mu.
Na Pinehas sɔre gyina patae,
na ɔsɔɔ owuyadeɛ no ano.
kɔɔ mma mma so kɔsi daa.
na wɔn nti ɛwiee Mose bɔne.
Na wɔhoo ne honhom werɛ,
na ɔde n’ano woroo nsɛm.
a AWURADE kaa wɔn ho asɛm no
na wɔfrafraa amanaman no mu,
na wɔsuasuaa wɔn nneyɛɛ.
Na wɔsom wɔn ahoni,
na ɛdanee wɔn fidie.
bobɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa abosom,
na wɔkaa mogya a ɛnni fɔ gui,
wɔn mmabanin ne wɔn mmammaa mogya,
wɔde wɔn bɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa Kanaan ahoni,
maa mogya guu asase no ho fi.
Na wɔde wɔn nneyɛɛ maa wɔn ho yɛɛ nwunu,
na wɔde wɔn nsɛnnie dan nnwamamfoɔ.
Ɛnna AWURADE abufuo dɛre tiaa ne man,
na ɔkyirii n’agyapadeɛ.
na wɔn a wɔkyiri wɔn dii wɔn so.
Na wɔn atamfoɔ hyɛɛ wɔn so,
na wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase hyɛɛ wɔn nsa ase.
Ɔgyee wɔn mpɛn pii,
na wɔn deɛ, wɔtee atua, wɔn apam so,
na wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase wɔn amumuyɛ mu.
Nanso ɔhwɛɛ wɔn ahohia maa wɔn,
ɔtiee wɔn abooboo no.
Na ɔkaee n’apam maa wɔn,
na n’adɔeɛ dodoɔ nti ɔyɛɛ ntimmɔborɔ.
Na ɔmaa wɔn a wɔfaa wɔn nnommum nyinaa
hunuu wɔn mmɔbɔ.
na boaboa yɛn ano firi amanaman mu,
na yɛnna wo din kronkron no ase,
na yɛmfa w’ayeyie nhyehyɛ yɛn ho.
firi tete akyirikyiri kɔsi daakye akyirikyiri,
na ma ɔman mu no nyinaa nse sɛ:
Amen. Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
na n’adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ daa.
Ma wɔn a AWURADE agye wɔn nka saa,
wɔn a wagye wɔn afiri ɔhohiahiafoɔ nsam,
na waboaboa wɔn ano afiri nsase soɔ,
afiri apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ,
afiri atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam.
Wɔkyinkyinii anwea pradada so,
nkyɛkyerɛ a ɛnni kwan so,
wɔanhunu kuro biara antena mu.
Ɛkɔm dee wɔn, sukɔm dee wɔn,
wɔn kra tɔɔ piti wɔ wɔn mu.
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu,
na ɔde wɔn faa ɔkwantenenee so
sɛ wɔnkɔ kuro a wɔbɛtumi atena mu so.
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
na ɔde adepa ahyɛ ɔkra a ɛkɔm de no ma.
Wɔn a wɔtenaa sum ne sum kabii mu,
na wɔkyeree wɔn guu amaneɛ ne dadeɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔtee Nyankopɔn nsɛm ho atua,
na wɔbuu ɔsorosoroni no agyina animtia,
na ɔde ɔhaw brɛɛ wɔn akoma ase,
wɔhwehwee ase a ɔboafoɔ bi nni hɔ.
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu.
Ɔyii wɔn firii sum ne sum kabii mu,
na ɔbubuu wɔn mpokyerɛ mu.
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
sɛ wabubu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ apono,
na watwitwa adaban mu asinasini.
Agyegyentwie, wɔn mmarato kwan
ne wɔn amumuyɛ nti wɔhunuu amane.
Wɔn kra kyiri aduane nyinaa
na wɔbɛn owuo aboboano.
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu.
Ɔmaa n’asɛm bɛsaa wɔn yadeɛ,
na ɔyii wɔn firii wɔn amena mu.
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
na wɔmfa ahurisie dwom nka ne nneyɛɛ.
Wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ ɛpo so ahyɛn mu
na wɔkɔdi nsuo akɛseɛ mu dwuma no,
wɔn na wɔhunuu AWURADE nneyɛɛ,
ne n’anwanwadeɛ ebunu mu,
na ɔka maa ahum kɛseɛ tui,
na ɛmaa n’asorɔkyeɛ so.
Wɔforo kɔɔ soro, na wɔsiane kɔɔ bunu donkodonko mu,
ahohia nti wɔn kra hodwoe.
Wɔkyim kɔ bae tɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabofoɔ,
na wɔn nyansa nyinaa sae wɔn tirim.
na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ahokyere mu.
Ɔmaa ahum no yɛɛ komm,
na asorɔkyeɛ no yɛɛ dinn.
Na wɔn ani gyee sɛ ano adwo komm,
na ɔde wɔn kɔɔ wɔn agyinaeɛ a wɔhwehwɛɛ hɔ no:
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, nnipa mma mu,
na wɔmma no so ɔman ahyiaeɛ mu,
na wɔnyi no ayɛ mpanimfoɔ dwabɔ mu.
Ɔdanee asutene maa no yɛɛ anwea pradada
ne nsuo aniwa maa no yɛɛ nkyɛkyerɛ.
Asase a ɛma aduane danee asase kɛsɛɛ,
wɔn a wɔte soɔ no bɔneyɛ nti.
Ɔdanee anwea pradada maa no yɛɛ ɔtadeɛ,
ne nkyɛkyerɛ maa no yɛɛ nsuo aniwa,
na ɔmaa wɔn a ɛkɔm dee wɔn kɔtenaa hɔ,
na wɔkyekyeree kuro tenaa mu,
na wɔyɛɛ mfuo, na wɔtetɛɛ bobe nturo,
na wɔnyaa nnɔbaeɛ pii.
Na ɔhyiraa wɔn maa wɔn ase kyenee bebree,
na wamma wɔn afieboa so anhwan.
Ɛnna afei wɔn so hwaneeɛ, na wɔbrɛɛ wɔn ase,
ɛnam nhyɛsoɔ, ɔhaw ne awerɛhoɔhyɛ nti.
Ɔde animtiabuo gu mmapɔmma so,
na ɔma wɔkyini asase fo a ɔkwan nni hɔ so.
Na ɔmaa ohiani so firii amanehunu mu,
na ɔyɛɛ wɔn mmusua sɛ nnwankuo.
na amumuyɛ nyinaa bɛmua n’ano.
Obiara a ɔyɛ onyansafoɔ no, ma no mmu yeinom,
na ma wɔnwene AWURADE adɔeɛ ho.
m’akoma atim!
Mɛto dwom, na mayi ayɛ!
Me kra nyane!
Bɛnta ne sankuten, monyane,
mɛnyane anɔpahema.
AWURADE, mɛda wo ase, aman mu,
na mɛto ayeyie dwom mama wo, aman mu.
Na w’adɔeɛ so tra ɔsoro,
na wo nokorɛ duru ewiem tɔnn.
Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tra ɔsoro,
na ma w’animuonyam so asase nyinaa so.
Deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na woagye w’adɔfo nti,
fa wo nifa gye yɛn nkwa, na gye me so.
Onyankopɔn akasa ne kronkronyɛ mu:
Medi ahurisie, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu,
na masusu Sukot bonhwa.
Gilead wɔ me, Manase wɔ me,
na Efraim yɛ me tiri so dadeɛ kyɛ,
Yuda yɛ m’ahempoma.
Moab yɛ me dwaresɛn,
Edom so na mɛto me mpaboa maguo,
Filistifoɔ asase so na mɛbɔ ose.
Hwan na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuro denden no mu,
hwan na ɔbɛgya me akɔ Edom?
Onyankopɔn, ɛnyɛ wo na woasum yɛn aguo yi,
na wo, Onyankopɔn, ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ?
Bɛboa yɛn firi ahohia mu,
na onipa mmoa yɛ ɔkwa.
Yɛde Onyankopɔn na ɛbɛyɛ mmaninneɛ,
na ɔno na ɔbɛtiatia yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ soɔ.
M’ayeyie Nyankopɔn, mmua w’ano.
Na abɔnefoɔ ne nkontompofoɔ abue wɔn ano atia me,
wɔde tɛkyerɛma torofoɔ akeka me ho nsɛm,
na wɔde nitansɛm atwa me ho ahyia,
na wɔne me di ako kwa.
Wɔtane me de hyɛ me dɔ ananmu,
na me deɛ, mpaeɛ ara na mebɔ.
na wɔkyiri me de hyɛ me dɔ ananmu.
Fa ɔbɔnefoɔ si ne so,
na ma Satan nnyina ne nifa.
Wɔbu no atɛn a, ma no nni fɔ,
na ma ne mpaebɔ nnane no bɔne.
na ne hwɛ adwuma no, ma obi mfa,
ne mma nyɛ nwisiaa,
na ne yere nnane okunafoɔ,
na ne mma nkyinkyini nsrɛsrɛ adeɛ,
na wɔmfiri wɔn amamfo so nkɔhwehwɛ aduane.
Ma ɔpempensifoɔ nsa nka deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa,
na ananafoɔ mfom n’adwumadeɛ.
Mma obiara adɔeɛ nnkyɛre mmma no,
na obiara nnnom ne nwisiaa.
Ma wɔnhye n’ase,
ma wɔn din ngu awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdi soɔ yi mu.
na ne na bɔne nso, wɔmmpepa.
na ɔntwa wɔn ho nkaeɛ mfiri asase so.
Ɛsiane sɛ wankae sɛ ɔbɛyɛ adɔeɛ,
na ɔtaa onipa mmɔborɔni ne ohiani
ne deɛ n’akoma abubuo, sɛ ɔbɛku wɔn.
Ɛnam sɛ ɔdɔɔ nnuabɔ nti, aba ne so,
sɛ wampɛ nhyira nti, ɛne no ntam twe.
na ɛkɔɔ ne yam sɛ nsuo,
ne ne nnompe mu sɛ ngo.
Ma no nyɛ no sɛ ntoma a ɔfira
ne abɔsoɔ a ɔde kyekyere ne ho daa.
Yei ne me ho asɛmpɛfoɔ akatua a ɛfiri AWURADE nsam,
ne wɔn a wɔka me kra ho asɛmmɔne no deɛ.
Na wo, O Onyankopɔn ne m’AWURADE,
wo din nti di ma me,
na w’adɔeɛ no yɛ, yi me!
Na meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani,
na m’akoma apira wɔ me mu.
Mekɔ sɛ sunsum a ɛrekɔtɔ,
woawoso me atwene sɛ ntutummɛ.
Abuada nti me nkotodwe popo,
na me honam afɔn, emu sradeɛ asa.
wɔhwɛ me a, wɔwoso wɔn ti.
Boa me, AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn,
gye me sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ,
na wɔnhunu sɛ wo nsa ni,
sɛ wo, AWURADE, na woyɛeɛ.
Wɔsɔre, na wɔn ani wu, na w’akoa deɛ, n’ani gye.
na wɔafira wɔn ahohora sɛ ntoma.

Na wɔn a wɔsɔre tia woɔ no, me werɛ nho wɔn anaa?
Mede ɔtane pa metane wɔn,
mebu wɔn m’atamfoɔ.
sɔ me hwɛ, na hunu m’adwene,
na gya me kɔ daa kwan so!
AWURADE, yi me firi onipa bɔne nsam,
bɔ me ho ban, ɔbarima ɔboɔdurufoɔ ho.
Wɔn na wɔdwene akoma mu bɔne,
daa nyinaa wɔka ɔko.
ahuritia borɔ wɔ wɔn se ano.
AWURADE, hwɛ me so firi ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam,
bɔ me ho ban ɔbarima ɔboɔdurufoɔ ho,
na wɔabɔ wɔn tirim pɔ sɛ wɔbɛsum m’anammɔn atwene.
Ahantanfoɔ de fidie ne nhoma ato hɔ ama me,
wɔasum me nsɛmma kwankyɛn,
wɔasum me apa.
AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me nkotosrɛ nne.
Ao, AWURADE, me Wura, me nkwagyeɛ ahoɔden,
wokataa me tiri so wɔ ɔko da mu.
AWURADE, mma ɔbɔnefoɔ deɛ ɔpɛ,
mma n’agyina no nnkɔ so, na wɔamma wɔn ho so.
ma wɔn anomu mmusuo mmua wɔn atifi.
Ma nsramma ngu wɔn so,
ma wɔmfa wɔn ngu ogya mu,
aku donkodonko mu a wɔrensɔre bio.
Mma ɔtɛkyerɛmafoɔ nntintim asase so,
ɔboɔdurufoɔ, ma bɔne nti no yerɛdɛdɛ.
Menim sɛ AWURADE bɛdi ɔmanehunufoɔ asɛm,
ɔbɛbu atɛn ama ahiafoɔ.
Ampa, teneneefoɔ bɛda wo din ase,
teefoɔ bɛtena w’anim.
AWURADE, mesu mefrɛ wo, yɛ ntɛm ma me;
sɛ mesu mefrɛ wo a, yɛ aso ma me.
me nsa soma sɛ anwummerɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ.
na hwɛ m’anofafa pono ano.
sɛ me ne nnipa amumuyɛfoɔ bɛdi nsɛmmɔne,
na mma mennka wɔn nnɔkɔnnɔkɔwadeɛ bi mennhwɛ.
ɛyɛ tire so ngo a me tiri rempoɔ,
nanso amumuyɛfoɔ ngo deɛ, mma no ngu me tiri so,
na me mpaebɔ ara na ɛda so tia wɔn nsɛmmɔne.
Wɔsum wɔn atemmufoɔ hwe ɔbotan so,
na wɔte me nsɛm sɛ ɛyɛ dɛ.
Sɛdeɛ obi dwiri asase funtum soɔ no,
saa ara na wɔama yɛn nnompe apete Damena ano.
Na wo, AWURADE, so na m’ani da,
wo na medwane bɛtoa wo, nto me kra ntwene.
Kora me firi apa a wɔasum me
ne amumuyɛfoɔ mfidie ho.
na me deɛ, ma mensiane ho menkɔ prɛko.
mede me nne mekoto mesrɛ AWURADE,
mehwie m’abooboo megu n’anim,
meka m’ahohia mekyerɛ no.
wo na wonim me kwan.
Ɛkwan a menam soɔ no so
na wɔsum me fidie.
Mehwɛ nifa, na hwɛ,
obi nni hɔ a n’ani ku me ho,
dwanekɔbea abɔ me,
obiara mfa me kra nyɛ huu.
Mese: Wone me dwanekɔbea,
me kyɛfa, ateasefoɔ asase so.
na mayɛ hodwoo,
yi me firi m’ataafoɔ nsam,
na wɔn ho yɛ den kyɛne me.
Yi me kra firi afiase,
na mayi wo din ayɛ.
Ateneneefoɔ bɛtwa me ho ahyia
sɛ wo ne me adi no yie.
AWURADE, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso ma me nkotosrɛ,
wo nokorɛdie mu gye me so, wo tenenee mu.
na w’anim ɔteasefoɔ biara renni bem.
Na ɔtamfoɔ taa me kra,
ɔbɔ me nkwa hwe fam,
ɔma metena sum mu sɛ wɔn a wɔawu dadaada.
Na me honhom tɔ piti me mu,
m’akoma asene me yam.
medwene wo nneyɛɛ nyinaa ho,
mesusu wo nsa ano nnwuma ho.
wo ho sukɔm de me kra sɛ asase a awoɔ.
me honhom tɔ piti,
nyi w’ani nhunta me,
na manyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ Amena mu.
Ma mente w’adɔeɛ anɔpa,
na wo so na mede me ho metoɔ.
Ma menhunu kwan a memfa soɔ,
na wo na mema me kra so mekyerɛ woɔ.
O AWURADE, yi me firi m’atamfoɔ nsam.
Wo nkyɛn na mede me ho makora.
na wone me Nyankopɔn,
wo honhom pa no
nnya me asase tee so.
wo tenenee mu yi me kra firi ahohia mu,
na sɛe wɔn a wɔha me kra nyinaa,
na w’akoa ne me.
a ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me nsa ɔsa
ne me nsateaa akodie.
m’abantenten ne me gyefoɔ,
me kyɛm ne deɛ medwane mekɔtoa no
a ɔbrɛ me man ase hyɛ m’aseɛ.
ɔdasani ba ne hwan a wodwene ne ho?
ne nna te sɛ sunsum a ɛretwam.
keka mmepɔ, na ɛmfiri wisie.
Pa anyinam, na pansam wɔn,
toto wo mmɛmma, na sɛe wɔn.
Tene wo nsa firi soro nohoa,
hwam me, na yi me firi nsuo akɛseɛ mu,
firi ananafoɔ mma nsam.
na wɔn nifa yɛ atorɔ nifa.
mede sankuo a ɛso han du bɛto dwom mama wo,
sɛ wo na wode nkwagyeɛ ma ahemfo,
na wogyee w’akoa Dawid firii afena a ɛnyɛ ano.
Gye me na yi me
firi ananafoɔ mma
a wɔn ano ka nsɛnhunu nsam.
Wɔn na wɔn nifa yɛ atorɔ nifa.
a anyini yie, wɔn mmeranteberɛ mu,
na yɛn mmammaa ayɛ sɛ twea so adum
a wɔasene no sɛ ahemfie deɛ.
Na yɛn asan ayɛ ma
a wɔyi mu nnoɔma ahodoɔ nyinaa,
na yɛn nnwan awo mpempem
ayɛ mpem du du yɛn nsase so.
Na yɛn anantwie ho atua wɔn ho
a ɔsɛeɛ ne ɔyera mma wɔn mu,
na abooboo amma yɛn mmɔntene so.
nhyira ne ɔman a AWURADE ne wɔn Nyankopɔn.
Mɛma wo so, me Nyankopɔn, ɔhene,
na mɛhyira wo din daa daa.
Mɛhyira wo daa nyinaa,
na mɛyi wo din ayɛ daa daa.
AWURADE so, na ɔsɛ ayeyie kɛse,
ne kɛseyɛ mu nni hwehwɛeɛ.
Awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ kamfo wo nnwuma kyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ foforɔ,
na wɔka wo mmaninneɛ.
Mɛdwene w’animuonyam a ɛhran no kɛseyɛ
ne w’anwanwasɛm no ho.
Na wɔka wo nneyɛɛ a ɛyɛ hu no tumi ho asɛm,
na mɛka w’ade kɛseɛ makyerɛ.
Wɔworo wo papayɛ bebrebe no nkaeɛ,
na wɔto wo tenenee ho ahurisie dwom.
ne bo kyɛre fu na n’adɔeɛ so.
na ne mmɔborɔhunu wɔ ne nnwuma nyinaa so.
AWURADE, wo nnwuma nyinaa da wo ase,
na w’ahotefoɔ hyira wo.
Wɔka w’ahennie animuonyam,
na wɔbɔ wo mmaninyɛ din,
ne n’ahennie animuonyam a ɛhran no.
W’ahennie yɛ daa ahennie,
na wo tumidie fa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
na ɔma wɔn a wɔakotoɔ nyinaa so gyina.
na woma wɔn wɔn aduane ne berɛ mu.
Wobue wo nsam,
na woma ateasefoɔ nyinaa nya deɛ wɔpɛ di mee.
na ɔyɛ adɔeɛ ne nnwuma nyinaa mu.
AWURADE bɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinaa,
wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nokorɛ mu nyinaa.
na ɔtie wɔn sufrɛ, na ɔgye wɔn.
AWURADE hwɛ n’adɔfo nyinaa so,
na abɔnefoɔ nyinaa deɛ, ɔbɛsɛe wɔn.
M’ano bɛka AWURADE ayeyie,
na ma honam nyinaa nhyira ne din kronkron daa daa.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Me kra, yi AWURADE ayɛ.
Mete ase yi, mɛyi AWURADE ayɛ,
mewɔ hɔ yi, mɛto dwom mama me Nyankopɔn.
anaa onipa ba a nkwagyeɛ biara nni ne mu so.
da no ara ne tirim a ɔbɔeɛ yera.
Nhyira ne deɛ Yakob Nyankopɔn ne ne boafoɔ,
deɛ n’ani da AWURADE, ne Nyankopɔn, soɔ.
Ɔno na ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase,
ɛpo ne deɛ ɛwom nyinaa,
ɔno na ɔkora nokorɛ daa.
Ɔbu atɛn ma wɔn a wɔdi wɔn amim,
ɔma wɔn a ɛkɔm de wɔn aduane.
AWURADE tu nneduafoɔ.
AWURADE ma wɔn a wɔakotoɔ so gyina,
AWURADE dɔ ateneneefoɔ,
ɔgyina nwisiaa ne akunafoɔ akyi,
na abɔnefoɔ kwan deɛ, ɔdane ani.
Sion, wo Nyankopɔn di hene kɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
na ɛyɛ sɛ wɔto dwom ma yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na ɛyɛ dɛ, ayeyie fata.
AWURADE na ɔkyekyere Yerusalem,
ɔpɔn Israelfoɔ a wɔapete wɔn.
na ɔkyekyere wɔn akuro.
ɔtoto wɔn nyinaa din.
Yɛn AWURADE so, na ne tumi dɔɔso,
ne nhunumu nni anobuo.
ɔto abɔnefoɔ hwe fam.
Monto aseda dwom mma AWURADE,
momfa sankuo nto dwom mma yɛn Nyankopɔn.
Ɔno na ɔde mununkum kata ɔsoro,
ɔsiesie osuo ma asase,
ɔma wira fifiri mmepɔ so.
ne anene mma a wɔsu.
Ɛnyɛ ɔpɔnkɔ ahoɔden na ɛyɛ no fɛ,
ɛnyɛ ɔdasani akokoɔduro na ɛsɔ n’ani.
AWURADE ani sɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no,
wɔn a wɔn ani da n’adɔeɛ soɔ.
Yerusalem, kamfo AWURADE,
Sion, yi wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ!
Na wahyɛ w’aponkɛseɛ adaban den,
wahyira wo mma a wɔwɔ wo mu.
ɔde ayuo pa ma wodi mee.
Ɔma ne kaseɛ ba asase so,
n’asɛm tu mmirika ntɛmntɛm.
ɔpete obosuo nkyenkyeneeɛ sɛ nso.
Ɔto n’asukɔtweaa gu sɛ mporoporowa;
hwan na ɔbɛtumi n’awɔ?
Ɔma n’asɛm nane no,
ɔma ne mframa bɔ ma nsuo sene.
Ɔyi n’asɛm kyerɛ Yakob,
ɔde n’ahyɛdeɛ ne n’atemmudeɛ kyerɛ Israel.
na n’atemmudeɛ no, wɔnnim.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ mfiri soro,
monyi no ayɛ sorosoro.
n’asafo nyinaa, monyi no ayɛ.
Owia ne ɔsrane, monyi no ayɛ,
nsoromma a ɛhran nyinaa, monyi no ayɛ.
Mo soro mu soro, monyi no ayɛ,
ɛne mo asuasu a ɛwɔ ɔsoro soɔ.
na ɔno na ɔhyɛeɛ na wɔbɔɔ wɔn;
na ɔde wɔn tintim hɔ daa daa,
wahyɛ ahyɛdeɛ a obi ntra.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ mfiri asase so,
nsuboa ahodoɔ ne abunu nyinaa;
ogya ne asukɔtweaa, sukyerɛmma ne huruhuro,
ahum a ɛyɛ deɛ n’asɛm seɛ:
Mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ nyinaa,
nnua a ɛsoɔ ne ntweneduro nyinaa,
wiram mmoa ne afieboa nyinaa,
mmoa a wɔwea ne ntakraboa.
Asase so ahemfo ne aman nyinaa,
atitire ne asase so atemmufoɔ nyinaa,
mmeranteɛ ne mmabaa nso,
mpanin ne mmɔfra:
Wɔnyi AWURADE din ayɛ,
sɛ ne din nko na ɛso;
n’animuonyam tra asase ne ɔsoro so.
ama n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa ayeyie,
ama Israel mma, ɔman a wɔbɛn no no.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monto dwom foforɔ mma AWURADE,
monka n’ayeyie ahotefoɔ asafo mu.
ma Sion mma nni wɔn hene ho ahurisie.
Ma wɔmfa asa nyi ne din ayɛ,
ma wɔmfa mpintin ne asankuo nto dwom mma no.
Na AWURADE ani sɔ ne man,
ɔde nkwagyeɛ hyehyɛ ahobrɛasefoɔ.
Ahotefoɔ hyehyɛ wɔn ho animuonyam mu,
wɔto ahosan dwom, wɔn nnaeɛ so.
Nyankopɔn ayeyie a ɛso wɔ wɔn anomu,
na nkrantɛ anofanu hyɛ wɔn nsam,
sɛ wɔbɛtɔ amanaman mu were,
na wɔatwe aman aso;
sɛ wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn bɛkyekyere wɔn ahemfo,
na wɔde dadeɛ mpokyerɛ agu wɔn atitire;
sɛ wɔde atɛn a wɔatwerɛ no bɛbu wɔn;
ɛne n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa animuonyam.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Monyi Onyankopɔn ayɛ wɔ ne kronkronbea,
monyi no ayɛ ne tumi wie no mu.
Monyi no ayɛ ne mmaninyɛ mu,
monyi no ayɛ sɛ ne kɛseyɛ sononko no teɛ.
Monyi no ayɛ ntotorobɛnto nne so,
monyi no ayɛ bɛnta ne sankuten so.
Monyi no ayɛ mpintin ne asa so,
monyi no ayɛ asankuhan ne atɛntɛbɛn so.
Monyi no ayɛ nsambɔ nnawuro a ne nne so so,
monyi no ayɛ nnawuta a ɛgyegye denden so.
Monyi AWURADE ayɛ!
Sɛ nnipa mfa nhunu nyansa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ,
sɛ wɔmfa nhunu nhunumu nsɛm mu;
sɛ wɔmfa nnye nimdeɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ,
tenenee, atemmuo ne adeɛ a ɛtene;
sɛ wɔmfa nkyerɛ ntetekwaa aniteɛ,
aberanteɛ nso nimdeɛ ne adwempa:
Na onyansafoɔ ntie, na ne nimdeɛ nnɔɔso,
na onimdefoɔ mfa nnya atɛmpa:
Sɛ wɔmfa nhunu abebusɛm ne akasabebuo,
anyansafoɔ nsɛm ne wɔn mmɛ mu.
agyimifoɔ bu nyansa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ animtia.
na mpo wo na nkyerɛkyerɛ,
ne wo kɔn mu ntweaban.
Me ba, sɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ gyegye wo a,
mpene!
Sɛ wɔse: Bra ma yɛnkɔ mogya ho adɛm,
ma yɛnkɔtɛ deɛ ɔdi bem kwa;
ma yɛmmemene wɔn anikan sɛ Asamando,
ne amudifoɔ sɛ wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ Amena mu;
yɛbɛnya adeɛ a ne boɔ yɛ den nyinaa,
yɛde asadeɛ bɛhyɛ yɛn afie ma.
Fa wo kyɛfa bɛbɔ yɛn deɛ mu,
yɛn nyinaa bɛnya kotokuo baako.
Me ba, wo ne wɔn nnnante ɔkwan so.
Twe wo nan firi wɔn sa so.
Na wɔn nan tu mmirika kɔ bɔne mu,
na wɔyɛ ntɛm hwie mogya gu.
Na kwa ara na wɔasum fidie
ntakraboa nyinaa anim.
Nanso wɔn ara wɔn mogya ho na wɔkɔ adɛm,
wɔtɛ wɔn ara wɔn kra.
Saa na amim mu mfasopɛfoɔ nyinaa akwan teɛ,
ɛfa ne wuranom kra kɔ.
Nyansa team mmorɔno so,
ɔma wɔte ne nne mmɔntene so;
kuro mu, kuro apono ano, ɔka ne nsɛm sɛ:
Da bɛn ara na mo ntetekwaa mobɛpɛ ntetekwaasɛm akɔsie?
Na afɛdifoɔ bɛpɛ wɔn afɛdie,
na nkwaseafoɔ akyiri nimdeɛ?
Monnane mo ho mma me kasakyerɛ.
Hwɛ, mɛworo me honhom ama mo,
mɛma moahunu me nsɛm.
matene me nsam, na obi mfa nyɛ hwee,
na moto m’afotuo nyinaa twene,
na me kasakyerɛ no, mompɛ nti,
mo ahopopoɔ bɛba no, mɛyi mo ahi.
Mo ahopopoɔ ba sɛ aprannaa,
na mo amaneɛ ba sɛ ahum,
ahohiahia ne ahokyere ba mo so a,
wɔbɛhwehwɛ me nhema, na wɔrenhu me.
Ɛsiane sɛ wɔkyiri nimdeɛ,
na wɔampɛ AWURADE suro,
wɔampɛ m’afotuo,
na wɔpoo me kasakyerɛ nyinaa,
na wɔn agyina a wɔtutuiɛ amee wɔn.
na nkwasea yiedie bɛsɛe wɔn.
na ne ho adwo no a ɔnsuro mmusuo.
Me ba, sɛ wotie me nsɛm,
na wode me mmara nsɛm sie wo nkyɛn,
sɛ wobɛyɛ aso atie nyansa,
na woakom w’akoma ama nteaseɛ,
na woma wo nne so frɛ nteaseɛ,
sɛ wohwehwɛ n’akyiri kwan sɛ dwetɛ,
na wobɔre hwehwɛ no sɛ akoradeɛ a ahunta a,
ɛno na wobɛhunu AWURADE suro,
na woahunu Nyankopɔn ho nimdeɛ.
Na AWURADE na ɔma nyansa,
n’anomu na nimdeɛ ne nteaseɛ firi ba.
ɔyɛ ɛkyɛm ma wɔn a wɔnam pɛpɛ,
sɛ ɔbɛkari atemmuo akwan,
na wahwɛ n’ahotefoɔ kwan so.
Ɛno na wobɛhunu tenenee ne atemmuo
ne adeɛ a ɛtene ne ɔkwan pa nyinaa mu.
Sɛ nyansa ba w’akoma mu,
na nimdeɛ sɔ wo kra ani a,
adwempa bɛhwɛ wo so,
na nteaseɛ abɔ wo ho ban,
na ayi wo afiri bɔne kwan mu
ne onipa a ɔka nsɛm akontonkyi ho,
afiri wɔn a wɔgya akwantenenee hɔ
kɔnante sum akwan soɔ no ho,
wɔn a wɔn ani gye bɔneyɛ ho,
wɔdi bɔne akontonkyisɛm ho ahurisie,
wɔn a wɔn atempɔn kyeakyea,
na wɔn akwan danedane.
afiri ɔbaa sansani a ɔka adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm no nsam;
ɔno na wapo ne mmabaaberɛ mu kunu,
na ne werɛ afiri ne Nyankopɔn apam;
na n’akwan kɔ asamanfoɔ mu.
Wɔn a wɔkɔ ne ho mu biara nsane,
na wɔrensi nkwa akwan mu.
Na woafa nnipa pa kwan so,
na woadi ateneneefoɔ kwan so.
na wɔn a wɔyɛ pɛ no na ɛbɛtena mu;
na wɔatu nkontompofoɔ afiri so.
Me ba, mma wo werɛ mmfiri me mmara,
na ma w’akoma nni me mmara nsɛm so;
na ɛde bɛka wo ho.
fa kyekyere wo kɔn,
twerɛ no w’akoma pono so.
Nyankopɔn ne nnipa anim.
Fa w’akoma nyinaa bata AWURADE ho,
na mfa wo ho ntwere w’ankasa wo nteaseɛ.
Fa w’akwan nyinaa hyɛ ne nsa,
na ɔno na ɔbɛtene w’akwan.
suro AWURADE, na dane firi bɔne ho.
ne nkwahosan ama wo nnompe.
ne wo nnɔbaeɛ mu adikan nyinaa;
ɛnna adedodoɔ bɛyɛ w’asan amaama,
na wo nsa-kyi-amena mu nsa foforɔ bɛbu soɔ.
na mma n’animka mmfono wo;
sɛdeɛ agya yɛ ne ba a ɔdɔ no no.
ne onipa a ɔnya nteaseɛ.
na ne mfasoɔ sene sika amapa.
na afɛfɛdeɛ nyinaa, wɔmfa nto ho.
ne benkum kura adeɛ ne animuonyam.
N’akwan yɛ akwan a ɛyɛ fɛ,
na n’asa nyinaa yɛ asomdwoeɛ.
Ɛyɛ nkwa dua ma wɔn a wɔsɔ ne mu,
na nhyira ne deɛ ɔkura mu.
ɔde nteaseɛ de ɔsoro tim hɔ;
ne nimdeɛ so na abunu mu nsuo paeeɛ,
na mununkum sosɔ obosuo.
Me ba, fa nyansa mapa ne adwempa sie,
mma no nnnane mfiri w’ani so,
ne animuonyam ama wo kɔn.
Ɛno na wobɛnante wo kwan so dwoodwoo,
na wo nan ansunti.
na woda a, wo nna bɛyɛ dɛ.
Nsuro mpofirim huyie
ne abɔnefoɔ sɛeɛ a ɛbɛba.
na ɔbɛkora wo nan afiri ɛkyerɛ mu.
Mfa yieyɛ nkame deɛ ɛsɛ no,
berɛ a ɛwɔ wo tumi mu sɛ wobɛyɛ no.
Nka nkyerɛ wo yɔnko sɛ: Kɔ na bra!
ne: Ɔkyena mede bɛma,
berɛ a ɛwɔ wo hɔ.
Mpam wo yɔnko ho apammɔne,
berɛ a ɔne wo te hɔ dwoodwoo no.
Ɛne obi nnni ntɔkwasɛm kwa,
berɛ a ɔnyɛɛ wo bɔne biara no.
Ntwe otirimuɔdenfoɔ ho ninkunu,
nanso nyi n’akwan mu biara.
na teefoɔ na ɔne wɔn ka atirimusɛm.
AWURADE nnome wɔ ɔbɔnefoɔ fie,
na ɔhyira ateneneefoɔ tenabea.
na ɔdom ahobrɛasefoɔ.
Anyansafoɔ bɛnya animuonyam adi,
na nkwaseafoɔ deɛ wɔbɛsoa ahohora.
Mma, montie agya akwankyerɛ,
na monyɛ aso na moanya nhunumu.
Na adenim pa na mekyerɛ mo,
monnnya me mmara.
Na na ɛberɛ a meyɛ abadoma no,
ɔbabanin ne ɔba korɔ, ma me na ne m’agya no;
Ma w’akoma nsɔ me nsɛm mu,
di me mmara nsɛm so, na nya nkwa.
Nya nyansa, nya nhunumu.
Mma wo werɛ mmfi, na mmane mfiri m’anomu kasa ho.
Nnya no, na ɛbɛhwɛ wo so,
dɔ no, na ɛbɛkora wo.
Nyansa ne ade titire: Enti nya nyansa,
na fa w’adenya nyinaa nya nhunumu.
Bu no, na ɛbɛma wo so;
sɛ woyɛ no atuu a, ɛbɛhyɛ wo animuonyam.
aane, abotire fɛfɛ na ɛde bɛhyɛ woɔ.
na wo nkwa mfeɛ adɔɔso.
magya wo atempɔn tee so.
Wo nanteɛ mu w’anammɔn renkye wo,
na sɛ wotu mmirika a, worensunti.
Sɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dendeenden, nnyaa mu,
kora no, na ɛne wo nkwa.
na mfa nnipa bɔne kwan so.
Kwati no, nsene mfa so,
mane firi ho, na siane ho kɔ.
Wɔn deɛ wɔnna, gye sɛ wɔayɛ bɔne ansa,
na wɔntumi nna, gye sɛ wɔahwe obi ase ansa;
na wɔdi abɔnefosɛm aduane,
na amimdie nsa na wɔnom.
Na ateneneefoɔ kwan te sɛ owia hann,
ɛkɔ so hyerɛn kɔduru awia ketee.
wɔnnim deɛ wɔhunta.
Me ba, tie me nsɛm,
wɛn w’aso ma me kasa.
Mma no mmfiri w’ani so,
fa sie w’akomam tɔnn.
ne nkwahosan ma ne honam nyinaa.
Kora w’akoma sene deɛ wode sie nyinaa,
na emu na nkwa adifire fire.
Yi ano kontonkyi firi wo ho,
na ma nkontompo ano nkɔ akyirikyiri.
Ma w’ani nhwɛ tee,
na w’anisuatɛtɛ ntene nhwɛ w’anim.
na ma w’akwan nyinaa ntim.
twe wo nan firi bɔne mu.
Me ba, tie me nyansa,
brɛ w’aso ase ma me nteaseɛ;
na woahwɛ adwempa so,
na w’ano akora nimdeɛ.
na n’anomu yɛ toro sene ngo;
na n’akyiri yɛ nwono sɛ ɔnwono,
ɛyɛ nnam te sɛ nkrantɛ anofanu.
Ne nan siane kɔ owuo mu,
Asamando na n’anammɔn tutu korɔ.
Nkwa kwan deɛ, ɔnkɔ ara da,
n’anammɔn kyinkyini kɔ deɛ ɔnnim hɔ.
Na afei, me mma, montie me,
na monnyi mo ho mmfiri m’anomu nsɛm ho.
Ma wo kwan mfiri ne ho nkɔ akyiri,
na mmɛn ne fie pono ano;
na woamfa w’anidie amma ebinom,
ne wo mfeɛ amma otirimuɔdenfoɔ;
na ahɔhoɔ anni w’adeɛ ammee,
na w’adwumadeɛ antena obi hunu fie;
na wo nna a ɛdi akyire no, woampenepene,
sɛ wo nipadua ne wo honam asa,
na woanka sɛ: Ao, sɛ metanee atenetene,
na m’akoma kyirii animka nie!
na mantie m’akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ,
na mammrɛ m’aso ase mamma me nyansakyerɛfoɔ!
Ɛkaa kumaa sɛ ɛsii me bɔne koraa,
asafo ne adwabɔ mu.
Nom w’abura mu nsuo
ne nsuo a ɛsene firi wo nsutire mu.
Wo nsuo aniwa bɛbu so afiri adi
ayɛ mmɔntene so asutene;
ɛbɛyɛ wo nko ara wo dea,
na ɛnyɛ wo ne ahɔhoɔ biara dea.
Ma w’abura nyɛ nhyira,
na wo ne wo mmeranteberɛ mu yerɛ ani nnye.
Ma ne mpokua nsɔ w’ani daa,
na tɔ ne dɔ mu ntintan daa nyinaa.
Me ba, adɛn na wotɔ ɔbaa nanani ho ntintan,
na wosɔ ɔbaa hɔhoɔ kokom?
Na onipa akwan da AWURADE anim
na ɔtaataa n’anammɔn nyinaa.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ amumuyɛ sɔ ne mu,
na ne bɔne nhoma kye no.
Ɔkwati atenetene nti ɔbɛwu,
na n’agyegyentwisɛm dodoɔ nti ɔbɛyera.
sɛ wodi ɔhɔhoɔ agyinamu,
sɛ wɔnam w’anomu asɛm so
akye wo a,
yɛ yei mmom, me ba, na yi wo ho,
ɛfiri sɛ woatɔ wo yɔnko nsam;
kɔ kɔkoto, na srɛ wo yɔnko no.
Mma nna nnkɔ w’ani so,
na mma w’anisuatɛtɛ nntɔ nko.
Yi wo ho sɛ adowa firi ɔbɔmmɔfoɔ nsam,
sɛ anomaa firi fidisumfoɔ nsam.
hwɛ n’akwan, na hunu nyansa.
Ɔno na ɔnni otitire,
ɔpanin anaa sodifoɔ bie,
nanso ɔsiesie n’aduane ahuhuberɛ,
na ɔboaboa n’adidideɛ ano twaberɛ mu.
Wobɛda akɔsi da bɛn, ɔkwadwofoɔ?
Berɛ bɛn na wobɛsɔreɛ afiri wo nna mu?
nsa a mɛpono mada kakra.
Ɛnna wo hia bɛto wo sɛ ɔkwanmukafoɔ,
ne w’ahokyere sɛ ɛkyɛmkurafoɔ.
ɔde ano kontonkyi nenam,
ɔde ne nsateaa kyerɛkyerɛ adeɛ,
akontonkyisɛm wɔ n’akomam,
ɔpam ne tirim apammɔne daa,
takrawɔgyam na ɔhyɛ.
Enti mpofirim na ne sɛeɛ bɛba,
wɔbɛbubu no amonom a wɔntumi nsa.
Adeɛ nsia yi na AWURADE tane,
aane, na adeɛ nson na ɛyɛ ne kra akyiwadeɛ,
ani a ɛtra ntɔn, atorɔ tɛkyerɛma,
ne nsa a ɛhwie mogya a ɛdi bem guo;
akoma a ɛdwene mmusuo adwene,
nan a ɛyɛ herɛ tu mmirika kɔ bɔne mu;
ɔdansekurumfoɔ a ɔhu atorosɛm,
ne deɛ ɔhyɛ anuanom ntam takrawɔgyam.
na nto wo na nkyerɛkyerɛ ntwene.
na fa bebare wo kɔn ho hyia.
woda a, ɛnhwɛ wo so,
na wonyane a, ɛnyɛ wo sɛmɔdɛbɔ.
Na mmara nsɛm no yɛ kanea, na nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛ hann,
na atenetene nkaanim yɛ nkwa kwan,
afiri ɔbaa hɔhoɔ tɛkyerɛma dɔkɔdɔkɔ ho.
Mma w’ani mmmere n’ahoɔfɛ w’akomam,
na mma no mmfa n’anisuatɛtɛ nnkye wo.
Na ɛsiane ɔbaa dwamamfoɔ nti, wɔgyee ɔbarima paanoosini,
na obi yere deɛ, wɔgyee no ne nkwa a ne boɔ yɛ den no.
Onipa de ogya bɛhyɛ ne kokom
a ne ntadeɛ renhyeɛ?
Obi bɛfa nsramma so
a ne nan renhyeɛ?
na obiara a ɔkɔ ne yɔnko yere nkyɛn no renni bem.
Sɛ ɛkɔm de owifoɔ na ɔwia adeɛ sɛ ɔredi amee a,
wɔmmu no animtia:
Nanso sɛ wɔhu no a, ɔbɔ ho mprɛnson,
ɔde n’afideɛ nyinaa bɛma.
deɛ ɔyɛ saa no de sɛe ne kra.
Mmaa ne animguaseɛ na ɔbɛnya,
na n’ahohora no, wɔmpepa.
Na ninkunu twetwe ɔbarima abufuhyeɛ,
na aweretɔ da no ɔremfa nkyɛ;
ɔremmu mpata biara,
na woma akyɛdeɛ dɔɔso mpo a, ɔrempene.
Me ba, di me nsɛm so,
na fa me mmara nsɛm sie.
Di me mmara nsɛm so na nya nkwa,
na bu me mmara sɛ w’aniwa kurutuawisi.
twerɛ no w’akoma pono so.
Ka kyerɛ nyansa sɛ: Me nuabaa ne wo,
na frɛ nhunumu sɛ w’adamfo,
afiri ɔbaa sansani a ɔka adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm ho.
Na mefiri me dan mpomma mu,
m’aniahunuankansa mu mehwɛe;
na mehwɛɛ ntetekwaafoɔ mu,
mehunuu mmɔfra no mu aberantewaa bi a ɔnni tire,
ɔperee abɔntene bɛn ne ntwea,
na ɔsene faa ne fie kwan,
ɛberɛ a adeɛ resa, anwummerɛ,
anadwo kɔnkɔn ne sum mu.
Na hwɛ, ɔbaa bi hyiaa no,
ɔfira adwamamfoɔ ntoma, n’akoma asene.
Wagyigya na n’aso asoro,
ne nan ntena ne fie;
seesei ɔwɔ mmorɔno so, seesei yi ɔwɔ edwa so,
na ɔtetɛ ntwea nyinaa so.
Ɛnna ɔsɔɔ no mu, na ɔfee n’ano,
na ɔsenee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:
ɛnnɛ na mama m’aboadeɛ;
enti na mefiri mebɛhyiaa woɔ yi,
mebɛhwehwɛɛ w’anim, na mahu woɔ yi.
Mede mmomo makata me mpa so,
Misraim nkyeremu;
mede kurobo ne pɛprɛ ne duapapo
mapete me nnaeɛ so.
Bra ma ɔdɔ mmee yɛn nkɔsi anɔpa,
ma yɛmfa akɔnnɔdeɛ nsɛpɛ yɛn ho.
Na efiewura nni fie,
watu kwan kɔ akyirikyiri;
wafa fotoɔ ne sika akura,
srane korokumatwa da mu ansa na ɔbɛba fie.
Ɔde bradɛ pii too no,
ɔde n’ano fremfrem nyaa no de no kɔe.
Ɔdii n’akyi awerɛfirem sɛ nantwie a wɔrekɔku no,
sɛ mpokyerɛ a wɔde twe ogyimifoɔ aso,
kɔsii sɛ agyan hwiree ne mmerɛboɔ mu,
te sɛ anomaa de ahoɔherɛ kɔ fidie mu,
na ɔnnim sɛ ne nkwa na ɛda mu.
Na afei, me mma, montie me,
na monyɛ aso mma m’anomu nsɛm.
Mma w’akoma mmmane nnkɔ n’atempɔn so,
mfom nkɔ n’akwan so.
Na wapirapira nnipa pii agugu hɔ,
na wɔn a wakunkum wɔn dɔɔso;
ɛsiane kɔ owuo mpia mu.
na nteaseɛ ma ne nne soɔ?
Sorɔnsorɔn atifi, ɔkwan so,
nkwanta so na ɛgyina,
na ɔteam aponkɛseɛ ho,
kurotia, aboboano sɛ:
Mo, mmarima, na meteam mefrɛ mo,
na me nne gyegye ma nnipa mma:
Mo, ntetekwaa, momma mo ani nte,
na mo, nkwaseafoɔ, monnya nhunumu akoma.
Montie, na merebɛka nsɛm a emu da hɔ,
na m’anomu bue de nsɛm a ɛtene ba;
na nokorɛ firi m’anomu,
na m’ano akyiwadeɛ ne abɔnefosɛm;
m’anomu nsɛm nyinaa nam tenenee mu,
adeɛ a akyinkyim anaasɛ ɛkyea nni mu;
ne nyinaa mu da hɔ ma nhunumufoɔ,
na ɛtene ma wɔn a wɔahunu nimdeɛ.
na momfa nimdeɛ, na monnya sika a wɔayiyi mu.
Na nyansa yɛ sene mmota,
na afɛfɛdeɛ nyinaa, wɔmfa nto ho.
Me, nyansa, me ne aniteɛ na ɛteɛ,
na adwempa nimdeɛ na mehunu.
Ahokyerɛ, ahantan, ɔkwammɔne
ne akontonkyisɛm ano na mekyire.
Afotuo ne nyansahunu wɔ me,
mene nhunumu, mmaninyɛ wɔ me.
na atitire hyɛ mmara tenenee;
me so na mpanimfoɔ nam di panin,
ne aberempɔn, ne asase so atemmufoɔ nyinaa.
Me deɛ, medɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ me,
na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me ntɛm hu me.
ahodeɛ a ɛkyɛre ne tenenee.
M’aba yɛ sene sika ne sika amapa,
na me nnɔbaeɛ sene dwetɛ a wɔayiyi mu.
Tenenee tempɔn mu na menam,
atemmuo akwan so pɛ,
sɛ merema m’adɔfo adi adeɛ,
na mahyɛ wɔn adekorabea amaama.
ne nnwuma a ɛfiri teteete no mu adikan.
Ɔde me sii hɔ firi tete nteredee,
firi mfitiaseɛ ansa na asase reba.
Abunu nni hɔ no, na wɔawo me,
nsutire a ɛba nsuo pii nni hɔ no;
wɔnnya mfaa mmepɔ nsisii hɔ,
na nkokoɔ nnya mmaeɛ no, na wɔawo me,
ɔnnya nyɛɛ asase ne wiram
ne wiase mfuturo no.
berɛ a ɔtwaa abunu ani kɔntɔnkrɔn no;
ɔde mununkum sensɛnee soro pintinn,
na ebunu mu nsuo aniwa paee denden,
na ɔde asase fapem too hɔ no,
na mewɔ ne nkyɛn sɛ ne dwumfoɔ panin,
na meyɛ n’adɔdeɛ daa daa.
Na m’ani gye n’anim berɛ nyinaa mu,
na m’ani ka wɔ nnipa mma mu.
Na afei, mma, montie me,
na nhyira ne wɔn a wɔdi m’akwan soɔ.
Montie atenetene na monhunu nyansa,
na monnte atua.
Nhyira ne onipa a ɔtie me
na ɔwɛn m’apono ano daa daa,
na ɔhwɛ m’aboboano aponnwa soɔ.
na ɔnya AWURADE hɔ anisɔ;
na deɛ ɔfom me no di ne kra aborɔ,
wɔn a wɔtane me nyinaa dɔ owuo.
Nyansa asi ne dan,
wasene n’adum nson;
na wasiesie ne pono nso;
wasoma ne mmaawa,
ɔkɔteam kuro mu sorɔnsorɔmmea so sɛ:
Deɛ ɔyɛ atetekwaa mmane ha!
na deɛ ɔnni tire no, ɔse no sɛ:
Mommra mmɛdi m’aduane no bi,
na monnom me nsa a mafra no bi.
na monnante nhunumu kwan so.
Deɛ ɔtenetene ɔfɛdifoɔ no soa aniwuo,
na deɛ ɔka ɔbɔnefoɔ anim no nya nkekaeɛ.
ka onyansafoɔ anim, na ɔbɛdɔ wo.
Tu onyansafoɔ fo, na ɔbɛkɔ so ahunu nyansa,
ma ɔteneneeni nhunu de, na ɔbɛkɔ so n’adenim mu.
na ɔkronkronni no ho nimdeɛ ne nhunumu.
na wɔde nkwa mfeɛ bɛka wo ho.
Sɛ wohunu nyansa a, wohunu fa,
na sɛ wodi fɛw a, wo nko na wobɛsoa.
Ɔbaa kwasea yɛ ɔkasafoɔ,
tibɔnkɔso a ɔnnim hwee;
ɔtena ne fie aboboano,
kuro mu sorɔnsorɔn hɔ adwa so,
sɛ ɔrefrɛ wɔn a wɔresene ɔkwan soɔ,
wɔnam wɔn nkwammɔeɛ so tee no sɛ:
Deɛ ɔyɛ atetekwaa mmane ha!
Na deɛ ɔnni tire nso, ɔse no sɛ:
na ahuntaduane yɛ dɛ!
Nso onii no nnim sɛ nsamanfoɔ wɔ hɔ,
Asamando abunu mu na wɔn a wahyia wɔn no wɔ.
Ɔba nyansafoɔ ma n’agya ani gye,
na ɔba kwasea deɛ ɔhyɛ ne na awerɛhoɔ.
Ɔbɔnefoɔ akoradeɛ nyɛ mfasoɔ biara,
na tenenee gye onipa firi owuo mu.
na abɔnefoɔ adepɛ deɛ, ɔka gu.
na nsiyɛfoɔ nsa ma wɔnya wɔn ho.
Deɛ ɔboaboa ano ahuhuberɛ no yɛ ɔba nyansafoɔ,
na deɛ ɔtɔ nko twaberɛ no yɛ ɔba a ɔhyɛ aniwuo.
Nhyira da ɔteneneeni atifi,
na akakabensɛm kata abɔnefoɔ ano.
na abɔnefoɔ din bɛporɔ.
Akoma mu nyansafoɔ gye mmara nsɛm,
na ogyimifoɔ kurokurofoɔ bɛhwe ase.
Deɛ ɔnam pɛyɛ mu no nam dwoodwoo,
na deɛ ɔkyea n’akwan no, wɔbɛhu no.
na ogyimifoɔ kurokurofoɔ bɛhwe ase.
na akakabensɛm kata abɔnefoɔ ano.
na ɔdɔ kata mfomsoɔ nyinaa so.
Nhunumufoɔ anomu na wɔhunu nyansa,
na abaa fata deɛ ɔnni tire akyi.
Anyansafoɔ kora nimdeɛ,
na ogyimifoɔ ano yɛ abuo a ɛbɛn.
mmɔborɔfoɔ abuo a ɛbu wɔn ne wɔn hia.
ɔbɔnefoɔ nnɔbaeɛ deɛ, ɔde yɛ bɔne.
Deɛ ɔbu atenetene fa nkwa kwan so,
na deɛ ɔpo animka no fom kwan.
Deɛ ɔkata nitan soɔ no wɔ atorɔ ano,
na deɛ ɔtwirie no yɛ ɔkwasea.
Mfomsoɔ mpa ɔkasa dodoɔ mu,
na deɛ ɔsianka n’ano yɛ onimdefoɔ.
Ɔteneneeni tɛkyerɛma yɛ dwetɛ a wɔayiyi mu,
abɔnefoɔ akoma deɛ, ɛmfra.
Ɔteneneeni ano yɛne nnipa pii,
na agyimifoɔ deɛ, etire a wɔnnie nti wɔwuwu.
na ɔmfa awerɛhoɔ nka ho.
Amumuyɛ yɛ ɔkwasea sɛ agorɔ,
na nyansa yɛ onipa a ɔwɔ nhunumu fɛ.
na ateneneefoɔ adeɛ a wɔpɛ no, wɔbɛma wɔn.
Sɛ ahum tu twam a, na ɔbɔnefoɔ nni hɔ bio,
na ɔteneneeni yɛ daa nnyinasoɔ.
Sɛ nsa kekakeka yɛ ɛse na wisie yɛ aniwa no,
sɛ onihafoɔ yɛ wɔn a wɔsoma no ne no.
na abɔnefoɔ mfeɛ deɛ, wɔbɛtwa so.
na deɛ abɔnefoɔ hwɛ no kwan no bɛyera.
na ɛyɛ ɔsɛeɛ ma amumuyɛfoɔ.
na abɔnefoɔ deɛ wɔrentena asase so.
na tɛkyerɛma kontonkyi deɛ, wɔbɛtwa.
Ɔteneneeni ano nim adeɛ a ɛsɔ ani,
